story:
The SPEED SECRET Story:

My name is Jim Warren and I am an Internationally certified MASTER TRAINER and former D-1 and Professional athlete. My passion is for helping others achieve their athletic goals and dreams by making them faster.

After 30+ years working with elite athletes all over the world and in every major sport, I have distilled the coaching down to a few manageable, concise drills that create the greatest impact in the shortest time period possible. Most videos and camps or clinics address the challenge through the eyes of Professional or Collegiate time-tables: 2-4 hours a day, 5-6 days a week. But most kids are so smashed by their team schedule they only have an extra 45 minutes 2-3 times a week! The SPEED SECRET is designed specifically for the time-constrained kid and coach.

My company, Sports Performance TECHNOLOGIES, has a motto for our SPEED SECRET system, and our camps/clinics and seminars:

                                               SPEED CHANGES EVERYTHING!

I believe that by coming alongside young athletes and improving their movements quickly and concisely they can:

  • Enjoy sports by being more competitive
  • Be protected from injuries by moving better and having better body-awareness.
  • Catch the eye of coaches more quickly than kids who might be bigger or more skilled.

The SPEED SECRET is 1.)  7 videos of my coaching, chalk board explanations and visual clues, 2.) a group of PDFs that are goal sheets to help kids figure out where they are headed and testing forms so they can see their progress and create a goal path and 3.) Seminar Notes in PDF form which allow a Mom or Dad or Coach to follow along and make notes for coaching on the field. 4.) Quizzes designed to keep you on track and focused on retaining the 'Big Rocks'.

                    What We Need & What You Get

The 'box' and the systems that support it are all finished but we now need funding for the final processes: Website polish (thespeedsecret.com), final video edits, and general 'stuff' for TEAM members: T-shirts, hats etc...

What we will do:

  • We are raising $5000 to cover all final expenses and go to market:
  • Final creation and integration of the delivery platform: INFUSIONSOFT, Memberium, LearnDash and other APS that make the process seamless.
  • Peripheral inventories (hats, shirts, socks and custom jackets)

What you will get:

  • The Videos are just like we teach in our camps or clinics: some white board teaching that explains how the body works and WHY kids need to learn it: Young athletes today are different from when I was an athlete. It's not as simple as 'do as I say'. They need to see and then decide 'That makes perfect sense!' or they will only buy in 50%. The videos also contain all our drills explained in detail so you will feel confident to teach outside. You will continue to hear me say 'in real time' because changing an athletes patterns must be done instantly, consistently, and immediately and they will buy in 100%!
  • The PDFs are a guide to use along the journey. They create order to the process and allow the Coach to stay on track and put all the exercises (Proper warm-up, Explosive drills, Running volumes, strength drills, and Restoratives) in the right place and allow the young athlete to play a role in their development: written goals, recorded times and distances, and the creation of a visual time-table so they don't fall prey to the soul-crusher of young athletes: panic and short-term pressure.
  • The Quizzes are a simple way to make sure that you 'get it'. Only 10 questions per quiz, and the answers are right on the PDFs accompanying the vids. Simple. Think about it:             If LADDERS, WIND-SPRINTS AND PARACHUTES REALLY WORKED,                                                        wouldn't all the kids be faster?

The Impact

This campaign is more than making kids faster or making more money. I can make more money in a week consulting than I make in a month training kids. But as a former chubby, slow, and picked on kid, I know what it means to start to turn the corner athletically: I was a 5' 104# as a freshman and 5'2" 120# as a sophomore, and my NFL dreams looked pretty bleak. But in the spring of my Sophomore year I set the low hurdle record at my High School and suddenly the coaches had to take a second look at me.

                              Suddenly I was fast and the coaches took notice.

When we built the CENTER 4 CHAMPIONS we didn't know what the result would be and now we have dozens and dozens of awesome kids and parents driving 30-60-90 minutes each way to give their kids the opportunity to train with us. What if that opportunity could suddenly be made available to kids in places where there is no Jim Warren or speed coach or CENTER 4 CHAMPIONS?

My long term goal is that The SPEED SECRET will be a certification process adopted by trainers around the world and kids will impacted everywhere. But it starts with this Indiegogo campaign and you can be part of something cool right now.

RISKS & CHALLENGES:

  • Risk: According to Indiegogo, contributions are non-refundable in their Terms of Use.
  • Challenges: The good news is the information contained in The SPEED SECRET is proprietary and owned by me so I don't have to rely on anyone else for Intellectual content. It is simply a process of pushing all the content (now all finished) to you smoothly. For that learning process you get an AWESOME DEAL!

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have a kid or school to buy a system for? No worries, here's how you can help:

  • Buy a sweatshirt and give it to a kid or wear it proudly. SPEED CHANGES EVERYTHING really gets the questions flowing!
  • FAVORITE or SHARE the video. Post it to your FACEBOOK, Instagram or TWITTER or whatever. There are kids who can use this and the brighter light we shine, the larger the circle of light!
  • Don't know any kids and don't need a sweatshirt? Throw us an ATTA-BOY that will help us cover expenses. Every little bit counts! Thank you so much!!!

story:
Life...

...is this wonderful thing we all try to master. My wife and I met at very difficult times in our lifes... Out of school, starting jobs, traveling or settling, family or nomad, dealing with the past but moving on...

Well... we nearly failed to say the least... a lot of things have happened, a lot of good things but also a lot of bad ones...

Love is worth everything.
A life without love is nothing...

We know we can make it, but we need support. You might think of family and friends, well neither one of us has had the luxury to grow up in a caring and loving family situation and our friends turned away when we comitted to each other and said no to partying and fucking around...

We both are in debt through education and stuff that life brings along and we want to do this, we know we can recover from our past, heal and grow together.

Why we need money for love?

Unfortunately not all things in life are free and especially good therapies cost a lot of money.

We found this awesome lady which practices EFT (Emotional Focused Therapy) and see progress and success but the path of healing the hurt from our past and the one we did to each other through just simply not knowing any better takes time...

One session of 90 minutes costs 200 €... For 2 people with our bills impossible to afford on top of normal living costs.

Your support = LOVE

People say you cannot buy happiness and we agree for the most, but in our case we are stuck... Happiness is nowhere to be seen (speaking now as 2 individuals, not as a couple) but by supporting us with a small donation which does not hurt you, you will actually cause happiness and love.


Maybe you have experienced something similar, maybe you suceeded and know how hard it was or maybe (hopefully not) you lost what was worth everything... Here and now you can make a difference!


All supporters will receive weekly e-mail updates with our progress and more details of the story, how we got into this mess and how you are getting us out of here...


What if it doesn't work?

It's a risk we all have to take, but at least we all can go on in life with the certainty of knowing we have tried everything.

You would like to help but can't spare money at the moment?

I can understand your situation just too good, but if you read so far please share this camapgne maybe your share will safe us in the end?


Thank you!

story:
We started our original model 2 years ago, as we were located in the heart of Southern Highlands. Due to our company being new to the area, we struggled to find our niche and our gross monthly sales versus profits put us in the red. Towards the start of 2015, we restructured our company model and decided to bring in 12-15 seasoned trainers and coaches from various programs and backgrounds. We saw a major boost in energy and drive, as the numbers were escalating as our facility grew in popularity, but we still found ourselves getting further and further behind. Being able to get the community behind us 110% was difficult as our very own property management team wasn't willing to get on board with our Health & Wellness programs. After doing a great deal of marketing and research, along with constant community involvement, we were stuck in our ability to move forward with the storefront while still providing our current clientele what they were looking for. With feedback from current clients and potential clients, we were convinced that a Mobile Health & Wellness Training Business that includes Fitness, Coaching, & Nutrition, would benefit the community of Southern Highlands more than what we are currently doing.

Our business offers programs for developing Mental Balance (Mind) Physical Improvement (Body) and Life Mantras (Soul). Classes range from Nutrition & Juicing seminars, to personal Life Coaching & Group/Individual exercise training including Yoga, Cardio KickBoxing, Weight Training, Kempo karate, Dance, Bootcamps, Self-Defense & Weapon Training, Personal Fitness & Zumba classes. The idea is to give members access to all aspects needed for REAL. TOTAL. CHANGE. within one mobile program that comes to YOU!

This family-owned business has given up security and our own well-being for a shot at making this facility (and now mobile program) work, and we have exhausted all possibilities to raise the money. Mind, Body, & Soulutions believes that our service quality, excellent customer care, and diverse program selection will make us successful in accomplishing our mobile training program and growth/expansion goals. We believe in passing our successes on to our clients, our community, and everyone that is involved with helping us make our dream a reality.

We are quite a distance away from reaching our goal and need a lot of help in various areas to make this dream come true. By becoming a Mobile Health & Wellness Training Program, we will need funding in order to get all the equipment and provisions required to provide our clients with the best possible training experience possible, and get us back on our feet. If you can contribute in any way, we will be forever grateful for helping us make this dream come true and help change the lives of the many people that we will encounter on our journey to reaching our goal.

Your contributions will help us outfit our Mobile Training Business with:

-Fitness Training Equipment (e.g., Stability Balls, Plyo Boxes, Dumbbells, Free Weights, Kettle Bells, Resistance Bands, etc.)

-Nutrition & Meal Planning Supplies (e.g., Juicers & Blenders, Tupperware, Utensils, Guides and Pamphlets, etc.)

-Life Coaching Tools (e.g., Project Supplies, Recommended Reading and Audio Material, Copies & Binders, etc.)

-Overhead and Tools for Business Growth (e.g., Marketing & Advertising Supplies, Bills and Cleanup of Past-Due Expenses, Social Media Outlets, A energy efficient comapny vehicle and wrapping for it too, Licensing-Incorporating-Trademarking, etc.)

Goal: $50,000

VISION Statement: We are committed to providing our clients with the tools necessary to improve their overall health & wellness needs through fitness training, nutritional guidance & positive lifestyle adjustments in order to live a happier, healthier, well-balanced and successful life.

From the Founders of Mind, Body, & Soulutions:

Thank you sincerely and from the bottom of our hearts for everyone that IS and WILL BE involved in helping us attain our goal and succeed beyond our wildest dreams, we are forever grateful!

Nina Andrews and Will Staten

Team MB Soulutions

story:
Hello 

  Hello my name is Michelle Thielen, I am the founder of the nonprofit YogaFaith, a Christ centered approach to the holistic practice of yoga. I have practiced and studied yoga for over 20 years and have trained many students and instructors. I have traveled to many third world countries and taught YogaFaith to human traffick survivors. YogaFaith classes are donation only with 100% of these funds going directly to help trafficked survivors around the world. I am an active advocate for these precious souls and do all that I can to restore and redeem their lives. 
Stretching Your Faith is a project born out of my passion for Christ and yoga. I have been writing for many years and now pray to share the practice with the rest of the world. There will also be a section in this book that will spread awareness and allow others to participate in the rescue, healing and restoration of traffick survivors. I thank you in advance for helping me launch this vital project.
YogaFaith with survivors in ChaingRai, Thailand 11/2014

   

"Michelle has brilliantly weaved movement and scriptures into an eloquent flow of grace. Practicing what you read throughout these pages will leave you transformed from the inside and out."

-Patrick Snow, Publishing Coach and International Best-Selling Author of Creating Your Own Destiny

Whole Worship, Complete Surrender

Throughout my years of practicing yoga, my heart and mind were always on The Lord, but in a silent manner. I often found myself in this profoundly intimate and worshipful experience with Christ. I found my movement becoming more like 'Prayers In Motion', flowing in His grace. A few years ago, God called me out to share whole worship and complete surrender with others. (YogaFaith is proud to be one of the only Christian Schools internationally accredited by the Yoga Alliance) No longer silent while praying in motion, literally stretching one's faith, is the most wonderful experience and difficult to describe. With worship music, and a few Hallelujah's, this is our highest praise to Him, with our whole body, mind, spirit and soul, we are simply praising God! I long to share what whole worship and complete surrender truly is with the World and I pray that you can help me!

                                            

   

Prayers in Motion 

Stretching Your Faith helps others draw closer to the heart of the God. As Christ followers there is nothing more important than to hear what God wants to speak into our lives. With over 400 pages of illustrations, personal stories and hundreds of scriptures, this book is a spirit led blueprint to finding stillness in our busy lives, calming the chaos, and most importantly, hearing God's still small voice in an extremely loud world. It is also our dedication and devotion to Him as we move and worship God with our entire being. There are many postures of prayer throughout The Bible. Stretching Your Faith will guide you through biblical principles and postures to redeem what The Word declares: that we should meditate daily, worship with our whole being and love Him with all our heart, with all our breath, with all our strength and with all our mind. (See Acts 17:28)
   

"Yoga Faith brings great synchronization between spirit, mind, body and soul. You will find yourself immersed spiritually as well as physically. Michelle Thielen is an amazing woman of God and Yoga teacher. She has great passion to propel the Kingdom of God as she boldly lives out her God-inspired life."

-Glenda McGowen Shepard, Triumphant Strength Ministries, ARNP, MSA, CPT, Holistic Wellness Practitioner, Yoga Studio Owner

It's Time For Us To Get Healthy! 

 With your help, Stretching Your Faith can change the very fabric of the world we live in. Imagine if each one of us begin to "get whole" mind, body, spirit and soul. We begin to find our joy, balance, peace, freedom and most importantly, the plans and purposes that God has for each of us! Most of the time we are running around so busy  we don't have time to spend with our Creator, let alone hear what He has to say to us. It is time for each one of us to get healthy, become transformed from the inside out so that we can have revival in every area of our lives! You can be a part of helping me to help others get back to their original design to have temples that glorify God!
    These pages will help so many who suffer from depression, trauma, anxiety, cancer, arthritis, fibromyalgia, business, exhaustion, and numerous other limitations. Every posture can be done by any person. All levels are illustrated. How to get into each posture is described, the benefits, cautions, preparatory and counter poses are all listed for any user to enjoy in the privacy of their own home. There is a passage of scripture to meditate on, and "Soul Work" to dig deeper into the Word of God!

Cost List [we have received offline donations, our goal is now $7800]

Costs for Stretching Your Faith
If I don't reach the total goal, funds will be used for:
-Editing, Typesetting and Proofreading
-Layout
-Cover Design, Graphic Design & Layout
-ISBN Number, Library of Congress, Barcode Fees
-Some Coaching Fees

Full Funds cover 
-Hard Cover
-Printing
-Transcription
-Publishing Coaching
Production
Coordination
Promotion
-ebook

God continues to open doors and bring people from all around the world to this ministry. 

Stretching Your Faith and YogaFaith has made such a profound impact on the world. When I hear testimonies of a marriage restored because someone surrendered to God or physical, emotional, mental and other relational healings, I am in awe of what The Lord continues to do through this ministry. This winter I observed the power of Christ as a young trafficked survivor practiced a Restorative Yoga Pose, I literally cannot find the word to describe what my heart felt. Jesus!
In June, I will travel to Europe to spread The Good News of Christ and help others find healing through YogaFaith. I am in prayer that I can have my hardcover book with me!
Beyond a labor of love.

This is my life. Spreading Jesus and helping people get healthy and whole.

I have been writing for quite some time and have been attacked often, including a recent hard drive explosion and I lost my computer. There is an enemy out there that does not want this material to go forth. This project is manifesting and as exciting as that it, there will be obstacles arise that I am prepared to overcome. I'm getting use to overcoming! Through depression, hopelessness, trial and tribulations of every kind, I am still standing 'like a pit bull with lipstick' as Paula White says. I know that our world is a battleground, not a playground. This book will draw people closer to God and their purpose so that there will be more Kingdom Builders. The devil doesn't get excited about this. And because he has given it all he has, this book is about to be published. There is no obstacle I haven't prepared for. Passion and excitement can only take me so far, but this is beyond passion, this is my life calling and it shall come to pass!

“Stretching your faith is a perfect book to use as a companion for any teacher training program or to simply deepen one's own practice. Using powerful yoga poses, this book empowers you to take your health and well-being into your own hands and ease your way into inner calm and happiness.”

-Susan Friedmann, CSP, International best-selling author of Riches in Niches: How to Make it BIG in a small Market.


Other Ways You Can Help

Remember that anything will help this book GO FORTH. There is nothing too small or too great. If you cannot contribute, you can still help.

 -Pray for provision

-Please share as often as you can with as many people you can, we only have 60 days.

-Forward this link to a friend, colleague, family member or boss who may be interested in helping this project.

Creating
Your Own Destiny
Whole Worship, Complete Surrender Throughout my years of practicing yoga, my heart and mind were always on The Lord, but in a silent manner. I often found myself in this profoundly intimate and worshipful experience with Christ. I found my movement becoming more like 'Prayers In Motion', flowing in His grace. A few years ago, God called me out to share whole worship and complete surrender with others. (YogaFaith is proud to be one of the only Christian Schools internationally accredited by the Yoga Alliance) No longer silent while praying in motion, literally stretching one's faith, is the most wonderful experience and difficult to describe. With worship music, and a few Hallelujah's, this is our highest praise to Him, with our whole body, mind, spirit and soul, we are simply praising God! I long to share what whole worship and complete surrender truly is with the World and I pray that you can help me!
                                            
   Prayers in Motion 
 Stretching Your Faith helps others draw closer to the heart of the God. As Christ followers there is nothing more important than to hear what God wants to speak into our lives. With over 400 pages of illustrations, personal stories and hundreds of scriptures, this book is a spirit led blueprint to finding stillness in our busy lives, calming the chaos, and most importantly, hearing God's still small voice in an extremely loud world. It is also our dedication and devotion to Him as we move and worship God with our entire being. There are many postures of prayer throughout The Bible. Stretching Your Faith will guide you through biblical principles and postures to redeem what The Word declares: that we should meditate daily, worship with our whole being and love Him with all our heart, with all our breath, with all our strength and with all our mind. (See Acts 17:28)
   "Yoga
Faith brings great synchronization between spirit, mind, body and
soul. You will find yourself immersed spiritually as well as
physically. Michelle Thielen is an amazing woman of God and Yoga
teacher. She has great passion to propel the Kingdom of God as she
boldly lives out her God-inspired life."

-Glenda
McGowen Shepard, Triumphant
Strength Ministries, ARNP,
MSA, CPT, Holistic Wellness Practitioner, Yoga Studio Owner
It's Time For Us To Get Healthy! 
 With your help, Stretching Your Faith can change the very fabric of the world we live in. Imagine if each one of us begin to "get whole" mind, body, spirit and soul. We begin to find our joy, balance, peace, freedom and most importantly, the plans and purposes that God has for each of us! Most of the time we are running around so busy  we don't have time to spend with our Creator, let alone hear what He has to say to us. It is time for each one of us to get healthy, become transformed from the inside out so that we can have revival in every area of our lives! You can be a part of helping me to help others get back to their original design to have temples that glorify God!
    These pages will help so many who suffer from depression, trauma, anxiety, cancer, arthritis, fibromyalgia, business, exhaustion, and numerous other limitations. Every posture can be done by any person. All levels are illustrated. How to get into each posture is described, the benefits, cautions, preparatory and counter poses are all listed for any user to enjoy in the privacy of their own home. There is a passage of scripture to meditate on, and "Soul Work" to dig deeper into the Word of God! 


Cost List [we have received offline donations, our goal is now $7800]
Costs for Stretching Your Faith
If I don't reach the total goal, funds will be used for:
-Editing, Typesetting and Proofreading
-Layout
-Cover Design, Graphic Design & Layout
-ISBN Number, Library of Congress, Barcode Fees
-Some Coaching Fees

Full Funds cover 
-Hard Cover
-Printing
-Transcription
-Publishing Coaching
Production
Coordination
Promotion
-ebook

God continues to open doors and bring people from all around the world to this ministry. 

Stretching Your Faith and YogaFaith has made such a profound impact on the world. When I hear testimonies of a marriage restored because someone surrendered to God or physical, emotional, mental and other relational healings, I am in awe of what The Lord continues to do through this ministry. This winter I observed the power of Christ as a young trafficked survivor practiced a Restorative Yoga Pose, I literally cannot find the word to describe what my heart felt. Jesus!
In June, I will travel to Europe to spread The Good News of Christ and help others find healing through YogaFaith. I am in prayer that I can have my hardcover book with me!

Beyond a labor of love.

 This is my life. Spreading Jesus and helping people get healthy and whole.
I have been writing for quite some time and have been attacked often, including a recent hard drive explosion and I lost my computer. There is an enemy out there that does not want this material to go forth. This project is manifesting and as exciting as that it, there will be obstacles arise that I am prepared to overcome. I'm getting use to overcoming! Through depression, hopelessness, trial and tribulations of every kind, I am still standing 'like a pit bull with lipstick' as Paula White says. I know that our world is a battleground, not a playground. This book will draw people closer to God and their purpose so that there will be more Kingdom Builders. The devil doesn't get excited about this. And because he has given it all he has, this book is about to be published. There is no obstacle I haven't prepared for. Passion and excitement can only take me so far, but this is beyond passion, this is my life calling and it shall come to pass!

“Stretching
your faith is a perfect book to use as a companion for any teacher
training program or to simply deepen one's own practice. Using
powerful yoga poses, this book empowers you to take your health and
well-being into your own hands and
ease
your way into inner calm and happiness.”  

-Susan
Friedmann, CSP, International best-selling author of Riches
in Niches: How to Make it BIG in a small Market.
   Other Ways You Can Help Remember that anything will help this book GO FORTH. There is nothing too small or too great. If you cannot contribute, you can still help.
 -Pray for provision
-Please share as often as you can with as many people you can, we only have 60 days.
-Forward this link to a friend, colleague, family member or boss who may be interested in helping this project.

story:
Subject: Letter for Transport

If I've never believed in Murphy's Law, I may be so inclined at this point in my life. On January 31st of this year I found myself looking at my husband on a gurney suffering from a massive stroke. With my husband laying in the hospital, breathing assisted and body incapacitated I felt unsure.

The very next day, on February 1st our oldest daughter suddenly passed away less than a month after giving birth to our 1st grandchild. With my partner of 25 years not being able to hold my hand and walk with me through the pain of losing a child, I was on shaky ground.

I had a choice; fight or flight as some say. Anyone who is a mother knows that there's an innate and fierce instinct to protect your family so I went into warrior mode. I laid my child to rest, while caring for my other 2 children (1 of which is on the autism scale) and spending nights by my ailing husband's bedside willing him to health.

Currently I am still in the midst of the aftermath of losing my child and not having my husband to lean on for support. Emotionally he is not able to be that crutch and financially, as the bread winner, he cannot hold our family together in that way either.  I do not, however, choose to lament over these things. Instead I have decided to strengthen the foundation of my family by making sure my husband has the best environment in which he can be rehabilitated.

With the responsibility of the household and my husband's care, I cannot bear the burden alone. I know that part of being strong for my family is knowing when to ask for help.

It is with this in mind that I write to you for assistance in transporting my husband to a facility that will provide the best care for his condition. This move will also help me in caring for my special needs child with my overhead foreseeably lessened.

Any assistance you may be able to provide in getting my husband the appropriate care, is greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your consideration in this matter!

Best,

Lisa C. Griffith

story:
What is Puzzle Splint?

"Accidents can be happen anytime and anywhere". It's can happen in at your home, in the streets, public space, or even when you 're exercising or sports. How if an accident happens to you or your family and causing an injury to the limb (bone fracture or dislocation)? If that happens the first thing you need to do is immobilized that injury with splint.  But as we all know, the ordinary splint, has so many limitations. Each part has a lot of size & shape, so we need to adjust depend on the location and type of injury. This will slowing the installation of splints and makes it impractical during transport. Besides that, ordinary splints also not suitable for X - ray , CT scan , or MRI because of their basic material.

Puzzle Splint is first aid for limb injury in the form of innovative splint. This device has so many advantages compare to the ordinary splint. Puzzle splint is designed portable (in the bag), rapid when used, and can easily adapt to the type and location of injury. This can be done because it's apply the principle of linkage arrangement puzzle with revolutionary hook and loop connection system. 

Puzzle Splint®  completed your first aid in a bag!

First in the world, portable, adaptable, easy to use, multi function, and reuse-able medical splint for fracture with hook & loop connection system.It's inspired from puzzle shape and attachment system of a gecko skin.

Inspired by "Puzzle Shape" & Attachment mechanism of Gecko skin

When connected, each part of the hook and loop can withstand loads of up to 79 Kg per square inch. It is very strong and it's can withstand the load of an adult. This system also makes installation splint so fast and practical.

As seen on:


Puzzle Splint® has won several awards since 2013-2014:

The diference between Puzzle Splint® with ordinary / conventional splint.

Ordinary splints are generally made from hard materials such as: metal, hard plate, plastic fiber or etc, sometimes it's can not be penetrated by X-rays. Puzzle splint is using wood (block board) that are environmentally friendly and of course wood material is can be easily penetrated by X-rays. So when the X-ray procedures performed we did not need to remove the splint. Other material is a sponge and synthetic leather. So that it can be used repeatedly, saving costs, and remain comfortable during use.

Puzzle Splint® is recommended for:

If you are one of above, its mean you will need puzzle splint as your emergency first aid. For example: Sports, Athlete, Search & Rescue team, Paramedic, Medical Doctor, Hospital, Clinic, Hiking, Adventure, Public space, Ambulance, etc. 


Puzzle Splint® Development

We have been developing and perfecting this product since 2013. Since that time we have tested the strength of the product, effectiveness during use, and convenience of use for 2 years, and finally we found the final form of  this product.


How to use  Puzzle Splint® 

It's very easy to use, just determine the required length, connect each part of puzzle splints, and tied with straps.When everything is done, the patient can safely evacuated to the hospital.


Perk Choice

We offer you the option of perk that is very affordable and attractive. With contributing here you get a more discount. Here the price includes thecost of delivery to the entire world. So that with your help we can spread Puzzle Splint throughout the world. Please help us. 


Timeline for manufacturing & delivery:


Production Capacity and Manufacturing

We have had employees for production, place of production, & appro-priate production facilities to make this product. Our factory is located in Bali, Indonesia. Your help we need not to make the production and startup, but we need your help to spread puzzle splint to be in use throughout the world. 

Please check our official factory location and data addition on our website: http://www.patriatmedical.com

                      


Campaign owner & Co founder :


    

Budhi Riyanta, MD. is a medical doctor experienced for 3 years in medical practice in Indonesia. He has developed several innovative medical devices including puzzle splint. Currently he is working at a clinic in the area KUTA Bali. According to the current medical world issues now requires simple equipment and practical to use. His vision through this product is to make health care in the community to be more better and appropriate.

Candra Wijanadi, MD. is a medical doctor who has been experienced for 5 years in the emergency department. He also played a role in supervision for R & D team in developing this product. Currently he is working at an international hospital in Bali Indonesia. According to his experience these products is greatly helped in the first aid treatment patient with a limb injury. Puzzle split has also been used in the hospital where he works since last year and got a good response from patients and other medical colleagues.

Official Team Work

Our team consists of people who are experts in the field of design and materials, information technology, distribution, and video experts. each member of the team responsible for the production puzzle splint, distribution, and setting information on our official web. All of our members have also come and live in some areas of Bali Indoneisa (such as: Ubud, Denpasar and Kuta).


FAQ's

We’re overwhelmed with the feedback and questions received here, on email, Twitter, Facebook and everywhere. Here are the questions more frequently asked! Feel free to leave a comment or email us at: patriatmedical@gmail.com or see our website for more FAQ's answers at: http://www.patriatmedical.com

How long will this tool be used ? This product can be used up to 2 years and more.

If the splint puzzle is dirty like spilled blood , whether they can be reused? Puzzle splint can be washed using a liquid desinfectan before reuse.

How strong is the connection between puzzle splint ? Every inch connection can withstand loads up to 79 kg, so it is strong enough to withstand the leg.

Does puzzles splint needs to be removed while investigations such as x - ray , CT scan or MRI ? There is no need, it's compatible with x - ray , CT scan and MRI because it contains no metal .

Do I need to pay for the delivery fee for every perk? No, the existing price including postage to worldwide with standard delivery options.


Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." 

Paypal needs the above disclaimer to be displayed on the page.

Please note; We are very very confident that we will deliver to you all. The parts are straight forward to manufacture, It's not a complicated smart phone or anything.
Thanks so much for all your amazing support and contributions,

Budhi Riyanta, MD. and Candra Wijanadi,MD. CH

story:
Testimonial


Contributions

The contributions will be used  to donate a Wheelajohn to someone in need.  We have donated to diabled Veterans, MS patients as well as Parkinson's patients. Our aging seniors deserve to maintain their dignity...especially our Veterans, We/They need your help!  We make donations to Paralyzed veterans of America and Hospice. 

 We are members of the North Carolina Assisted living Association.

Think about it?

Would you ever leave a baby in wet, dirty diapers?........then why do we leave our seniors sitting in their filthy diapers until someone has the time to change them?

The Wheelajohn has revolutionized the way we age with dignity and grace.

My stepfather had reocurring Hospital stays due to Urinary Tract Infections (UTIs) as he aged.  He was a Veteran, strong, healthy contractor and had Parkinson's later on in life.  Upon becoming a wheelchair user, he quit drinking water knowing he'd have to urinate and hated wearing diapers.  He also didn't  want to have to depend on my mother (his caregiver) all the time.  "Nursie," Bob would call her ever since I knew him as she was a Registered Nurse.  My mother went into congestive heart failure from all the stress and demands placed upon caregivers.  The Wheel-a-John is a must have for any caregiver. 



Statistics

  • Urinary Incontinence affects 200 million people worldwide (Source 1).
  • $17 billion is the cost to treat Sepsis annually (Source 2).  Urinary Tract Infections (UTI) are one of the leading causes of Sepsis.
  • Hospital-Acquired Infections cost $10 billion a year (Source 3) and UTI's account for approximately 40% of all hospital acquired infections (Source 5).
  • In 2012, total direct medical costs of fall injuries for people 65 and older adjusted inflation was $30 billion.  By 2020 the cost of fall injuries is expected to reach $67.7 billion (Source 4).
Sources
  1. National Association for Incontinence, Facts and Statistics  http://www.NAFC.org
  2. AARP Magazine, Aug/Sept. 2013
  3. U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
  4. Economic dimensions of Slips and Fall Injuries.  Journal of Forensic Science
  5. Supplement to Urology (March 1991)

In the News!

The following is a link to a recent newpaper article published regarding the Wheel a John:
http://www.huntersvilleherald.com/news/2015/1/29/11397/inventor-gives-residents-their-dignity-back

Update

We are currently in the process of acquiring FDA approval for the Wheel-a-John!

story:
About Us:

The Reach Centre is a safe environment for youth across Prince Edward Island who are recovering from addiction(s) and mental health issues. Staff at the centre provide daily counselling and help clients to access additional community resources, and youth are able to connect with others who are undergoing their own journey of recovery. 

We focus on continual education and reintegration into the workplace after treatment, promote healthy life style changes, and provide recreational activities to reduce relapse and ensure a smooth transition back into society. 

Purpose:

The purpose of this campaign is to raise funds to convert a section of our existing facility into a recreational area for our youth to enjoy on a daily basis as a part of their recovery. Most youth in recovery find it difficult to engage in recreational activities at public facilities, due to the stigma surrounding addiction and mental health issues. 

This project focuses on providing a recovery based space for our youth to improve on their physical health and life skills, while engaging in a safe social setting with multiple activities, and multiple resources to stay connected and to remain involved with our services offered at the Reach Centre. Your support of this project, means so much to many of our Island  youth.

It's a win win for the both of us:

Funds raised from this campaign will be used to outfit a section of our existing facility with a gym, complete with fitness equipment. All monies raised through Indiegogo will be immediately put towards the purchasing of equipment, mat flooring, sanitation supplies, towels, and a stereo system! 

You have the gratification of knowing that you helped many of our Island youth, while on their path to recovery, along with receiving recognition of some awesome perks when you  donate.

Donations are accepted at only ten ($10.00) dollars! Charitable receipts provided upon request.

The Impact:

There are very little recreational options for youth (ages 15-30) in recovery after they complete a treatment program on Prince Edward Island, and this often contributes to relapse.The Reach Centre aids youth in recovery by providing an environment free from stigma and judgement that those with addiction and mental health issues so often face. 

The Reach Centre is growing steadily as we offer multiple programs for our youth and their families. Our programs, initiatives, workshops, counselling  and supports have  helped  numerous youth achieve additional educational, employment goals,and maintain a happy, healthy life style. 

By introducing  and expanding our recreational program with a fully equipped gym, the number of youth accessing our services will grow significantly, extending additional ways to encourage our youth in recovery who no longer feel isolated and judged, relying on Reach staff and our volunteers to help with any issues that they may experience so they can maintain their sobriety.

Your help is welcomed in many ways:

Additional ways in which you may help our campaign and the Reach Centre include:
  1. Please invite three (3) other individuals or organizations to donate to this worthwhile campaign. 
  2. Raise awareness of this campaign through your social media contacts and word of mouth.
  3. Come volunteer at the Reach Centre, work with our youth or help behind the scenes at our events and with our programs.
  4. Feel free to donate any gently used or new sports equipment to the Reach Centre. 
We appreciate any help that you may be able to provide, please, spread the word about this campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools, include  your families, friends, co workers, business acquaintances, to assist us in reaching our goal.
We thank you, our youth thank you, your help changes their world!

Most youth in recovery find it difficult to engage in recreational activities at public facilities, due to the stigma surrounding addiction and mental health issues. 
This project focuses on providing a recovery based space for our youth to improve on their physical health and life skills, while engaging in a safe social setting with multiple activities, and multiple resources to stay connected and to remain involved with our services offered at the Reach Centre. Your support of this project, means so much to many of our Island  youth.
It's a win win for the both of us:
Funds raised from this campaign will be used to outfit a section of our existing facility with a gym, complete with fitness equipment. All monies raised through Indiegogo will be immediately put towards the purchasing of equipment, mat flooring, sanitation supplies, towels, and a stereo system! 
You have the gratification of knowing that you helped many of our Island youth, while on their path to recovery, along with receiving recognition of some awesome perks when you  donate.
Donations are accepted at only ten ($10.00) dollars! Charitable receipts provided upon request.
The Impact:
  
There are very little recreational options for youth (ages 15-30) in recovery after they complete a treatment
program on Prince Edward Island, and this often contributes to relapse.The Reach Centre aids youth in recovery by providing an environment
free from stigma and judgement that those with addiction and mental health
issues so often face. 
The Reach Centre is growing steadily as we offer multiple programs
for our youth and their families. Our programs, initiatives, workshops, counselling  and supports have  helped  numerous youth achieve additional educational, employment goals,and maintain a happy, healthy life style. 
By introducing  and expanding our recreational program with a fully equipped gym, the number of youth accessing our services will grow significantly, extending additional ways to encourage our youth in recovery who no longer feel isolated and judged, relying on Reach staff and our volunteers to help with any issues that they may experience so they can maintain
their sobriety.


Your help is welcomed in many ways:

Additional ways in which you may help our campaign and the Reach Centre include:

Please invite three (3) other individuals or organizations to donate to this worthwhile campaign. 
Raise awareness of this campaign through your social media contacts and word of mouth.
Come volunteer at the Reach Centre, work with our youth or help behind the scenes at our events and with our programs.
Feel free to donate any gently used or new sports equipment to the Reach Centre. 

We appreciate any help that you may be able to provide, please, spread the word about this campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools, include  your families, friends, co workers, business acquaintances, to assist us in reaching our goal.
We thank you, our youth thank you, your help changes their world!

story:
Welcome to the
Philly Yoga Factory

Philly Yoga Factory is a Philadelphia based non-profit dedicated to making yoga accessible to underserved communities and affordable for all. We are a collective of yoga instructors and movement culture enthusiasts offering donation based yoga and fitness classes. Funding from this campaign  will help us improve and expand our current class offerings in our center city studio location, and begin community outreach programs where we take our classes out of the studio and directly into community venues in under-served Philadelphia neighborhoods. 

Your contributions will go directly to:

  • Launching our “Take It To The Streets" outreach yoga program,
  • Generating interest and boosting attendance for our current donation based yoga classes through marketing campaigns,
  • Insuring the program,
  • Paying the 501c3 federal tax exempt status filing fees,
  • Subsidizing classes in our center city location for those who cannot afford to donate.

          

What's in it for you?

Community interaction. 
We've rounded up various amazing gifts for our backers provided by local artists, merchants, makers, integrative health professionals, and yoga studios.  In addition to our perks, listed on our campaign page, Philadelphia local backers can come see for themselves what we're up to in our "pay what you can" yoga classes. Come and take a class any day at our center city location. Pay what you can. 

Just what are they up to in the 
Philly Yoga Factory?

Outreach Program

We have seen the growth of yoga as a high profit industry geared only towards people who have disposable income and can afford the luxury of preventative health care.  Our Take it to the Streets outreach program is set to launch in April with a team of instructors ready to go on location weekly in West Philadelphia's 52nd Street neighborhood to offer FREE classes to the residents there. This program will be a prototype for a series of future planned events that bring yoga into underserved communities in Philadelphia.

       

Donation Based Yoga Classes

We currently offer 17 weekly donation based, "pay what you can" yoga and fitness classes in our center city location.  This program is entirely funded through small donations collected from each class.  Instructors donate their time and the space is donated and shared with us by another yoga studio.  Your donations will go directly to funding a marketing campaign to generate interest for the classes. Larger classes means more funding for the program.  Help us ensure that the pay what you can yoga classes continue.

How else can you get involved?

Simple. Come to our classes. Interact with us on social media. Spread the word about our program. Invite your friends to the classes. If you are an experienced yoga instructor and want to teach classes, contact us! We are a grassroots non-profit organization looking to connect.
Help Philly Yoga Factory in spreading the word that yoga is not a privilege or a luxury, but a gift of preventative health that should be accessible to all.

story:
BrainGO! Is Taking Off! 

 

Here's how we blow away all the leading energy drinks and gums: 

 

 

The Product

BrainGO! by Pour-A-Pak is not just another energy choice—it’s the first of its kind on the planet! 

Golf clubs used to be made of wood. Computers used to fill up an entire room. The iPod revolutionized personal music. GPS transformed transportation.

BrainGO! is the revolution in energy boosting.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BrainGO! comes in single-serve packets of granular powder that is poured directly into the mouth a little at a time, allowing it to melt and be absorbed directly into the bloodstream - and right to your brain! It acts faster than any liquid or pill ever could and provides up to 6 hours of energy depending on individual metabolism.

 

 

After 2 years of rigorous product formulation, testing, and refinement, BrainGO! is ready to GO! It is manufactured under uncompromising GMP standards (NPA and NSF certified) in the United States, which makes two of our partners, who are veterans, very proud. 

 

'

 

Our quality guarantee is comprehensive excellence!

 

 

Follow all instructions on the box and our website. Check out the full ingredients label in our photo gallery.

 

The Science

BrainGO! capitalizes on oral absorption. It acts faster because most of the powder bypasses the digestive tract that delays and dilutes the effect of other product formulations. BrainGO! works in seconds and lasts for hours.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BrainGO! is jam-packed with the key co-factors to energy production that our competitors leave out. We also added more of the essential ingredients that our competitors skimp on. We settle for nothing less than the most elite level of quality.

We believe other energy products are inefficient. We also believe they have limited benefits. Some even have the potential to harm the human body.

Liquid formulations, which dominate most of the industry, cost more per dose because of higher packaging and shipping costs. People pay for that instead of high-quality ingredients.

 

The Revolution

We’ve gained traction. and we're ready to take it to the next level. Our mission is to make StickMan one of the most recognizable logos in the World.

 

The Culture

We're building a community of people who believe in a more efficient and healthier alternative to energy drinks and pills. That's why we're on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube. One recent Instagram post has gotten 92,121 views - another got 17,318 - and they're still climbing. Every day, more and more people are joining the revolution, and sharing their BrainGO! experience. Join the revolution with our newest hashtag #RadEnergy

 

 

If you love products that are new and more efficient BrainGO! is perfect for you!

P.S. No unnecessary bathroom breaks with a powder.

 

 

 

The Future Is Here

BrainGO! is the 21st century choice for boosting energy and focus, curbing appetite, and elevating mood & memory - with efficiency, convenience, and health in mind! 

As with any business, we've got some minor adjustments to make. For us that means some strategic changes to our packaging, and some improvements to the formulation because we want everybody to love the flavor immediately. We're aiming for raw power and great taste!

 

 

Everyone at Pour-A-Pak is driven by a singular vision: It's time for a better all-around energy boost.

story:
Hi my name is Oreet – Spending summers with Israeli-Yemenite grandparents gave me a deep connection with bellydance. My passion for music established as a classical pianist as a youth and then translated on to become a professional modern dancer & fitness instructor in NYC.

Creating SharQuí allowed a professional fusion with my family roots – in a dance that bears one's soul. It is my life’s work to expand the SHAKE YOUR BEAUTY™ movement to everyday people across the globe!

To love oneself is to experience one of the greatest loves of all. Bellydance for centuries has promoted this self-love and embracing every curve across cultural division and regional territories. Most do not learn to love one's curves and SharQuí - the bellydance workout® encompasses that self-love in modern day life.  No matter your background – we can ALL come together through dance! SharQuí crew provides the space, venue, and skills to express this act of self-love in a unifying community.


Your Contribution & What You Get

We call for $34,875 to further team hours + marketing to grow community outreach and education to impact everyday folks worldwide. The funds will contribute to participate in key conferences and events to best connect with community circles (both in person and online). SharQuí has grown organically & external support is now essential to further spread our movement.

You will receive the STICKER, the CARD, the SHIRT, the BELLYDANCE WORKOUT, the PRIVATE LESSON, the MUSIC, the LUNCH, and/or the OREET PERFORMANCE!


If we don’t reach our goal – we will continue to plug away on local levels. 

 

The Impact  

Suzanne (with Lebanese heritage) and I will continue to spread our message of self-love & unity through the SHAKE YOUR BEAUTY™ movement.  In 2017, the Joanne Domenici Memorial Award was given to Leena Vaswani, based in Mumbai, India and the runner-up Laura Petersen, based in Dunlap, TN, USA giving tools & opportunities to those passionate about the cause.  Read the short testimonials found below and here to see the results thus far:

“My life is richer in so many ways because SharQuí allows me to step out of the regular world and be a positive influence in other people’s lives; but a healthier me is the best reward of all!“ By Sandra Forrer

“The SharQuí method has really been just about the best thing that’s happened to me in my “quest” to get my mobility back. It’s so focused on building the strength and stamina in all the right muscle groups and hasn’t once felt like I was in danger of straining myself or aggravating my injury. Oreet is absolutely amazing for keeping us on track with our posture and the appropriate way to perform each move.  I’ve recommended SharQuí to all of my friends, to my family, and even to complete strangers in the gym.” By Rachel

 

Risks & Challenges

I have been a one woman show for a long time and now it’s time to ask for help – can you relate? Your support will give some wind to this sail. As a founder – my biggest challenge is believing you value our transparent & purposeful goals. The risk is - is passionate honesty rewarded? Growing SharQuí this far clearly shows my genuine commitment, yet growth requires a bigger community.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute – you can still help the SHAKE YOUR BEAUTY™ movement. Much beauty and cross-cultural collaborations have come from the Middle East region – please share this positive message with the world!


• Ask all your friends & family to get the word out and share our campaign online via social media and spread this message of self-love & unity!


• PSSSSSS use the Indiegogo share tools too!

story:
Kalila Logo by Luca Barcellona (Calligrapher)

 

Kalilawear - Embrace the power within!

Kalilawear is for active mums who wish to keep their fitness routine during pregnancy. It’s also for less active mums who want to take the moment of pregnancy to invest in their health and stay active for both themselves and their child.

                             

Kalilawear - the first technical active wear for the whole cycle of pregnancy

Kalilawear offers optimum fit and comfort during and after pregnancy. 

We have combined innovative Italian design with high quality technical materials which are breathable, and wind and rain resistant. We added some spandex to give the extra stretch we were looking for. This makes Kalilawear optimal for both outdoor and indoor activities. The inner mesh lining and panels help keep cool whilst active.

Features to support mum and baby

2-in-1 Pregnancy Jacket

Our number one feature is our baby-safe pockets which are placed to keep mobile devices away from baby. The jacket has expandable panels which zip open and shut to accommodate your baby bump. This also makes the jacket suitable for use pre and post pregnancy. 

Kalilawear Jacket - Unique Product Features

Over and under bump pants

Our pants have a roll up - roll down bump band for support during pregnancy and use post-pregnancy, and ankle zippers for ease of putting on during pregnancy. Both items have high visibility and reflective features for mum-safety.

Kalilawear Pants - Unique Product Features

 Check out our key features!

 

Video - Product features (sub-titled)

About us

Co-Founders Kathy Moulton & Claire Sambolino

We came together to launch Kalilawear

Our journey began back in 2012 and with belief and determination (not to mention 4 babies!) we are here...launching Kalilawear!

Co-Founders Claire Sambolino & Kathy Moulton

A lot has happened in the past 5 years...

Whilst designing and creating Kalilawear, we've been busy building Kalila Community, our online portal for pregnancy fitness. Not only did we want to create clothes for active mums, we also wanted to provide helpful resources to encourage mums to stay fit and healthy. 

Kalilawear timeline to success

 Our mission is simple

The benefits of physical activity in pregnancy are widely recognised yet statistics show that only 40% of women meet the current guidelines of 150 minutes activity per week. This equates to just 20 to 30 minutes of activity daily. We are launching Kalilawear to give women a choice of appropriate, baby-safe and comfortable active wear during pregnancy. Our goal is to encourage more women to embrace being active and with Kalilawear to have the support and comfort they need.

Kalilawear is unique!

Our signature jacket and pants have been designed by mums, for mums! We have considered every feature to ensure both mum and baby feel comfortable and secure. 

100% women surveyed rated our features 5/5

Designed by mums for mums

Testimonials

It takes "mum" to know "mum"! Of course, the best feedback is from other mums and here's what they have to say...

Kailawear gets the thumb's up from mums!

 

Kalilawear - Ideal for outdoors thanks to our carefully chosen fabrics

There are a few extra features that help make Kalilawear jacket and pants ideal for outdoor activities. We use durable, high quality technical fabrics which are water proof and water resistant. With a breathability rating of 3000/MVP they are suitable for moderate activity during pregnancy.

We currently produce in four sizes but hope to expand our range through crowd-funding.

Fabric Specifications & Size Guide

Thank you!

Kalilawear is exclusively available on Indiego-go with some amazing early-bird offers. We are so excited to have produced our first run of clothing to bring Kalilawear to market and introduce our innovative design to active mums. With your help, we hope to move into full production, extend our range of colours and bring more Kalilawear designs to life.

We couldn't have done any of this without the help of some really great people. Special thanks to...

Special thanks to all our family, friends & believers

 

Press Coverage

We are now stocked in the Milk Bar Milano and have coverage in Milano Mums Magazine.

story:
BALSAQ® is for every-BODY! 

 

 

 

 

Your BALSAQ® is Machine Washable. Simply remove  your balls from the SAQ before washing.  BALSAQ® is made with some of the industries most durable and antimicrobial materials.  Use cold water, no bleach and cool dry. 

To use: simply place your BALSAQ® on your area of tightness and roll!!

 

For best results, put your BALSAQ® against the wall, floor or other hard surface. Use your body to apply the amount of pressure necessary to get relief.  

 

• BALSAQ® is an easy to use, multi-functional mobility tool.  It optimizes the results of therapeutic mobility balls for trigger point therapy.

 

• BALSAQ® may assist in self-myofascial release, which activates trigger points in muscles and helps to relax tight areas.

 

Just a few ideas to get you moving...

 

 

 

 

BALSAQ® utilizes the most durable and comfortable material offered by the leading sportswear manufacturer. The construction is meticulously designed for the perfect fit and form around the massage balls, which eliminates creases and wrinkles when rolling. The handles allow for effortless control. 

 

BALSAQ® allows you to add variety and fun to your stretching and fitness routines. In addition to countless mobility and pressure point uses, the BALSAQ®  itself, acts as the perfect band. 

 

 

Our shared passion for fitness and wellness brought us together. Tired of chasing our balls……..we feverishly developed a solution . With our combined talents, we developed BALSAQ® the ULTIMATE MOBILITY SOLUTION . Simply load your balls in the BALSAQ® and you are ready to roll !!

We have a lot of fun, we still laugh about the name, and are continually finding new ways to use our BALSAQ®.  We know you will too ! 

 

- Can i get my BALSAQ® in time for Christmas ? 

Orders placed earliest in the campaign will have the greatest chance of arriving before Christmas. 

Can I get my BALSAQ® wet ?

Yes. We have used it in the pool, the sauna, and at the beach. 

- Can I wash my BALSAQ® ? 

Yes. It is machine washable :)) ....just make sure and take the balls out before you wash. Look for the yellow tag, for complete washing instructions. 

- Does my Balsaq come with instructions ? 

Yes. Each BALSAQ® has a tag, which includes suggestions and instructions.  However, you will quickly find your own way to use your BALSAQ® to meet your needs. 

-Can a Physical Therapist and a Chiropractor use the Balsaq® in their practice ? 

ABSOLUTELY!

 

 

 

 

Ready to ROLL!

All of the hard work is now behind us!  We have years of research & development; manufacturer sourcing and prototype refinement.  We've perfected the BALSAQ® and are confident and excited to offer them to you ! Our manufacturers are as proud of the results as we are and are on standby, ready to fill every order in as little time as possible.

 

Help "Spread the Word!"

The public's response to the BALSAQ® has been overwhelmingly enthusiastic and positive. Please take a second to share the word about our campaign on social media.

Be sure to follow us on Facebook and Instagram for updates and contest notifications!
story_txt:
BALSAQ® is for every-BODY! 
 

 

 
 

Your BALSAQ® is Machine Washable. Simply remove  your balls from the SAQ before washing.  BALSAQ® is made with some of the industries most durable and antimicrobial materials.  Use cold water, no bleach and cool dry. 

To use: simply place your BALSAQ® on your area of tightness and roll!!
 
For best results, put your BALSAQ® against the wall, floor or other hard surface. Use your body to apply the amount of pressure necessary to get relief.  
 
• BALSAQ® is an easy to use, multi-functional mobility tool.  It optimizes the results of therapeutic mobility balls for trigger point therapy.
 
• BALSAQ® may assist in self-myofascial release, which activates trigger points in muscles and helps to relax tight areas.
 
Just a few ideas to get you moving...
 
 
 






 

BALSAQ® utilizes the most durable and comfortable material offered by the leading sportswear manufacturer. The construction is meticulously designed for the perfect fit and form around the massage balls, which eliminates creases and wrinkles when rolling. The handles allow for effortless control. 
 


BALSAQ® allows you to add variety and fun to your stretching and fitness routines. In addition to countless mobility and pressure point uses, the BALSAQ®  itself, acts as the perfect band. 
 










 


Our shared passion for fitness and wellness brought us together. Tired of chasing our balls……..we feverishly developed a solution . With our combined talents, we developed BALSAQ® the ULTIMATE MOBILITY SOLUTION . Simply load your balls in the BALSAQ® and you are ready to roll !!
We have a lot of fun, we still laugh about the name, and are continually finding new ways to use our BALSAQ®.  We know you will too ! 
 

- Can i get my BALSAQ® in time for Christmas ? 
Orders placed earliest in the campaign will have the greatest chance of arriving before Christmas. 
Can I get my BALSAQ® wet ?
Yes. We have used it in the pool, the sauna, and at the beach. 
- Can I wash my BALSAQ® ? 
Yes. It is machine washable :)) ....just make sure and take the balls out before you wash. Look for the yellow tag, for complete washing instructions. 
- Does my Balsaq come with instructions ? 
Yes. Each BALSAQ® has a tag, which includes suggestions and instructions.  However, you will quickly find your own way to use your BALSAQ® to meet your needs. 
-Can a Physical Therapist and a Chiropractor use the Balsaq® in their practice ? 
ABSOLUTELY!
 

 
 

 
Ready to ROLL!
All of the hard work is now behind us!  We have years of research & development; manufacturer sourcing and prototype refinement.  We've perfected the BALSAQ® and are confident and excited to offer them to you ! Our manufacturers are as proud of the results as we are and are on standby, ready to fill every order in as little time as possible.
 

Help "Spread the Word!"
The public's response to the BALSAQ® has been overwhelmingly enthusiastic and positive. Please take a second to share the word about our campaign on social media.
Be sure to follow us on Facebook and Instagram for updates and contest notifications!

story:
Three generations of the Bogue family have been crafting handmade products in Ojai, California; the beauty and wonder of the valley and the immense value accorded environmental and spiritual wellness by the community inspired the development of Bogue Soap, originally made in 1973. 

These original all-natural soaps were one of many handmade products sold by matriarch Helen Bogue in her local shop called Dos Manos, or "two hands". Since then, over the last 10 years Susan Bogue and son Adam have expanded that first bar of soap to an ARTISANAL, fully SUSTAINABLE and effective bath, body and wellness product line. 

All of our bath, body and skincare creations are meticulously researched and painstakingly developed, most of all the new BESPOKE soap/bodycare items, purpose built for individuals while still extending to all walks of life, and the WELLNESS goods developed for a healthy body & mind. All ingredients are responsibly sourced, using locally farmed herbs and goat milk, ORGANIC and sustainable vegetable oils and pure essential oils.

#FarmtoBath

https://www.instagram.com/boguemilksoap/

Made with the utmost care, all goods are handmade, produced and packaged with repurposed, reused & recycled materials; soaps are made cold process and slow cured, all hand mixed, poured, stamped by number, cleaned and polished.

These principles are showcased in the range of BESPOKE products, from the “Grease Monkey” exfoliating bar made with mechanics and wrench wielding folk in mind, the Gardeners bar antibacterial with insect repelling ingredients, the Chef's Blend to remove food odors and repair over-washed hands,

#BespokeSoap

 to a top ranked "Beard Wash" Bar on Amazon.

https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R3M4...

Beard Grooming

BMS sells its luxury, organic soap and unique blends like our shave soap packed with 13 essential oils in local Southern California boutiques and natural markets like Whole Foods and Lassens. 

In our first PHASE/FUNDING GOAL for BOGUE MILK SOAP wants to expand it's product line and create new unique Bespoke & Wellness soap, bath, and body care products that are truly All-Natural. Additionally, we will carry over these new and existing products into complimentary goods for the shower, including shampoo, conditioner & shower gel.

 

To accomplish this, BMS will:

Increase inventory of pure essential & organic vegetable oils for the qualities and benefits desired for specific Bespoke & Wellness products.

Design & create packaging for new products, continuing existing branding and environmental consciousness.

Upgrade boguemilksoap.com website.

Enlist impassioned, knowledgeable  individuals to increase distribution, first regionally and then nationally.

Continue to create unique BESPOKE  line of products, each custom designed with an individual and their lifestyle need, usually starting with the LUXURY GOAT MILK soap bars like the most recent Surf Wash and Yogi Wash bars.

BESPOKE-Surf Wash with skin healing and SPF factors

In the future or second PHASE or FUNDING GOAL our goals would include the development of more WELLNESS products and contribution to treatment costs.

Recently, Bogue Bodycare has focussed on developing new soaps and serums in the wellness area, expressly with rejuvenating, healing and chemotherapeutic properties.

Cancer has taken many dear people from all of us. Four members of the Bogue family are in various stages of their Cancer battles - diagnosis, surgery, chemo and recovery - and no part is easy. Thankfully everyone is insured and receiving treatment, but all are confronted with life-changing experiences.

We are raising funds to further develop the wellness products with more organic essential & vegetable oils, herbs and other ingredients known to naturally contribute to fighting cancer and the effects of its treatments.  Additional funds after the ingredient and R&D expenditures will contribute to ongoing medical expenses.

Live clean!

RISKS and CHALLENGES:

In the saturated market of big name body care and cosmetics the small guy can find it hard to get a foothold. But times are changing as more and more people care about what's in the products they use. Ours make no compromises, where others do.  BMS always obtains the best quality natural ingredients and seeks to create unique products.

Under-capitalization is the another major challenge with a startup; however, BMS has built a great base of sales and receivables. Growth is next for us, and with an operator who has built multiple new restaurant businesses from the ground up taking them from 0 to 5M per annum in sales, the experience in fast growth is there. Coincidentally, the most recent of the restaurant projects were "farm to table" themed, which coincides perfectly with the BMS "farm to bath" concept.

story:
How often have you gone into a public restroom and had to touch either the soap dispenser or the faucet handle in order to wash your hands? You probably don't want to know what kinds of bacteria and organisms can potentially live on these surfaces that can pass from user to user. Unfortunately, even basic hand-washing or gelling with disinfectant won't kill some of these nasty bugs, some of which can be resistant to standard antibiotics and pose a real threat to the frail, elderly or immunocompromised. 

Inventor Sarah Montague, R.N., has worked for nearly a decade as a nurse and nurse manager in hospitals and clinics and has studied how easily bacteria can be spread on these surfaces (called fomites) that are frequently touched by many soiled hands (i.e. soap dispensers, water faucet handles and gelling stations). Through her own observation and input from her staff and peers, she has developed a detailed and precise solution:

The Touchless Water and Liquid Soap Dispensing Faucet!

This amazing innovation utilizes known sensor technology for a streamlined way to wash your hands that saves energy and water.  This unique device will address not only wash-station space issues but also infection-control requirements at hospitals and medical centers by providing another line of safety for patients.

Make this appliance a reality for medical centers, hospitals, clinics and even your own bathroom! 

The sole purpose of this campaign is to raise funds for final utility patenting (it is currently patent- pending) as well as marketing fees necessary to bring this innovation to the finish line where it can be considered by leaders in faucet manufacturing. Even the smallest of contributions can make a HUGE difference. Tell a few of your friends and we have a geometric expansion in our visibility!

Amount that we need for initial expenses ...$6000  

This amount will cover:

1. Marketing expenses : Due to the generous contributions and talent from family and friends,  we have some beautiful images and videos to market this invention.  Now we need to get the word out to as many companies as possible. Competition for manufacturing  breeds better pricing for the consumer which will increase this appliance's reach into a larger market. This fee will sustain the invention's current website for a year and  to allow us to use the contact list from a well-known patent marketing agency.

2. Expedited US Patent Office Filing Fee:  We are currently Patent-Pending. This expedited filing fee will get us to the front of the line for Utility Patent approval. Even though there are no known U.S. patents quite like this one (after four separate patent searches), time is of the essence in this competitive marketplace 

3. Initial Corporate Filing Fees: This is to establish a corporate entity separate from the inventor for a period of one year.

4. PCT  Application Filing Fee. We eventually want to see this appliance globally manufactured and time is of the essence to capture foreign markets as well. This fee is a place holder for the U.S. Patent Office indicating an intention to file internationally.

This is a flexible campaign. If we don't quite meet our goal, the funds raised will first go to the patent filing fee and then to as much of the marketing expense that  we can cover. 

The Impact

The Touchless Water and Liquid Soap Dispenser has the potential to change hygiene practices in every type of public and/or private setting.  In this age of highly processed and antibiotic-saturated food sources, the rise of resistant bacteria is alarming. We simply cannot continue our current practices and expect to overcome this major health concern. 

Strength in Numbers!

Great achievements occur when people form a community and rally behind the things they believe in and value. Individuals with like-minded beliefs combine and culminate their efforts to build momentum...then, anything is possible with passion, perseverance and focus.  We are entering into a large and daunting marketplace where it seems the only goal that prevails is profit.  Thank you for giving us courage to pursue this concept through your show of faith and trust.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you may not be able to contribute money but it  doesn't mean you can't help! Please send this link out to as many individuals you know. Talk up this new idea and help it take on the necessary momentum in order for it to become a reality!

  • Share the  link
  • Tell a friend 
  • Make some noise!
  • (oh yes and feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!)

story:
Thank you for taking the time to look at my campaign.  You may ask yourself "Why should I support this campaign?" Lyme Disease is the fastest growing disease in the United States.  Ticks are everywhere these days, and Lyme Disease cases are on the rise.  

I was undiagnosed for over 14 years, during which time the disease did a lot of damage to my mind and body.  Through the use of my book, "Nick, the No Good, Icky Tick", I hope to help others become more aware of ticks and Lyme Disease.  Children represent around half of the new cases of Lyme Disease.  By making this book available to school nurses, librarians, and pediatricians, we we can stop the pandemic in its tracks.  

I have worked with the local news and media in the Richmond, Virginia area, but now I would like to take this message to a national level.  This is where your support can help me.  With the money raised by this campaign, I plan to work with national organizations to get my book into as many schools and pediatricians' offices that I can.  I also plan to work with Lyme Disease organizations and national media.  

*CHANGES HAVE BEEN MADE TO REWARDS*

For a gift of $10, you will receive a personalized "Nick, the No Good, Icky Tick" bookmark signed by the author!  For a gift of $30, you will receive one signed copy of "Nick, the No Good, Icky Tick".  For a gift of $70, you will receive 2 copies of "Nick, the No Good, Icky Tick" and 2 bookmarks, one for you, and one to give to a friend.
