story:
Do you know that your energy level is too low, despite endless cups of coffee and energy drinks? Do you hate the inevitable crash they cause? Do you want to feel healthier, stronger and well rested but don’t know how? 
 
  Are you interested in finding the perfect vitamin for mornings and evenings? If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading… 
  
Welcome to the new and improved way to have a healthier more complete life with “EnNeuro”. We developed a process to create a vitamin designed just for you in the morning to get you moving and same for the nighttime. Multivitamins you buy at the store come packed with things your body doesn’t need and misses out on essential nutrients, well not anymore. With our process we have spent 12 years researching exactly what your mind and body needs in the morning and evening, for clarity during the day and peaceful rest at night. “EnNeuro” allows a person to take advantage of a life with optimal health and performance when they are taking the right supplements. 
Hello! My name is David and I suffer from fatigue, lack of focus, motivation, chronic brain-fog, stress, depression. But I need to feel great everyday in order to be present at work, with my family and friends. Why is this so difficult? I do not want to rely on endless cups of coffee and energy drink just to get through the day… So what is a guy left to do?? 
  Invent a safer, more effective alternative to feeling your best each day. Something that can help working professionals, students, entrepreneurs, employees and employers from all walks of life! Something that can invigorate people all over the world… And then…. EnNeuro was born! 
Every single year of my life prior to my tenure at junior high, I had always been successful in school, with tons of energy to enjoy the company of my friends after school. I remember distinctively, however, the day in mid junior year, my tests started getting harder, and even more as I progressed into my first year of college; classes and assignments became more complex and deadlines increased the stress. 
To make matters worse, I had to get a full time job while pulling over 18 semester credit hours at the same time. When I started searching for solutions and polling my peers I was shocked to find out that many of their routines included: 1) Coffee 3-5/day 2) Energy Drinks 2-7/day 3) Adderall 1-2/day and energy pills 3-6/day. 
                                                                      
                                                          The Impact: 
 Coffee, prescription pills and energy drinks were prevalent with people at my job and school, most of these individuals barely even got 4 or 5 hours of sleep which made it even worst and even scary for me, to see that I would have to do the same just to get by and graduate. I started taking lots of different vitamins and trying to relieve stress and achieving REM sleep as quick as possible so I wouldn't have to sleep 8 hours/day but maybe 4 or 5. 


Another issue was, all the meals most people ate during my college years were fast food and microwavable meals, which even disturbed me more, because I knew that there must have been healthier options to do this to be successful in school. Vitamins started to become my daily nutrition, as well as to counter any negative effects that could deter my efforts to stay focused at work and school. 
Throughout my junior year of college to after graduation, I started playing with single natural ingredients that can help provide rich nutrients to your brain, thus increasing your productivity level without brain fog. I started noticing slight increases of myself being more alert and attentive to tasks at hand. As I climbed the corporate ladder, I noticed that I started working more than normal hours approximately 50 to 70 hours a week, doing many mundane and tedious tasks and meetings. 
I continually sought out more and more natural ingredients and tested them on myself by using multiple blends of the ingredients simultaneously, I had to use the process of elimination over the years to find the perfect blend formulation that worked synergistically without any side effects. I had many friends and peers try my dietary blend with me during this time of discovery, with trials and errors. After painstakingly searching and developing a healthier choice to be a better you, I finally found the perfect blend of nutrients. 
This happened because I was determined to seek a better and healthier alternative to change my life, and since then, it has become my primary source of nutrients to get by in life and be able to think faster, retain memories and stay coherently focused in all situations, at school or work. This has really helped me get promoted many times by being more efficient and productive. Now I want to share this with the world to help others get through the experience I had, or to achieve more than I did, in a healthy way, not sacrificing their health but to redefine normal. I learned you can do it all, simply by nourishing your brain to improve your cognitive function.  
It took me over 12 years to perfect and develop this cognitive enhancer for you to experience an increase of a healthier and balanced lifestyle without any sacrifice to what you currently do. 
                                                           
                                                           Our Mission 
“We provide all-natural supplement products to create a balanced and healthy lifestyle. We also offer unparalleled opportunities for motivated individuals to take control of their future and build the life they have dreamed of.”

  Do you take supplements every morning? The numbers are growing. A new government study found that more than half of American adults take at least one dietary supplement. But despite their popularity, many experts remain skeptical of their effects. "The pill is a nice idea, but we have no reason to think this one-size-fits-all dose makes any sense for each individual," said Deen Dr. Darwin Deen, clinical professor in the department of family and social medicine at Albert Einstein College of Medicine in New York. That is why our supplement is perfect, we have specifics components to help give your body what it needs: day and night.

My product is called EnNeuro for day and night, which is a proprietary formula that works by harnessing dozens of natural and extracted nootriments to synergistically enhance your cognitive function. EnNeuro is a eurogenic that supports memory improvement and mood uplifting by acting as a psycho-stimulant without causing a jitters or a crash later end of the day.





How you can help:

For me to bring my vision to life, I need your support!

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!

Here is a breakdown for how we will spend the funds that we get through Indiegogo:



                                                    Try our Supplements

Please try our supplements and tell your friends how great you feel!

                                                                       PERKS





                                         Teach someone else about the product

At its core, this campaign is about helping people who live with chronic fatigue and poor sleep. If you're in a position to teach someone else how to better help themselves - do it! You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the awareness.

                                                      Spread the word

You can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this campaign. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.


We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “EnNeuro” family.

by harnessing dozens of natural and extracted nootriments to synergistically
enhance your cognitive function. EnNeuro is a eurogenic that supports memory
improvement and mood uplifting by acting as a psycho-stimulant without causing
a jitters or a crash later end of the day. 









How you can help:
For
me to bring my vision to life, I need your support!
If
you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to
the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!
Here is a breakdown for how we will spend the funds that we get through Indiegogo:




                                                    Try our Supplements
Please
try our supplements and tell your friends how great you feel!
                                                                       PERKS









                                         Teach someone else about the product
At
its core, this campaign is about helping people who live with chronic fatigue
and poor sleep. If you're in a position to teach someone else how to better help
themselves - do it! You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the
awareness.
                                                      Spread the word
You
can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this
campaign. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number
of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a
tangible contribution to the mission.


We
feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and
for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us
spread the word.  We have spent the last
few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was
worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest,
don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to
keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “EnNeuro” family.

story:
My name is Stefanie, and I currently live in Temecula, CA with my boyfriend of 6 1/2 years, Brandon, and our 16 month old son, Tristan. The reason I am writing this letter is to tell you about the way our lives have been affected by Kidney Disease.

When Brandon was 21 years old, he went on dialysis and received a kidney transplant from his father. The transplant lasted approximately five years. One night in early 2011, he told me that he was sick and that I needed to take him to the ER. He was admitted to Rancho Springs Medical Center in Murrieta. We found out that he had pneumonia and was not producing his own blood; his hemoglobin level was 6 (the normal range for an adult male is between 14-18).

After receiving multiple blood transfusions and finally stabilizing, the doctors said that he was lucky to be alive. After seven days at Rancho Springs, he was transported to Loma Linda University Medical Center in Loma Linda, CA. He was admitted and hospitalized for another 30 days. We later came to find out that his kidney transplant was being rejected and poisoning his body. His transplant was removed, and the doctors installed a venous catheter in his neck to do dialysis until he was able to have a fistula surgically stationed in his arm.

In 2013, I found out I was pregnant, which was unexpected and not planned. Processing the sheer magnitude of Brandon’s condition and thinking about raising a child through it all was beyond overwhelming. But on April 26, 2014, I gave birth to a healthy baby boy, Tristan Michael Miller, who honestly has changed our lives in the best way possible.

Currently, Brandon in school full time, doing dialysis 3 days a week for 4 hours each day, and taking care of our now 16 month old son. One of the things I love the most about Brandon is that he has never once complained about his situation or dialysis. He focuses on making the most of his life and loving his family sacrificially. Recently, however, he has expressed that he doesn't know how much longer he can handle dialysis for. You can imagine how shocked I was to hear this from him, since he has always been so positive.

We are doing everything we can to get him a transplant. He is currently on the transplant list at Loma Linda University Medical Center and Scripps Hospital in San Diego. The Scripps kidney transplant waitlist is approximately 4-6 years, and he has been on it for almost 5 years now. Scripps is concerned about finding him a match. Since he has 99% of the population’s antibodies from all the blood transfusions he received, his doctors are afraid that a transplant will be rejected.

Recently, Brandon’s social worker at Davita Dialysis told him about The Kidney Project at the University of California San Francisco. They are working on creating a bioartificial kidney, and it might be the solution to Brandon’s situation and millions of others like his. I have begun reading any information I could find regarding the implantable artificial kidney, scouring the internet like a crazy person in hopes to finding ways to make this project happen as quickly as possible. The research that has been done is breathtaking, and it has really given me hope because Brandon would be a perfect candidate. He is 31 years old and in great health besides his kidney issue.

I wanted to share my story because Kidney Disease affects so many patients and their families in this country. Approximately 26 Million Americans suffer from Kidney Disease. Maybe you know someone waiting for a kidney transplant, or who has had a kidney transplant. Maybe you have a loved one that is suffering from this disease, and you don’t know how to help. Maybe you are the one suffering, and you are losing hope.

Did you know that kidney disease touches more lives than cancer and HIV combined?

Did you know that African Americans are three times more likely to experience kidney failure?

Did you know that even though Native Americans make up just 1.5 percent of the U.S. population, they have the highest rate of diabetes in the world and one of the highest rates of end stage renal disease?

This is my goal: I would really love for human trials with The Kidney Project to start ASAP, not only for my boyfriend but for anyone that is currently suffering from or has been affected by this disease. An implantable artificial kidney sounds hard to believe, right? Not really. This can be a reality sooner than we think if we can join together and not only support The Kidney Project but help raise the funds they need to take the project to the next level.

This is the solution: The Kidney Project needs to raise the necessary funds to begin trials in 2017, if not before. If you are interested in partnering with us to impact the lives of Kidney Disease patients everywhere, please do not leave this page without making a donation, making a public post on social media or all of the above.  If you or your company is interested in matching donations or donating perks to fund donors, please contact us.  Anything helps.

http://pharm.ucsf.edu/kidney

https://www.facebook.com/ArtificialKidney?fref=ts

http://www.kidneybuzz.com/artificial-implantable-kidney-human-trials-may-be-available-sooner-with-ckd-patient-support/2015/4/27/artificial-implantable-kidney-human-trials-may-be-available-sooner-with-ckd-patient-support

story:
Hi ..

I am Basanthi, from Chickballapur, Karnataka, India. I studied B.Tech and did a job upto June this year. I left my job due to my personal problems.

I am here for asking to buy a cup of coffe for me. I did a big mistake in my life which i am not able to disclose. Presently i am in a very bad financial situation to lead my life. To start over normal life i need minimum of USD 2000. If you can pick me up with your generous help I will be greatfull to you and pray for you and your family enrichment. At present i can't do more than this.

If you feel any kindnees on me please donate and help me to donate others.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Make a contribution by clicking the CONTRIBUTE NOW button above or Share my IndieGogo campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, phone calls, text messages and through good old-fashioned conversations.

PERK

Personal Thank you letter

I will send a personal thanking you letter who donates $10 and above. I will write in detail how you helped me. Please leave your address, Let me tell my gratitude in my own hand writing.

You are not only helping me , it will strengthen a family


Thank you in advance
Basanthi

story:
I quickly grew tired of having to scour the earth every month in search of feminine products that would give me a piece of mind. I  decided to start my own venture based on the products that I needed, along with a business model and variations that would be beneficial for all women thus leading to the idea of "The Femly Box". Femly, short for "feminine" was the hipster verbiage I used to identify products that were specifically for females including feminine hygiene items and body care. With our subscription  model, The Femly Box subscribers will receive their products on a monthly basis, along with natural skin/body care items that are made and selected by the Femly team. There are three subscriptions options that provide boxes that strictly include  menstrual items and are budget friendly, to subscriptions that also include other feminine/body-care items. Your pledge will support manufacturing costs, design fees and other handmade items that will be included each month. We appreciate your support, and hope you'll spread the word and pledge your support! 

Arion L

story:
Your wang appearing small in your d*ck picks? Well, better than a banana; it's a d.Ruler!  What magic is this you ask?  Well, we took at 12 inch ruler and shortened it to 8 inches but made it still appear like a normal 12 inch ruler.

In other words, if you stand tall at 6 inches. You will no longer! You are now a mighty 9 inches! Everything you measure will be 1.5X as big.

Spawned while drinking at a engagement party and only followed through because I was dared to. It is now your chance to help fulfill this drunken dream while humiliating and shaming me for my unusual craftiness.

The final product will look and feel like a standard balsa wood ruler with some small legal disclaimers etched in, otherwise it will appear to be normal.

Thanks for making me do this, buddy.

story:
Our Story

Our dream is to build a sports performance gym that focuses on mental strength and mental health as much as it does on physical performance. Athletes will come to us whether they are completely healthy and looking for just physical training or have a mental illness and need mental health treatment. We anticipate that most athletes will come to us for both. Every athlete can benefit from improving their focus and stress management. Olympic athletes and World Cup champions use many of the techniques we will be using such as neurofeedback and meditation. 

We will be partnering with a Sports Psychologist. Once we are established, we will have one on staff.

First, we plan on changing the stigma in our own community. We then plan on expanding to locations across the country. We will consider it a huge step when we are so successful that other sports performance gyms are forced to adopt mental strength and mental health services to stay competitive.


What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $35,000 through this campaign to start us on our journey to opening this gym. 

The money raised will go towards gym equipment, a cryotherapy machine, neurofeedback equipment and hiring an amazing staff of trainers and experts in the mental health field for our seminars. 

You will receive perks that include meal plans and workout plans, a ticket to our opening night party and different packages of personal training when the gym opens. You don't have to be an athlete to train here! Your personal training sessions will be tailored to your specific goals.


The Impact

It won't happen overnight, but when we are successful in removing the stigma on mental disorders, the world will be a better place, People with mental disorders will get the treatment they need and will feel more comfortable having a condition they did not choose to have.

On a much smaller scale, individuals in our community will have a comfortable place to improve physically and mentally.


Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand if you cannot afford to donate, but you can still help us out! 

You can share this campaign with everyone on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and LinkedIn. 

Also, there is so much you can do in your own community to help end the stigma on mental disorders. Even just doing your own research to change the way you view mental disorders makes a huge difference!

story:
Summary

There are athletes all around you. It’s time to meet them.

This journey was born from a conversation between a personal trainer turned Marine Corps Infantry Officer, and a nerd turned Marine Corps Intelligence Officer. Fed up with the difficulties in finding workout partners, and intimately familiar with the benefits of having one, Captain Floyd and Captain Hennessey did what Marines always do: they solved the problem.

Introducing TeamMate, a free, user-friendly app that helps you discover the fitness community around you. TeamMate connects athletes at all skill levels without relying on chance encounters within the confines of a traditional gym. After all, there are athletes and wannabe athletes all around us! It’s time to meet them, and together, we can create a huge and dynamic community of fitness enthusiasts. TeamMate will help us find each other, making it easy for athletes at all levels to try new routines, new gyms and new personal trainers alongside new workout partners and new friends.  

This is a game changer, and the missing link in fitness technology. As our dynamic, health-positive network grows, TeamMate will make it exponentially more awesome by adding new features, interacting with the traditional health and fitness industry in new and exciting ways, and integrating with other fitness technology applications and devices.  

Not having a workout partner is a bummer, and it’s one of the primary reasons that people don’t workout. Society has demonstrated a desire to solve health and fitness problems with technology-based solutions, and TeamMate has arrived to banish the “I don’t have anyone to train with” excuse forever. Alone, we struggle... Together, we achieve.

 

Watch Walter go from zero to hero with the help of a TeamMate!

 
 

Benefits of Using TeamMate

For starters, you can finally delete that stupid dating app… for good this time.

✓    It’s fun to swipe! And fun to meet new people!
✓    Build diverse and awesome fitness networks locally, in cities you’ll be visiting, or both
✓    Find awesome athletic facilities and gyms near you and your TeamMate
✓    Create new friendships with motivated people who don’t want to sit on the couch!
✓    Accountability between you and your TeamMates
✓    Meet people who will introduce you to new sports and workouts that you wouldn’t attempt on your own
✓    Develop a simpler relationship with the overwhelming and complicated health and fitness industry

 
 

How Does TeamMate Work?

Our grunt-proof (simple) app can be mastered in less than 5 minutes

Using TeamMate is easy and intuitive. You create a profile with a few pictures, basic personal information and workout preferences. TeamMate uses an advanced algorithm to show you others who are nearby and who share similar athletic interests and goals. Each user has the opportunity to review the other's profile. If a mutual “like” is found, users will then be able to “Team Up” and message each other directly to set up a workout.

TeamMate also features a GymFinder to locate gyms and athletic facilities in close proximity to matched users. While we expect many users will continue to use commercial gyms and fitness facilities, TeamMate opens the door to so much more than that. The after-work athlete with an underutilized garage gym can connect with someone ten minutes down the road to help him dust off the dumbbells.

Everyone from the new mom looking for a walking-buddy to the freshman college kid in a new city looking for a Saturday morning kayaking partner can benefit from TeamMate, as the platform is able to connect users at every fitness level to other people with similar goals or interests. You can find sparring partners, dog-walking friends, powerlifting spotters, running buddies… the possibilities are endless!

 

 

TeamMate PLUS

TeamMate PLUS provides a premium capability with extra features.

We can’t tell you every feature that TeamMate PLUS will have yet, but we’ll tell you this much: TeamMate PLUS will allow you to set your location wherever you’d like so that you can build fitness partnerships remotely! TeamMate PLUS allows for the most robust TeamMate experience and will be the optimal tool for building fitness-based relationships. PLUS will also be in a state of constant evolution, as we continuously upgrade the platform to maintain an optimal networking environment.   

 

 

TeamMate PRO

TeamMate PRO provides a premium fitness / health / sports industry networking capability.

TeamMate PRO is designed for fitness professionals and serious athletes. PRO will realign the relationship between fitness professionals and their clients, as well as provide a new industry standard in networking for serious athletes.

Fitness Professionals will have unprecedented access to their potential wider client-base, as TeamMate creates an environment in which these two audiences have exposure to each other. Serious athletes, upon verification, will have the ability to directly network with each other so that they can find the training partners that will push them past their limits.  

The fitness industry is full of middlemen and inefficiencies, and it’s due for a makeover. TeamMate PRO puts the power back in the hands of fitness professionals and serious athletes.    

 

Who Needs a TeamMate?

Basically… Everyone.

The intention of TeamMate is to break down barriers and create a broad community of athletes from all different backgrounds. TeamMate’s “ideal user” is YOU. Everyone deserves a workout partner, and we are dedicated to simplifying that process by connecting athletes through simple yet transformative technology. 

And what’s stopping us? We are on the right side of history here. About one-fifth of all smartphone users already have at least one health-related app on their phones, and fitness, activity, and sports trackers currently make up over half of the global wearables market with 61 million users valued at $3.8 billion. By 2020, these numbers are projected to triple to something around 180-190 million users. So what does that mean? It means that the core of the digital fitness industry is enormous, and growing rapidly. TeamMate is arriving at the tipping-point where people are increasingly in the habit of using technology to enhance their fitness experience.  

Furthermore, people are increasingly using mobile apps to meet other people. The use of online dating sites or mobile apps by young adults has nearly tripled from 2013, and usage by users aged 55-64 has doubled. 15% of American adults in 2016 report that they have used online dating sites and/or mobile apps, up from 11% who reported doing so in early 2013. Those numbers are also expected to rapidly and steadily increase. Why is this transformative technology so far limited to the dating world? It doesn’t have to be!

TeamMate combines the concepts of technology, fitness, health, and social discovery to allow users to come together to reach their fitness goals and form lasting friendships. It’s kind of a no-brainer.

 

Testimony

Donate to Tier 4 or higher, send us a headshot, and your Testimony will be featured here!

“We all have those days when the last thing we want to do is go to the gym to get that workout in, or go out for that long run, but when you have someone else there counting on you to show up, you show up. Having that accountability keeps me motivated and never missing my workout”
- Michelle

“A lot of people, when they first get into wanting to workout, they find it to be both an encouraging and a discouraging time. Finding people to workout with keeps people on track, and keeps them accountable. If TeamMate is connecting people like that, then it’s a huge, powerful tool.”
- Michael

“For years I’ve been in the gym looking for workout partners, and there’s no easy way to find them. If an app can make that process easier, I would use it, and I know that a bunch of my friends around the country would too.”
- M’lis


“Having a tool like TeamMate, so that I can find training partners in my city that might be available for boxing, I think that’s an amazing idea. Having good teammates by your side is absolutely crucial.”
- Will

“As a professional trainer, if I can upload my credentials and certifications to TeamMate, and then use the app to find new clients, then… wow. That’s really cool!”
- Arista

 

What About the Fitness Industry?

It’s time for an upgrade.

There are over 34,000 membership-based exercise facilities in the US, and those facilities, as well as the fitness instructors and personal trainers who are the real driving force in the success of the fitness industry, are all vying through separate channels for your attention. That’s a crazy inefficiency, right? 

Yeah, we think so too. The fitness industry needs to come together. Artificial segmentation has made it difficult for people to take advantage of the countless athletic opportunities around them. TeamMate will refresh this entire system by becoming the fitness world’s primary social networking hub. In doing so, we will connect the fitness industry to the public in a way that is equitable, transparent, optimal, and above all, simple for all parties. The fitness industry needs to join the rest of us in the 21st century, and TeamMate is the upgrade needed.

 

Who We Are

… just two overly-caffeinated Marines solving a problem.


                 

“I’m a former Active Duty Marine Corps Intelligence Officer and the COO of TeamMate. With a focus towards analysis and planning, I work to ensure that our relentless drive is tempered by a well thought out data driven plan, and that we are ready to capitalize on all opportunities as they come.

When it comes to my personal fitness routine, I prefer CrossFit. My ultimate goal is to have a lot of different workout activities that I can continue throughout life to stay active and healthy. In the gym, I am a bit of a workout chameleon, adapting to the workout style and drive of my partner and the surrounding environment. I am competition-driven and always prefer to workout with a partner; it keeps me on point. I want a TeamMate to surf or snowboard with, although I am a little rusty, so don’t expect too much from me if the waves are too big. I am also always looking for a good game of soccer. It’s also great to have a group to share in the misery of the WOD.

I find it difficult to find workout partners and even when I do, someone who is a great running partner may not be the best spotter. So I need TeamMates of all kinds, to work with me in different areas of fitness. Donate today and help us to bring TeamMate to the world so that we can all discover the fitness community around us!"
-        Ryan

“I’m the grunt, and as the CEO of TeamMate, I bring an infantryman’s leadership philosophy to the team. This is a no-BS way of doing business that is oriented around the principle of servant leadership, combined with a relentless drive to execute and an obsession with mission completion.

The same warrior-like mentality that drives me in the workplace, and in the Corps, also drives me in the gym. I like to train hard... and I need a few TeamMates. I need a swimming-partner for lap swimming, especially for long distance underwater crossovers, which can be dangerous to do alone. I need TeamMate for when I travel, so that I can quickly find hiking partners and fellow mountainbikers that know the local trails. I need TeamMate for Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu sparring partners that live in my area, so that I can finally break out my mats that are just sitting upstairs collecting dust. I need boxers in my weight category, a surfing partner / coach (I suck at surfing), and a spotter at the gym for when I want to max out.

I’m creating a solution to a problem that is very real to me. I know there are others out there like me, who are looking for an easy way to find training partners and are stunned to discover that, despite all of our wonderful advances in technology… THERE IS NO EASY WAY TO FIND A WORKOUT PARTNER! That is insane to me! Donate to this campaign so that we can FIX THIS PROBLEM FOR GOOD. Users in Northern California, Southern California, Central Texas and South Texas: you will see me on TeamMate. We will match. And we will crush it together.

… but we can’t build this community without you. Thank you for backing our Indiegogo campaign, but I’m not done with you yet... I want more. Stick with us. Download TeamMate and use it. Be a part of our movement!”
-     Kristopher   

The Impact

TeamMate will bring us together.

We envision a future in which workout partners are a swipe or two away. TeamMate’s dynamic community of fitness enthusiasts will have the ability to easily connect to share fitness activities, making it easy for athletes at all levels to try new routines, new gyms, and new personal trainers alongside new workout partners and new friends.

This community needs a jumpstart! Your contribution will fund our national launch campaign. Our beta is in the App Store, and as a contributor, you will have the opportunity to test the beta and offer your feedback, thus helping shape the final version of TeamMate. 



 

Other Ways You Can Help

… just because you can’t contribute $$$, doesn’t mean you can’t help!

  • Follow us on social media and share this campaign with your friends and followers!
  • Make some noise about our campaign at the gym, at work, at school… anywhere!
  • Join the TeamMate mailing list and stay connected for news and updates!
  • Download TeamMate from the App Store by CLICKING HERE and help us test the app!
story_txt:
SummaryThere are athletes all around you. It’s time to meet them.This journey was born from a conversation between a personal trainer turned Marine Corps Infantry Officer, and a nerd turned Marine Corps Intelligence Officer. Fed up with the difficulties in finding workout partners, and intimately familiar with the benefits of having one, Captain Floyd and Captain Hennessey did what Marines always do: they solved the problem.Introducing TeamMate, a free, user-friendly app that helps you discover the fitness community around you. TeamMate connects athletes at all skill levels without relying on chance encounters within the confines of a traditional gym. After all, there are athletes and wannabe athletes all around us! It’s time to meet them, and together, we can create a huge and dynamic community of fitness enthusiasts. TeamMate will help us find each other, making it easy for athletes at all levels to try new routines, new gyms and new personal trainers alongside new workout partners and new friends.  This is a game changer, and the missing link in fitness technology. As our dynamic, health-positive network grows, TeamMate will make it exponentially more awesome by adding new features, interacting with the traditional health and fitness industry in new and exciting ways, and integrating with other fitness technology applications and devices.  Not having a workout partner is a bummer, and it’s one of the primary reasons that people don’t workout. Society has demonstrated a desire to solve health and fitness problems with technology-based solutions, and TeamMate has arrived to banish the “I don’t have anyone to train with” excuse forever. Alone, we struggle... Together, we achieve. Watch Walter go from zero to hero with the help of a TeamMate!  Benefits of Using TeamMateFor starters, you can finally delete that stupid dating app… for good this time.✓    It’s fun to swipe! And fun to meet new people!✓    Build diverse and awesome fitness networks locally, in cities you’ll be visiting, or both✓    Find awesome athletic facilities and gyms near you and your TeamMate✓    Create new friendships with motivated people who don’t want to sit on the couch!✓    Accountability between you and your TeamMates✓    Meet people who will introduce you to new sports and workouts that you wouldn’t attempt on your own✓    Develop a simpler relationship with the overwhelming and complicated health and fitness industry  How Does TeamMate Work?Our grunt-proof (simple) app can be mastered in less than 5 minutesUsing TeamMate is easy and intuitive. You create a profile with a few pictures, basic personal information and workout preferences. TeamMate uses an advanced algorithm to show you others who are nearby and who share similar athletic interests and goals. Each user has the opportunity to review the other's profile. If a mutual “like” is found, users will then be able to “Team Up” and message each other directly to set up a workout.TeamMate also features a GymFinder to locate gyms and athletic facilities in close proximity to matched users. While we expect many users will continue to use commercial gyms and fitness facilities, TeamMate opens the door to so much more than that. The after-work athlete with an underutilized garage gym can connect with someone ten minutes down the road to help him dust off the dumbbells.Everyone from the new mom looking for a walking-buddy to the freshman college kid in a new city looking for a Saturday morning kayaking partner can benefit from TeamMate, as the platform is able to connect users at every fitness level to other people with similar goals or interests. You can find sparring partners, dog-walking friends, powerlifting spotters, running buddies… the possibilities are endless!  TeamMate PLUSTeamMate PLUS provides a premium capability with extra features.We can’t tell you every feature that TeamMate PLUS will have yet, but we’ll tell you this much: TeamMate PLUS will allow you to set your location wherever you’d like so that you can build fitness partnerships remotely! TeamMate PLUS allows for the most robust TeamMate experience and will be the optimal tool for building fitness-based relationships. PLUS will also be in a state of constant evolution, as we continuously upgrade the platform to maintain an optimal networking environment.     TeamMate PROTeamMate PRO provides a premium fitness / health / sports industry networking capability.TeamMate PRO is designed for fitness professionals and serious athletes. PRO will realign the relationship between fitness professionals and their clients, as well as provide a new industry standard in networking for serious athletes.Fitness Professionals will have unprecedented access to their potential wider client-base, as TeamMate creates an environment in which these two audiences have exposure to each other. Serious athletes, upon verification, will have the ability to directly network with each other so that they can find the training partners that will push them past their limits.  The fitness industry is full of middlemen and inefficiencies, and it’s due for a makeover. TeamMate PRO puts the power back in the hands of fitness professionals and serious athletes.     Who Needs a TeamMate?Basically… Everyone.The intention of TeamMate is to break down barriers and create a broad community of athletes from all different backgrounds. TeamMate’s “ideal user” is YOU. Everyone deserves a workout partner, and we are dedicated to simplifying that process by connecting athletes through simple yet transformative technology. And what’s stopping us? We are on the right side of history here. About one-fifth of all smartphone users already have at least one health-related app on their phones, and fitness, activity, and sports trackers currently make up over half of the global wearables market with 61 million users valued at $3.8 billion. By 2020, these numbers are projected to triple to something around 180-190 million users. So what does that mean? It means that the core of the digital fitness industry is enormous, and growing rapidly. TeamMate is arriving at the tipping-point where people are increasingly in the habit of using technology to enhance their fitness experience.  Furthermore, people are increasingly using mobile apps to meet other people. The use of online dating sites or mobile apps by young adults has nearly tripled from 2013, and usage by users aged 55-64 has doubled. 15% of American adults in 2016 report that they have used online dating sites and/or mobile apps, up from 11% who reported doing so in early 2013. Those numbers are also expected to rapidly and steadily increase. Why is this transformative technology so far limited to the dating world? It doesn’t have to be!TeamMate combines the concepts of technology, fitness, health, and social discovery to allow users to come together to reach their fitness goals and form lasting friendships. It’s kind of a no-brainer. TestimonyDonate to Tier 4 or higher, send us a headshot, and your Testimony will be featured here!“We all have those days when the last thing we want to do is go to the gym to get that workout in, or go out for that long run, but when you have someone else there counting on you to show up, you show up. Having that accountability keeps me motivated and never missing my workout”- Michelle“A lot of people, when they first get into wanting to workout, they find it to be both an encouraging and a discouraging time. Finding people to workout with keeps people on track, and keeps them accountable. If TeamMate is connecting people like that, then it’s a huge, powerful tool.”- Michael“For years I’ve been in the gym looking for workout partners, and there’s no easy way to find them. If an app can make that process easier, I would use it, and I know that a bunch of my friends around the country would too.”- M’lis“Having a tool like TeamMate, so that I can find training partners in my city that might be available for boxing, I think that’s an amazing idea. Having good teammates by your side is absolutely crucial.”- Will“As a professional trainer, if I can upload my credentials and certifications to TeamMate, and then use the app to find new clients, then… wow. That’s really cool!”- Arista What About the Fitness Industry?It’s time for an upgrade.There are over 34,000 membership-based exercise facilities in the US, and those facilities, as well as the fitness instructors and personal trainers who are the real driving force in the success of the fitness industry, are all vying through separate channels for your attention. That’s a crazy inefficiency, right? Yeah, we think so too. The fitness industry needs to come together. Artificial segmentation has made it difficult for people to take advantage of the countless athletic opportunities around them. TeamMate will refresh this entire system by becoming the fitness world’s primary social networking hub. In doing so, we will connect the fitness industry to the public in a way that is equitable, transparent, optimal, and above all, simple for all parties. The fitness industry needs to join the rest of us in the 21st century, and TeamMate is the upgrade needed. Who We Are… just two overly-caffeinated Marines solving a problem.                 “I’m a former Active Duty Marine Corps Intelligence Officer and the COO of TeamMate. With a focus towards analysis and planning, I work to ensure that our relentless drive is tempered by a well thought out data driven plan, and that we are ready to capitalize on all opportunities as they come.When it comes to my personal fitness routine, I prefer CrossFit. My ultimate goal is to have a lot of different workout activities that I can continue throughout life to stay active and healthy. In the gym, I am a bit of a workout chameleon, adapting to the workout style and drive of my partner and the surrounding environment. I am competition-driven and always prefer to workout with a partner; it keeps me on point. I want a TeamMate to surf or snowboard with, although I am a little rusty, so don’t expect too much from me if the waves are too big. I am also always looking for a good game of soccer. It’s also great to have a group to share in the misery of the WOD.I find it difficult to find workout partners and even when I do, someone who is a great running partner may not be the best spotter. So I need TeamMates of all kinds, to work with me in different areas of fitness. Donate today and help us to bring TeamMate to the world so that we can all discover the fitness community around us!"-        Ryan“I’m the grunt, and as the CEO of TeamMate, I bring an infantryman’s leadership philosophy to the team. This is a no-BS way of doing business that is oriented around the principle of servant leadership, combined with a relentless drive to execute and an obsession with mission completion.The same warrior-like mentality that drives me in the workplace, and in the Corps, also drives me in the gym. I like to train hard... and I need a few TeamMates. I need a swimming-partner for lap swimming, especially for long distance underwater crossovers, which can be dangerous to do alone. I need TeamMate for when I travel, so that I can quickly find hiking partners and fellow mountainbikers that know the local trails. I need TeamMate for Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu sparring partners that live in my area, so that I can finally break out my mats that are just sitting upstairs collecting dust. I need boxers in my weight category, a surfing partner / coach (I suck at surfing), and a spotter at the gym for when I want to max out.I’m creating a solution to a problem that is very real to me. I know there are others out there like me, who are looking for an easy way to find training partners and are stunned to discover that, despite all of our wonderful advances in technology… THERE IS NO EASY WAY TO FIND A WORKOUT PARTNER! That is insane to me! Donate to this campaign so that we can FIX THIS PROBLEM FOR GOOD. Users in Northern California, Southern California, Central Texas and South Texas: you will see me on TeamMate. We will match. And we will crush it together.… but we can’t build this community without you. Thank you for backing our Indiegogo campaign, but I’m not done with you yet... I want more. Stick with us. Download TeamMate and use it. Be a part of our movement!”-     Kristopher   The ImpactTeamMate will bring us together.We envision a future in which workout partners are a swipe or two away. TeamMate’s dynamic community of fitness enthusiasts will have the ability to easily connect to share fitness activities, making it easy for athletes at all levels to try new routines, new gyms, and new personal trainers alongside new workout partners and new friends.This community needs a jumpstart! Your contribution will fund our national launch campaign. Our beta is in the App Store, and as a contributor, you will have the opportunity to test the beta and offer your feedback, thus helping shape the final version of TeamMate.  Other Ways You Can Help… just because you can’t contribute $$$, doesn’t mean you can’t help!
Follow us on social media and share this campaign with your friends and followers!
Make some noise about our campaign at the gym, at work, at school… anywhere!
Join the TeamMate mailing list and stay connected for news and updates!
Download TeamMate from the App Store by CLICKING HERE and help us test the app!

story:
I have decided to reinvent an innovative therapy spa for pediatric and young adult patients with physical disabilities. Family's of children with disability's may experience strong emotional loss, sadness and worries about their child's ability to cope with the frustration and isolation due to their illness. Minta's Unique Ones Spa, will provide a great service in building our clients self esteem by provided a place where they can feel beautiful, relaxed and stimulated, while interacting and building relationships with their peers experiencing similar barriers due to their disability. We at Minta's Unique Ones spa, are reinventing child therapy by providing the highest quality equipment with  personnel  who are experienced and committed to quality service with our company. Our approach would be to enhance our clients strengths and alleviate their overwhelming difficulties they may face on a daily basis. The program is tailored specifically to the needs of children with mild to severe developmental disabilities, as well as chronic diseases.

   Minta’s Unique One’s Day Spa would be a new upscale children's spa designated to be located in the heart of Atlanta where there is a high and rising rate of children living with various disabilities, such as Cancer of various types; Autism, Multiple scoliosis, Down syndrome along with many physical and mental disabilities. Minta’s Unique One’s will be offering a complete day spa experience for those unique children in and around our community ages 1-18. We will offer four ultra- therapeutic, ultra-comfortable treatment rooms, as well as a salon and an exclusive children’s store where we sell the finest and cutest children’s products. Minta’s Unique One’s will feature children’s; Disney spa linens such as the popular Mickey and Minnie mouse bathrobes, slippers, toy story, cars, the princess and the frog to name a few that have been considered for the spa décor and equipment. Our spa section will offer massages in a variety of styles - traditional Swedish massage, Deep Tissue work, Hot Stone Massage, and Reflexology as part of our therapy. Pedicure’s, manicures, flavored facials, done with organic products that contain essence oils for healthy and revitalized skin will also be offered within our salon area. Minta’s Unique One’s will focus on body treatments, such as mud baths, music therapy; incorporated with aquatic therapy, which will be one of our main focuses at our business. Aquatic therapy offers a variety of benefits to your child including improvements in: mobility, coordination, strength, endurance, balance and self-confidence. These benefits are achieved through exciting water games and activities. The program allows your child to have fun while accomplishing important therapeutic goals in individual and group settings.

 

The first challenge I would have, would be finding an suitable location for my business, a place that would attract the most appropriate clientele, while challenging new contenders within my chosen industry. Another challenge could possibly be acquiring the needed supplies and equipment, to over come this barrier would be to maybe rent or except donations just until I would be able to invest in equipment and supplies that will provide a competitive advantage for my competitors to match. In addition my last possible barrier would be existing loyalty from consumers working with our competitors, overcoming this challenge I will provide special services that is unique and open to the public as well as special incentives or price reduction during open event and holidays.
