story:
MS Connect is a mobile app striving to create an organized and centralized platform for coordinating MS care.  We are creating an app specifically designed to improve the quality of care for patients with Multiple Sclerosis.  The MS Connect App will provide patients with an easy way to stay connected with their health & disease information, while providing physicians with a multifaceted, holistic view of a patient's disease progression. MS Connect will directly link with a patient's existing medical records, and organize the data in an easy to read snapshot of a patient's disease, allowing for more personalized care for patients with MS. Here are is our initial design and layout!




Multiple Sclerosis affects approximately 400,000 people in the United States, and although research efforts continue to expand, we currently do not have a cure. This means that managing a patient's disease and improving quality of life are some of the most important aspects of treating Multiple Sclerosis. However, MS can present differently in each patient, across a wide range of symptoms and severity, making each patient's disease and treatment plan unique. Because of this variability, understanding the many aspects of MS, and monitoring trends in a patient's disease are extremely important, but also very difficult. Through the use of an app such as MS Connect, patients and physicians would be able to effectively and efficiently monitor all aspects of each patient's unique disease status, and provide a more personalized treatment plan. A more holistic and personalized plan could not only enhance patients' lives, but potentially decrease relapse occurrence and keep the disease from progressing. 

This app will help the hundreds of thousands of people suffering from MS. It will change how doctors and clinics care for patients with MS. MS Connect will change the lives of all the many friends and family members who are affected by a loved one struggling to manage their disease. This app will change the way we manage and treat Multiple Sclerosis. Here are just a few of the brave patients who are joining our fight!!






Please join me, Dr. Picone, as we take on MS!

MSConnectApp.com
story_txt:
MS Connect is a mobile app striving to create an organized and centralized platform for coordinating MS care.  We are creating an app specifically designed to improve the quality of care for patients with Multiple Sclerosis.  The MS Connect App will provide patients with an easy way to stay connected with their health & disease information, while providing physicians with a multifaceted, holistic view of a patient's disease progression. MS Connect will directly link with a patient's existing medical records, and organize the data in an easy to read snapshot of a patient's disease, allowing for more personalized care for patients with MS. Here are is our initial design and layout!















Multiple Sclerosis affects approximately 400,000 people in the United States, and although research efforts continue to expand, we currently do not have a cure. This means that managing a patient's disease and improving quality of life are some of the most important aspects of treating Multiple Sclerosis. However, MS can present differently in each patient, across a wide range of symptoms and severity, making each patient's disease and treatment plan unique. Because of this variability, understanding the many aspects of MS, and monitoring trends in a patient's disease are extremely important, but also very difficult. Through the use of an app such as MS Connect, patients and physicians would be able to effectively and efficiently monitor all aspects of each patient's unique disease status, and provide a more personalized treatment plan. A more holistic and personalized plan could not only enhance patients' lives, but potentially decrease relapse occurrence and keep the disease from progressing. 



This app will help the hundreds of thousands of people suffering from MS. It will change how doctors and clinics care for patients with MS. MS Connect will change the lives of all the many friends and family members who are affected by a loved one struggling to manage their disease. This app will change the way we manage and treat Multiple Sclerosis. Here are just a few of the brave patients who are joining our fight!!






























Please join me, Dr. Picone, as we take on MS!
MSConnectApp.com

story:
We’re Harm Reduction Coalition, and we need your help.

For over twenty years, we’ve supported syringe access programs through trainings, conferences, technical assistance, and advocacy. Communities struggling with the harms of drug injection – overdose, HIV, hepatitis C, and other health problems – reach out to us when they need guidance and support.

This year we’re helping new syringe access programs start up in places like Kentucky and West Virginia, which have never had programs before. But in too many places, syringe access programs are too controversial. Over one-third of the country doesn’t have any syringe access programs. We have to get the word out that syringe access works, and we need syringe access now.

That’s where you come in: help us kick off a new campaign to spread the word and expand syringe access. We’re planning a social media campaign that raises the voices of people who care about syringe access – people who care about those struggling with drug use. People like you.

We’re in the midst of a new heroin crisis. Hundreds of thousands of people across the country are injecting drugs, and too many of them don’t have a syringe access program nearby. The stakes have never been higher, and the opportunities for expanding syringe access have never been greater. We can end the heroin crisis and save lives – through hope, compassion and harm reduction. That means sharing a simple message: Syringe access now, syringe access everywhere!

How We’ll Do It

Syringe Access Saves Lives will be an online campaign using words and images to advocate for syringe access programs in the places that need them most. In September, we’ll bring the talented photographers from Luceo to the United States Conference on AIDS. They’ll photograph conference attendees and capture – in their own words – why their communities should support syringe access programs. These words and images will be the foundation for a national awareness and education campaign, reaching policymakers, health officials, and the general public to support grassroots advocacy for syringe access. The funds that you donate will directly support the costs of developing and producing the Syringe Access Saves Lives campaign.



Why We’re Doing It

We’re doing this project to engage new audiences, lift up diverse voices, and find more allies in our fight for syringe access coverage across the United States. This is a pivotal time for syringe access: more heroin and more injection drug use have led to more hepatitis C infections and more overdose deaths. An HIV outbreak in Indiana, driven by injection of prescription painkillers, has catapulted syringe access back into the headlines. Even Congress and the White House are now paying attention! We need to seize this momentum, make some lasting changes, and help communities get syringe access.

We’ve worked with Luceo before – check out their harm reduction portraits series, which were exhibited at a major global drug policy meeting at the United Nations. We're excited and think this campaign will really make some noise.

How You Can Help

Get started now by making a contribution and spreading the word! We’ve got some great harm reduction perks for you, to show our gratitude for your generosity.

And please let your friends, family and colleagues know about our fundraising campaign! We need a lot of support and good will to make this happen. Together, we can make great things happen!

For information for tax purposes please contact: poellot@harmreduction.org

story:
One Dollar, One Mile.

My name is Sean Baird and I'm a man who wants to make people smile. 

Far too many people that I know and love have been sexually assaulted, and it's a problem for which there is no simple solution.  As a junior at American University, I was baffled trying to figure out what I could do to help bring an end to such an overwhelming problem.  That's how I came up with the Sprint for Smiles campaign.

For every dollar my campaign earns, I will run one mile in my Sprint for Smiles teeshirt.  More importantly, every dollar donated to my campaign will go directly to organizations supporting survivors of sexual assault. 


How it Works

Every single dollar you donate to this campaign will go straight to organizations dedicating themselves to ending sexual assault.  Nothing will go to me.  Every cost associated with this campaign, including shipping, will come from my pocket, not yours. 

For each dollar donated, I will also run one mile in my Sprint for Smiles teeshirt to raise awareness in my community.

Every donation helps put a smile on someone's face, and every dollar is appreciated.  Even if you can only donate a dollar, you're still helping my campaign hit the ground running.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute for any reason at all, you shouldn't ever feel bad!

Follow me on Twitter @sprintforsmiles, and please help me to raise funds and awareness by spreading the word about this campaign on any form of social media.

Together, we can change things.  Thank you for considering donating to my campaign.

story:
Cellulite affects 9 out of 10 women

It is resistant to almost any kind of known treatment. Inflammation of skin fat cells creates the effect known as orange skin. Neither physical exercise, strict domestic diets nor domestic treatments are enough to get rid of cellulite.

Get it now and SAVE money on the expensive Professional treatments!

 

Tired of cellulite? Change your life at a touch of a button!

 

  • We created Glo910, the anti-cellulite massager that will revolution women’s life!
  • Glo910 smooths cellulite, tightens the skin and re-sculpts the body with its powerful engine and  patented SLIM tech™  (Infrared Led Sculpturing Massage) which joins mechanical massage+IR+red LED.
  • NASA studies have found that LED therapy accelerates skin renewal by 200%, significantly improving the appearance of the skin. This has been the basis of our research and how this technology will benefit the treatment of the cellulite.  

     

  • Glo910 attacks directly the reasons that cause the development of cellulite.
  • Thanks to its powerful engine, it is the only home use device able to destroy fat nodules and stimulate circulation, bringing elasticity back to your skin.

 

  • Glo910 strengthens lipo-massage action thanks to photo energy which penetrates into different skin layers destroying fat nodules and activating collagen production.
  • At home, 15 to 20 minutes a day are enough to get visible results in a few weeks.
  • Also a great solution for pain relief on your back if suffering from lumbago or sciatica

 

 

                              

 

HOW Glo910 combats cellulite? watch video

Using the patented SLIM Tech™, Glo910 joins mechanical massage with photon technology with IR (infrared) and red LED. Each of these light sources with different wavelengths which penetrate into the skin in different depths.

Glo910 has 4 Interchangeable Heads

 

CELLU-ACTIVE

 

 

is ideal for helping to remove cellulite and sagging, stimulate blood flow and return, tone muscles, perform lymphatic drainage, reduce volume, relieve back, sciatica and lumbago pain, muscle relaxation and prewarming, etc. It allows specifically treating abdominal fat to achieve a flat belly effect, thinner waistline and firmer skin.
 CELLU-DETOX 

Actively stimulates draining and smooths aqueous cellulite. This head is suitable for use with creams and oils, multiplying its results. It can be used for relaxing massages and specific treatments, increasing the penetration rate of these products. is indicated for Athletes as a treatment prior to strenuous exercise, avoiding injuries by pre-warming the muscles to exercise.

 LIFTING-CLEAN

Head with soft-foam, flat-surfaced small cylinders, ideal for gentle scrubbing of the skin (facial cleaning), facial massages (lifting), neck (jowl), cervical and breast firming. In general, for soft and delicate areas, relaxing massages and relief of discomfort in legs with varicose veins. Gently scrubs face and neck area making the skin light and reaffirmed.
 BODY-BRUSH
New body scrub head with soft, thin and flexible natural fibre bristles that exert pressure on the body, removing dead cells and impurities to make healthy skin emerge to the surface. The skin regains its youthful, radiant and luminous tone.
 

Glo910 for All Budgets

 

 

Medical Protocols developed with Kursal Medical Beauty Clinic in Spain

 

Drain Medical PROTOCOL

 

Lipo-Reduction Medical PROTOCOL

 


Exfoliation Medical PROTOCOL

GIFTS: luxury bags to take your Glo910 everywhere you want!

 

 

 

See Who's Talking About Glo910

 

WHY Glo910? www.glo910.com

• We want to help all those women who suffer cellulite, affecting  their self-esteem.

• To all those women who cannot afford the expensive professional beauty treatments.

•   To all those women who do not have time to go to a professional salon because between work, family and the house, they do not have a single moment for themselves.

 

 

Design driven product

Designed by Spanish Product Designer Robert Ruiz, who is developing his professional career in Germany, Glo910 has been inspired on women natural beauty curves and in a minimalist concept with the purpose to make it functional and extremely easy using.

 

Perks

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Patents

Due to R&D driven strategy, IP (Intellectual Property) is very important for us so we assigned important part of the project budget to this field.

 

  • Design patent in EU
  • Design patent in China
  • Utility Model patent in China
  • Glo910 brand registration in EU
  • SLIM tech™ registration in EU
  • SLIM tech™ registration in China
 
Project Timing

 

 

 

Technical specifications

18W 50- 60Hz, 100-240V

3m power cord

Components:

 

1 Main body 

2 On/off massage switch

3 On/Off switch with SLIM tech™ technology 

4 Variable massage intensity control

5 Selected massage intensity luminous indicator

6 Placing shaft of the massage rotors

7 Button for extracting and securing the massage heads

 

8 Massage heads (4):

    1. CELLU-ACTIVE 
    2. CELLU-DETOX
    3. CELLU-DETOX
    4. BODY BRUSH 
9 Luxury cosmetic bag
    Warranty:
    2 year warranty

     

    Glo910 team

    We are Global Designers, Engineers and Marketers with large experience in beauty appliances developments. 10 years experience developing OEM/ODM projects in Asia back us. We set up MIXEN Beauty Technologies S.L. with the aim to develop Glo910 as well as  many other beauty solutions for home use.

    Dr. Martin Bleker, Specialist in Clinical Dermatology at "Laser Beauty Institut" in Switzerland, has been our mentor throughout the R & D performed and development of patented SLIM Tech ™.

    On the other hand the genius of Robert Ruiz, our Product Designer has allowed capture minimalism, functionality and simplicity required in Glo910.

     

    FAQ related to glo910

    Can I use it if I am pregnant?

     

     

    Pregnant women can use it on their legs, in fact it is highly recommended, as it prevents cellulite due to fluid retention, typical during pregnancy, from occurring.Obviously, it should not be used on the abdomen during pregnancy or after childbirth for a few months, until fully recovered to its state before pregnancy.

     

     

    Are there any contraindications for the use of infrared?

     

     

    The range’s most fully featured device, the Glo910, uses infrared beams with a wavelength of 640-910 mm that penetrate the skin at different levels, helping to dissolve fat accumulated in the adipocytes as well as stimulating the creation of collagen and blood circulation.These pose no problems whatsoever, it is a perfect complement to mechanical massage, boosting its effects.

     

     

    How soon will I see the results?

    As from the first session you will notice the first results:the treated areas are less bulky, decongested. Your skin is smoother, softer.After 15 sessions, the results are intensified:the orange peel effect has been smoothed out, you outline is re contoured and more toned!

    Who is this device designed for?

     

     

    Women:who, despite diets, have localized fat in specific areas such as hips/thighs or orange peel skin.They can be slim and/or lead a healthy lifestyle, but are still prone to cellulite, localized excesses and flabby skin.In spite of using cosmetics they cannot eliminate the orange peel skin.They want safe, painless results without surgery.They are experiencing intense moments such as puberty, pregnancy or menopause; causing a change in body shape.They want to have firm dense, smooth pretty skin.They like to take care of themselves but do not have the time to go to a beauty salon, undergo expensive treatment using professional machines, or who want to maintain the results achieved with a device that allows daily constant use for a long-term results.

    Men:who have a healthy lifestyle (sport, balanced diet) yet fail to shift stubborn fat.They want to reshape certain parts of their body.

    Athletes:who, due to the intense practice of a sport, suffer muscular stresses, contractures ... To warm up their muscles before an intense sporting activity.

    Pain management

    The toothed head is very useful for the treatment of lower back pain.

     

     

    Does it hurt?

     

     

    Although massage is intense, it does not hurt.On the contrary, both during and after the session you will experience a real sense of wellbeing. If the session does hurt, then this is because the setting is incorrect, which is why it has a massage intensity regulator.

     

     

    Do I have to follow a supplementary diet?

     

     

    Diets rarely allow weight to be shed from the area you want.Unfortunately, cellulite is generally indifferent to diets, even the most stringent.The massage works precisely on these stubborn areas.Ideally, it is best to combine the treatment with a varied balanced diet and regular physical activity (e.g. walk 20-30 min each day, avoid using the lift and walk up the stairs, cycle, swim... in general, a few minutes of moderate aerobic exercise).

     

     

    What does the eliminated fat become?

     

     

    First, the sugars and fats are stored by the adipocytes inside fatty tissue.The massage stimulates lipolysis and, in turn, stimulates the release of fats.These are transformed into a source of «fuel» for the muscles, and are eliminated together with the retained liquid through the urine.This is why the need to urinate is quite frequent after a massage.

     

     

    Why is it advisable to "move about" after a treatment session?

     

     

    For best results, some sports training or a fast walk afterwards can help «burn» off the fat released during the session.

     

     

    Are the results long-lasting?

     

     

    Quickly visible, the results do last, moreover with Glo910 they can easily be maintained as it is always on hand for use.To obtain lasting results consistent use is required, and by devoting about 15 min at least 3 days per week, your skin will look completely different:enhanced outline, smoothed cellulite, toned skin and re-sculpted shaping.

     

     

    Is it a good investment?

     

     

    The recommended fee for a 35 minute aesthetic appliance session at a beauty centre is 90$USD. You will need between 6-10 sessions to see any results, at a cost of $USD540 - $USD900 After which you will need monthly maintenance sessions. With Glo910 you have a home treatment, tailored 100% to your needs, your time, your life style, allowing you to be always perfect, because it can be used for many years. If you decide to invest in the more complete version, you will also enjoy many extra treatments:body scrub, facial scrub, gentle relaxing massage, treatment for contractures, muscle aches ... making it an indispensable device in your home, both for women and men alike.

     

     

    How are the massage heads changed?

     

     

    The Glo910 incorporates a handy system to attach and remove the massage heads.To remove the head, just press the red button in the centre of the head and it is automatically released.To fit it, once the head is inserted onto its retaining shaft, press the red button on the head and it is automatically secured.

     

     
    FAQ related to pre-orders

    Where do we ship?

    We offer FREE SHIPPING to USA, EU and UK. For different destinations please mail us to support@glo910.com

    When will my Glo910 ship?

    glo910 InDemand pre-orders will begin to be fulfilled in the September 2016 time frame on a first-ordered, first-received basis. MIXEN Company Ltd. will keep you notified of your Glo910 ship date.

     

     

    It looks too good to be true. Is this for real? 

    We have an experienced professional team to make Glo910a reality! SLIM tech™ (Sculptouring Led Infrared Massage) combines photo energy with different length waves that penetrate in the skin in different depths. This, together with the mechanical lipo-massage, makes possible to break fat cells and destroying the fat through lymphatic system. With our developer community, we will continue to improve the product and add new and exciting features over time.

     

     

    I preordered a Glo910 but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?

    Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact us at support@glo910.com with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION.

     

    There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

    Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

     

     

    Help us help you!

    We do believe in this project.  Eighteen months ago we left our jobs and we started Glo910 adventure. Because we do have something very clear: we know that unlike the existing home-use products on the market, Glo910 definitely combats cellulite. 

    Glo910 will help thousands of women worldwide to become the best version of themselves. With the funds raised we will cover part of the first order production.

    Think again, because there are many ways you can help us, even without pledging for a product.

    • Share Glo910 with your friends, family, and relatives. Get the word out and be a part of our referral competition.
    • Pledge the supporter perks to get updates, promotions and early access to Glo910 when it arrives.
     
    Risks & Challenges

     There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any hardware product at scale. Fortunately, Glo910 team members have more than 10 years experience developing consumer goods projects in Asia for European and American markets. 

    With European Designed and Engineering, we are industrializing Glo910 in Asia with a high quality and reliable partner with whom we previously developed several beauty projects. Molds already finished, the off-tool samples will be tested at INTERTEK, worldwide Accredited Lab.

    Shipping might be little out of our hands to ensure committed shipping date but we will do it with proven forwarders in order to minimize the risk.

    We are committed to keeping our campaign transparent and will openly communicate with our supporters on our project, as well as any obstacles that might arise.

As from the first session you will notice the first results:the treated areas are less bulky, decongested. Your skin is smoother, softer.After 15 sessions, the results are intensified:the orange peel effect has been smoothed out, you outline is re contoured and more toned!
Who is this device designed for?
 
 
Women:who, despite diets, have localized fat in specific areas such as hips/thighs or orange peel skin.They can be slim and/or lead a healthy lifestyle, but are still prone to cellulite, localized excesses and flabby skin.In spite of using cosmetics they cannot eliminate the orange peel skin.They want safe, painless results without surgery.They are experiencing intense moments such as puberty, pregnancy or menopause; causing a change in body shape.They want to have firm dense, smooth pretty skin.They like to take care of themselves but do not have the time to go to a beauty salon, undergo expensive treatment using professional machines, or who want to maintain the results achieved with a device that allows daily constant use for a long-term results.
Men:who have a healthy lifestyle (sport, balanced diet) yet fail to shift stubborn fat.They want to reshape certain parts of their body.
Athletes:who, due to the intense practice of a sport, suffer muscular stresses, contractures ... To warm up their muscles before an intense sporting activity.
Pain management
The toothed head is very useful for the treatment of lower back pain.
 
 
Does it hurt?
 
 
Although massage is intense, it does not hurt.On the contrary, both during and after the session you will experience a real sense of wellbeing. If the session does hurt, then this is because the setting is incorrect, which is why it has a massage intensity regulator.
 
 
Do I have to follow a supplementary diet?
 
 
Diets rarely allow weight to be shed from the area you want.Unfortunately, cellulite is generally indifferent to diets, even the most stringent.The massage works precisely on these stubborn areas.Ideally, it is best to combine the treatment with a varied balanced diet and regular physical activity (e.g. walk 20-30 min each day, avoid using the lift and walk up the stairs, cycle, swim... in general, a few minutes of moderate aerobic exercise).
 
 
What does the eliminated fat become?
 
 
First, the sugars and fats are stored by the adipocytes inside fatty tissue.The massage stimulates lipolysis and, in turn, stimulates the release of fats.These are transformed into a source of «fuel» for the muscles, and are eliminated together with the retained liquid through the urine.This is why the need to urinate is quite frequent after a massage.
 
 
Why is it advisable to "move about" after a treatment session?
 
 
For best results, some sports training or a fast walk afterwards can help «burn» off the fat released during the session.
 
 
Are the results long-lasting?
 
 
Quickly visible, the results do last, moreover with Glo910 they can easily be maintained as it is always on hand for use.To obtain lasting results consistent use is required, and by devoting about 15 min at least 3 days per week, your skin will look completely different:enhanced outline, smoothed cellulite, toned skin and re-sculpted shaping.
 
 
Is it a good investment?
 
 
The recommended fee for a 35 minute aesthetic appliance session at a beauty centre is 90$USD. You will need between 6-10 sessions to see any results, at a cost of $USD540 - $USD900 After which you will need monthly maintenance sessions. With Glo910 you have a home treatment, tailored 100% to your needs, your time, your life style, allowing you to be always perfect, because it can be used for many years. If you decide to invest in the more complete version, you will also enjoy many extra treatments:body scrub, facial scrub, gentle relaxing massage, treatment for contractures, muscle aches ... making it an indispensable device in your home, both for women and men alike.
 
 
How are the massage heads changed?
 
 
The Glo910 incorporates a handy system to attach and remove the massage heads.To remove the head, just press the red button in the centre of the head and it is automatically released.To fit it, once the head is inserted onto its retaining shaft, press the red button on the head and it is automatically secured.
 

 
FAQ related to pre-orders

Where do we ship?
We offer FREE SHIPPING to USA, EU and UK. For different destinations please mail us to support@glo910.com
When will my Glo910 ship?
glo910 InDemand pre-orders will begin to be fulfilled in the September 2016 time frame on a first-ordered, first-received basis. MIXEN Company Ltd. will keep you notified of your Glo910 ship date.
 
 
It looks too good to be true. Is this for real? We have an experienced professional team to make Glo910a reality! SLIM tech™ (Sculptouring Led Infrared Massage) combines photo energy with different length waves that penetrate in the skin in different depths. This, together with the mechanical lipo-massage, makes possible to break fat cells and destroying the fat through lymphatic system. With our developer community, we will continue to improve the product and add new and exciting features over time. 
 
I preordered a Glo910 but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status? Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact us at support@glo910.com with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION. 
There was an error with my contribution. What happened? Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors. 
 

Help us help you!

We do believe in this project.  Eighteen months ago we left our jobs and we started Glo910 adventure. Because we do have something very clear: we know that unlike the existing home-use products on the market, Glo910 definitely combats cellulite. 
Glo910 will help thousands of women worldwide to become the best version of themselves. With the funds raised we will cover part of the first order production.
Think again, because there are many ways you can help us, even without pledging for a product.
Share Glo910 with your friends, family, and relatives. Get the word out and be a part of our referral competition.
Pledge the supporter perks to get updates, promotions and early access to Glo910 when it arrives.

 
Risks & Challenges

 There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any hardware product at scale. Fortunately, Glo910 team members have more than 10 years experience developing consumer goods projects in Asia for European and American markets. 
With European Designed and Engineering, we are industrializing Glo910 in Asia with a high quality and reliable partner with whom we previously developed several beauty projects. Molds already finished, the off-tool samples will be tested at INTERTEK, worldwide Accredited Lab.
Shipping might be little out of our hands to ensure committed shipping date but we will do it with proven forwarders in order to minimize the risk.
We are committed to keeping our campaign transparent and will openly communicate with our supporters on our project, as well as any obstacles that might arise.

story:
www.MyKidsConnect.com

 



The KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone is a parent's "All In One Security Solution". It is the best way for parents to obtain piece of mind while their children are away from home. The KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone is equipped GPS/LBS[1] Location which allows real time tracking of the phone via the Android or iOS App or on any web enabled device. 

Parents can also see where their children have been with the location history feature. The SOS feature when activated will send a text message with the GPS/LBS[1] location to up to 4 cell phone numbers and then it will autodial the numbers on the SOS list until one is answered[2]. The SOS feature can also be programmed to call a help center where a live operator will answer the phone and assist the child at an additional cost. 

The GeoFencing feature allows parents to set a predetermined area and receive an alert if the phone enters or leaves the area.

The Voice Monitoring feature allows parents to send a text message to the phone and within a minute the phone will call back without activating the screen allowing them the ability to monitor the child's surroundings.

The KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone is equipped with 4 Speed Dial Numbers as well as a 20 number phone book. These preprogrammed numbers are the only numbers that the child can call as well as being the only numbers that can call the phone

KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone Feature List

GPS+LBS+A-GPS fast locating

3 Days of Location History 

Voice monitor

S+ SOS button 

Family numbers 

Parental Control of Incoming And Outgoing Calls 

GeoFencing

Voice Monitor

[1]GPS/LBS tracking service is not 100% accurate, it can be used to approximate your location only. Tracking will work when your device is charged, turned on, has network access and may not be available in remote or enclosed areas. LBS tracking works by locating the nearest cell phone tower to your device. Some restrictions apply, see website for full terms and conditions.

[2]If a voicemail picks up the KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone will think the call is answered and it will not call the remaining numbers on the SOS list. 

The KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone is a true 2-way tracker and cell phone, which allows the parents and children to make phone calls to each other as well as allowing the parents to track the position of the KidsConnect GPS Tracker Phone.

All the functions of the KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone are controlled by the parents on the web interface:

 



Tracking Platform

SOS Number Setting


Family Number Setting


Phone Book Number Setting


Answer Mode Setting


Geo-Fence Setting

Log In Screen

Low Battery Reminder

3 Days of Location History

                                                      GPS Location Activation

 These are Examples of Some of the Features You Can Program On The KidsConnect Tracker Web Platform. You Can Also Monitor Your KidsConnect GPS Tracker Cell Phone From any Smart Phone or Tablet iOS or Android With Our Free APP.

 


APP Login Screen

 

             APP Tracking Screen

story:
Short Summary

Our mission is to make a soda for the whole family that is simple, festive and delicious. Made from whole apples, honey, varietal fruit and orchard botanicals, Fruitbelt Soda is a perfect stand-in for ordinary soda, except more delicious.

Our soda is a souvenir of the Fruitbelt — a place in our backyard where apples, cherries and peaches grow in lush abundance -- and a love letter to orchards everywhere. We are selling 'advance cases' of our soda at a discount in order to support a production run in November. 

At this time, we have two luscious flavors: Tart Apple Dream (apple/lime/caraway) and Sour Cherry Zing (cherry/ginger). All this loveliness is contained in 10-oz bottles with a resealable cap.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to pre-sell cases of soda at a discount. The funds from this sale will help us go into production in November, 2015. People are excited to have a delicious regional soda evocative of orchards and they ask how they can help. This is it -- buy 1, 2 on up to a dozen cases of soda! We could make a mug or a coaster or some other trivial thing, but we figured you'd want the real deal -- the real soda -- as a perk. So that's what you'll get. If you don't want a case or a sampler pack and want to support our work, you can do that, too -- just click the $25 perk which gets you some dried heirloom apples and more.

Our sodas are 25% real juice, sweetened with honey and monk fruit, and mid-calorie (70 calories/10 oz -- that's right, drink up!). They feature a proprietary blend of orchard botanicals which we developed ourselves in an effort to evoke the pleasures of an orchard -- this includes 25 varieties of heirloom apples from a local orchardist. Our sodas are cold-sterilized to preserve freshness and have been lab-verified to last at least 12 months. More tart than sweet, they're great mixers and have unique flavors. There is no artificial anything here -- real color, real flavor, no preservatives.

The Impact

There are only a few fruit belts in the country, and little by little they are disappearing. Fruitbelt Soda tells the story of heirloom fruit, fruit orchards, and the farmers who tend them. We work with land conservation groups to preserve orchards as farmland. We broadcast and support efforts toward sustainable cultivation. We believe one of the best ways to preserve something is to create a demand for it -- conservation through consumption, inviting people to help preserve the ecology of heirloom orchards by enjoying this festive drink. By purchasing this soda, you're supporting orchards everywhere!

Risks & Challenges

We've been working on this project for 2 years. We've learned so much! For every obstacle -- from packaging to formulation to marketing/fundraising -- we've found an answer. Members of our team come from finance, supply chain, fundraising, formulation, farming and more. In addition to this, we are forming a board that has the connection and brainpower to help us to continue winning.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like this soda concept but can't buy a case or two, please make some noise about our campaign to your people. Feel free to use Indiegogo share tools or use your own ingenuity.

story:
Why Are We Here?

Do you remember in school seeing a child with a patch over one side of their eye glasses?  Do you remember that they may have often been alone?  This may have just been a normal child being treated for Lazy Eye (Amblyopia).

Untreated, Lazy Eye means you don’t have stereoscopic vision, which means you can’t see effectively in three dimensions.  These children and adults learn to cope, but can you imagine not being able to play ball games well because you can't judge distance?  Further, have you considered how important stereopsis is in your ability to read and interpret the expression on the faces of your loved ones?  This is the fate of between 3 - 5% of the population who develop Amblyopia (Lazy Eye) as a child. 

While children can be treated with conventional “patching” of the good eye to force the “Lazy Eye” to work, approximately 50-60% of children carry Amblyopia into adult life! 

Amblyoptica is a start-up company developing a new device to treat Lazy Eye (Amblyopia).  Amblyoptica was formed by three people.  Dr Christopher (Kit) Bunker invented the device.  He has had Lazy Eye all his life and was told it could not be treated.  In retirement he decided to challenge that notion. 

Kit recruited Dr Ed Howell to join his team.  Ed is a vision scientist and optometrist specialising in the treatment of children with Lazy Eye.  Dr Stuart Hazell joined the team to bring a commercial focus to the idea that this device could be developed and commercialised to the benefit of thousands of people.

We are developing a first of its kind medical device to treat Amblyopia in children and adults.  We use the ‘good’ eye and the brain to teach the amblyopic eye how to see. 

Dr Kit Bunker is a retired physicist and is motivated to bring his device to market to help the many thousands of children and adults whose lives are impacted by Amblyopia.

To help realise Kit's dream, funds you choose to contribute will be used to progress a clinical trial to build the evidence we need to attract investors or to find a partner to take the development and commercialisation of the device forward.  Some of the funding will also be used to contribute to patent costs, critical to bring this product to market.  The money you contribute will not be used to pay any of the three founders of Amblyoptica; they will continue to support the company with their skills and knowledge.

What We Need & How We Will Pay It Forward

Amblyoptica is seeking your support to bring a new medical device to market.  While the concept may seem simple when you see it, it is intended to be a professional medical device and not a home use or DIY technology.  Therefore, it can’t be supplied without the attendant requirement for skilled clinical input and appropriate regulatory approval to sell the final product.  So what is Amblyoptica offering for your support?  Amblyoptica is basing this crowd funding campaign on a pledge to Pay It Forward.  We will use your support to help our mission to bring a novel medical device to market.  When we achieve that goal, we will pay forward $2 for every $1 we receive through this campaign.  We are pleased the charity Hear and Say (https://www.hearandsay.com.au/) have agreed to be our partner recipient organisation in this crowd funding campaign. 

We are making a pledge that when the company achieves our commercial objective of bringing our Lazy Eye device to market and we are generating a profit, we will give, to Hear and Say, $2 for every $1 contributed by our supporters.  We will contribute these funds as quickly as possible once the business is profitable and ahead of any dividend to future investors.

Your support has the potential to be amplified and keep on giving!

We have set a target of $25,000.  We have selected this amount as it will cover costs associated with progressing a small clinical trial to advance the proof of concept.  This includes costs associated with preparation of Ethics Committee approval, and a level of administrative support in the management of the trial which we aim to conduct with the support of selected optometry practices in Australia.  There will be some reimbursement of expenses to people who we recruit to be part of this study.  We will also use some of the funds raised to support part of the cost associated with progressing our patent claims.

The Journey Ahead

When we started this journey we knew it would not be easy.  The motivation for the team was to make a difference by bringing a “first of its kind” treatment for Lazy Eye to the people who need it; the children and adults who have been told there are no further treatment options.  Kit has not been cured, but he now has practical stereopsis with on-going improvement of his vision.  If we can show that what Kit has achieved for himself - as validated in Dr Howell's assessments - can translate to even a sub-set of the people who currently have no treatment options, our efforts will be completely justified. 

Your contribution will help us continue our journey.  Ultimately we will need to bring investors or strategic partners to this project.  This is because it takes a lot of money to bring a medical device to market.  Issues such as protecting IP, design, quality systems, regulation, manufacture costs and marketing all represent issues that must be addressed.  You can be part of this journey and through our Facebook page you will be able to share our achievements and, we must say, some frustrations.

Our Vision And What You Can Help Us Achieve

Amblyoptica is more than a device; it is a system that provides a device, combined with a vision development program.  This will be underpinned by an appreciation of critical need for all elements of the vision infrastructure to be engaged (if we are to achieve the intention of effectively training the brain to construct what most people perceive to be "normal vision").  In this regard the expertise of Dr Ed Howell is an important element of our team.

While the first functional prototype you have seen in our video is a mechanical device, we want to progress the development of a liquid crystal display (LCD) electronic system.  Early prototypes of the LCD system have been built and we are now looking for LCD panels that meet our specifications prior to advancing this development.

If we are fortunate to launch one of those rare campaigns that achieve much more than our initial target, we will work with our design company to build a device ready for manufacture.  This will cost around $350,000.


Risks & Challenges

To take this concept forward there are challenges and risks.  We work with a range of professionals in areas of design, regulation and clinical development to mitigate risk where we can. 

However, we can't control all things.  The clinical trial will be a critical test.  We have a very good understanding of the theory into why this device will work.  However, the current data are limited to the improvement in stereopsis of the inventor, Dr Kit Bunker. Dr Ed Howell is confident the technology will translate to other people and he is working to design the study and define the working parameters for the device needed to validate the fundamental hypothesis.  Notwithstanding, a clinical trial is the only way we will be able to understand the full scope of the utility of the device.  The clinical trial may show the device does not work, or only works in a sub-set of people with Lazy Eye.  The level of stereopsis achieved may not meet clinical expectations.  This could impact our capacity to enter the market.

Once we have a device which has been registered for sale as a medical device, we still need to educate ophthalmologists and optometrists and prove to them that the device adds value to their treatment options.  We have a plan to achieve this goal, but it will take time and work.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, or if you would like to do more to help, you can support us in simple ways. 
Consider talking with your friends and family and ask if any have had experience with Lazy Eye.  You may be surprised at the answers you receive!
Spread the word!  Your friends and family may be interested in supporting our campaign using the ‘’Indiegogo’’ share tools or by liking and following us on Facebook.

are fortunate to launch one of those rare campaigns that achieve much more than
our initial target, we will work with our design company to build a device
ready for manufacture.  This will cost around $350,000.
Risks & Challenges


To
take this concept forward there are challenges and risks.  We work with a
range of professionals in areas of design, regulation and clinical development
to mitigate risk where we can.  
However,
we can't control all things.  The clinical trial will be a critical
test.  We have a very good understanding of the theory into why this
device will work.  However, the current data are limited to the
improvement in stereopsis
of the inventor, Dr Kit Bunker. Dr Ed
Howell is confident the technology will translate to other people and he is
working to design the study and define the working parameters for the device
needed to validate the fundamental hypothesis.  Notwithstanding, a
clinical trial is the only way we will be able to understand the full scope of
the utility of the device.  The clinical trial may show the device does
not work, or only works in a sub-set of people with Lazy Eye.  The level
of stereopsis
achieved may not meet clinical expectations. 
This could impact our capacity to enter the market.
Once
we have a device which has been registered for sale as a medical device, we
still need to educate ophthalmologists and optometrists and prove to them that
the device adds value to their treatment options.  We have a plan to
achieve this goal, but it will take time and work. 
 Other Ways You Can Help 

If you are
unable to contribute, or if you would like to do more to help, you can support
us in simple ways.  
Consider talking with your friends and family and ask if any have had
experience with Lazy Eye.  You may be surprised at the answers you
receive!
Spread the word!  Your friends and family
may be interested in supporting our campaign using the ‘’Indiegogo’’ share
tools or by liking and following us on Facebook.

story:
Chronic Disease is Out of Control!

Unfortunately mainstream medicine is losing the battle with chronic disease. Diseases like cancer, diabetes, asthma, autism, cardio vascular disease, alzheimer, depression... (I could go on) increasingly continue to affect our friends and family. 

Prevention is key...

Many of these diseases can be prevented by implementing lifestyle changes that reduce exposure, and by identifying and mitigating the products and contaminants in our homes that affect indoor quality. 

MyPiE™ stands for "My Personal Indoor Environment. MyPiE™ is a fundamental and necessary preventative management program that supports chronically diagnosed persons in leading healthy and active lives, and supports health plans in delivering improved outcomes, improved efficiencies and environments.

With your help, we can help those who are disparately affected and lack the resources to make healthy changes and choices in their lives.

MyPiE™ Environment Assessment Program

The MyPiE™ Environment Assessment Program provides a unique, evidence-based assessment of indoor exposure. MyPiE™ identifies and monitors levels of potentially harmful contaminants in the air of a patient’s home, work, school or place of recreation.

Evidence based testing for: 

  • Mold (Basic or Comprehensive)
  • Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) and Chemical Exposure
  • Tobacco smoke
  • Household products and pesticides
  • Building Material
  • Other Asthma Triggers and Allergens: dog, cat, cockroach, 1 & 2 dust mite, mouse, rat, fungal alt, fungal asp
  • Continuous Environment Monitoring: NOx, CO, CO2, O3, PM2.5, VOC, Humidity, Temperature (Cutting Edge!)

Our Goals...

  • The MyPiE™ campaign is seeking $160,000 in donations.
  • MyPiE Inc. (501c3) - ALL DONATIONS ARE TAX DEDUCTIBLE, but more importantly, you are helping to create a healthier environment for someone in need.
  • Below is an example of how funds will be allocated:

The MyPiE™ Impact

MyPiE™ Environment Assessment Program provides physicians with the necessary data to make informed patient diagnosis and treatment decisions by identifying levels of exposure/indoor triggers that often result in frightening asthma attacks, chronic disease, inflammation, avoidable emergency room visits and costly care. 


MyPiE™ Environment Assessment Program recommends actionable solutions to mitigate identified contaminants/triggers and re-assesses for air quality improvement in accordance with the Environmental Protection Agency’s (EPA) standards and practices.


Reducing Exposure Works! 

 U.S. Department of Health & Human Services

Case Management and Home Assessments Reduce Asthma-Related Admissions, Emergency Visits, and Missed School Days in Diverse Urban Children

"The Boston Children’s Hospital’s Community Asthma Initiative provides asthma case management and in-home environmental assessments for diverse, low-income urban children age 2 to 18 with poorly controlled asthma...The program significantly reduced:"
hospitalizations (by 79 percent)
emergency department visits (57 percent)
missed school days (42 percent)
missed parent work days (49 percent) 
after 1 year, and has generated a positive return on investment.
Read more...

Education and Awareness is Key...

Sometimes change is difficult. When one becomes accustom to doing things one way, doing things differently can be a real challenge. MyPiE™ can help through its education and awareness efforts. The MyPiE™ Environment Assessment Program advises how to:

  • purchase alternative natural household products
  • properly store potentially harmful chemicals
  • implement and continue lifestyle changes that may lead to healthier outcomes
  • maintain quality indoor air

MyPiE™ is a National Program

**Initial Territory New Jersey


Meet Our Board of Directors

Click to check out Board of Directors...


Other Ways You Can Help 

Become a Volunteer

We are looking for volunteers to help fulfill our mission. If you are interested in volunteering click here. 

Like, Love and Share our Campaign on Social Media

We need your help to get the word out. Like and Share our link with your friends and family through social media.

story:
Short Summary

Urgent Needs Network is a social services organization that actively seeks projects that have a profound impact on an individual or community. Our network verifies urgent needs and presents projects to the world for financial support. We believe in community and that as a collective we can be a conduit for change, supporting and uplifting fellow man.

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign is for the immediate financial support of Lea as she undergoes treatment and prepares for her fifth surgical procedure. Lea has an infant child and has attempted to save proceeds from her performing career, but those funds are limited. Your donation will assist Lea in providing for her family and becoming a productive member of society again.

The Impact

Your contribution will assist with the following:

  • Costs associated with treatment
  • Household expenses
  • Childcare expenses
  • Incidentals

Risks & Challenges

Lea is a strong woman and is truly in a fight for her life. She doesn't want sympathy and really didn't want to expose her personal life to the public. But we are our brothers(sisters) keeper and thought what better way to show our love for this fighter than to show our support when it's needed the most. At Urgent Needs Network our desire is to provide the needed financial assistance to assist the doctors and God in healing this strong young lady. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't provide a financial donation please do the following:

  • Share this campaign with friends and family.
  • Share with radio, television and newspapers outlets within your local markets.
  • Pray for this young lady and her family.

story:
Summary

If we complained how difficult it is with API 180, almost can't see PETRONAS Twin Towers in Malaysia. Imagine the condition at Kalimantan with API 1900!

It is saddening to read stories of the affected citizens caused by this man-made disaster in the media. Imagine the roadside vendor who has no choice but to continue to sell drinks in the thick polluted air; imagine the motorists who run into fatal accidents because of the terrible visibility; imagine the innocent children running around without any protection; imagine the elderly people struggling to breathe; imagine of a people too poor to afford N95 masks.

What's even shocking?! 15,000 people suffered Acute Respiratory Infections (ARI) and adults and children died due to the critical haze situation.

What Can We Do

WE NEED YOU LAH!

We are currently collecting: 
1. N95 mask
2. Eye drops 
3. Safety goggles (To used when they are on a motorbike - BUT ensure they are not the types that fog up)

The funds collected will be used to purchase the items, cover the cost of packaging and shipping fee to be sent to Kalimantan also supporting a team of 10 Rotaractors/ Volunteers from Malaysia which will be visiting Kalimantan to help and understand the situation.

Together we can do this!


The Impact

We are from the Rotaract Club of Bangsar, Rotary International District 3300, Malaysia. We are collaborating and channeling all the items and funds collected to Justice, Peace and Integrity of Creation (JPIC) Kalimantan and WALHI (Wahana Lingkungan Hidup Indonesia) who will help the distribution of items to the affected communities from poor neighbourhoods, schools and villages. In addition, our team will also be working along with them for a 4 days period to educate and distribute the items to the community.

https://www.facebook.com/racbangsar
http://www.walhi.or.id/

To ensure transparency, all receipts will be posted on our Facebook page, with photos of our Indonesian distribution.

What Else Can You Do

If you cannot donate, it’s okay. You may help us in another effective ways:

1. SPREAD THE WORD! Like and share our page to your family and friends!

https://www.facebook.com/Care4Kalimantan

2. PLEDGE WITH US! Take a selfie with your own simple message on a paper to prevent haze and include #Care4Kalimantan

3. SHARE, SHARE & SHARE! Don't forget to share your selfie picture on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram & etc.

story:
I hate to ask for help, but when my wife, (Teane) and future son's (Ryder) welfare are at stake, i'd do anything.

It's amazing that just the day after Thanksgiving she was out, taking family pictures, walking, laughing, and being her happy, pregnant self.  2 days later and we're in the hospital for a week already. She can't walk, her speech is slurred and she has memory loss and seizure-like events.

If you don't know what meningitis is, please take a look here:

  • Approximately 600 – 1,000 people contract meningococcal disease in the U.S. each year.*
  • Of those who get meningococcal disease 10-15 percent die.
  • Among those who survive, approximately 1 in 5 live with permanent disabilities, such as brain damage, hearing loss, loss of kidney function or limb amputations.

http://www.nmaus.org/disease-prevention-information/statistics-and-disease-facts/

We were at the hospital earlier in the month of November because she felt excruciating pain.  The Doctors couldn't figure it out and sent her home after 5 days,  During the Week of Thanksgiving she felt decent and we were able to take family pictures.  The day after Thanksgiving, she started to have the same pain and this time it was much worse.  We went back to the hospital and they diagnosed her with Meningitis.

Please keep her in your thoughts and prayers. She needs to get feeling better. She's amazing and strong, and Baby Ryder is doing great as well.

We're very grateful to the Doctors and Nurses at the hospital for their work.


The Bills from the Hospital are already totaling over $40,000.  I know that we probably won't get that much, and I am fine working on my own to pay of my debts, which is why I am only asking for $6,000, but this is something much bigger than me that I can't afford, especially with more hospital bills coming soon for the birth of our son, Ryder.

I am in school taking 21 credit hours this semester and working part time to support my family, but I can't do this on my own any more, so I am relying on the kindness that I know exists in the world.

Please ONLY DONATE IF YOU ARE ABLE.  I would hate it if somebody was to give us money when they can't afford their own needs, and those are usually the people who donate, trust me, I know.

There are many risks associated with Meningitis by itself, but aside from that, there is so much more when there are two people involved like a mother and her Child.


If you can't donate, thank you for your the thought.  We appreciate any and all prayers and good thoughts our way.  We send them right back to you and wish everyone a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year this amazing time of the Year.
