story:
Conventional protein sources such as whey, soy, chicken or fish all take between an hour and an hour and a half to digest and so miss the optimal recovery window. 

Serious training and exercise leaves an athlete or bodybuilder with a 30 minute window to get nutrients to the exercised muscles for optimal recovery and growth.

Cellper®Elite is a breakthrough in sports nutrition by providing protein as a complete and naturally balanced amino acid complex.  It is absorbed directly without the need or wait for digestion.

As a concentrated single shot of just 100ml, taken immediately after each heavy session, Cellper®Elite provides the fastest and most effective nutrition for muscle repair.

To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).


The origin of Cellper® lies in the pioneering work of Professor Gennady Ermolin, a distinguished scientist who led nutrition development for long-duration space travel.  This produced technology for the advanced high protein diets essential to survival and high levels of functionality in a demanding environment. The resultant amino acid and micronutrient complex closely matches human requirements, is easily, quickly and almost completely absorbed.

Natural fish protein, taken from salmon, is refined through a series of biotechnological processes into an ultra high-grade amino acid complex which is then blended in our fruit based beverages to produce a 100ml single shot ready to be taken immediately following a demanding session.

(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).

Proteins are a vital food source for the human body. However, they must be digested, which means they must be broken up into free amino acids and short peptides (the ‘building blocks’ of body tissue), before they can be absorbed by the human body. Amino acids and short peptides help to reassemble new proteins, which in turn, help cells to grow, replicate or provide energy for metabolism.


Proteins are often long and complex polymer chains of specific amino acids linked together by peptide bonds. Small proteins with only a few linked amino acids are known as peptides.

The reassembly of amino acids into the proteins required by the body is one of the functions of cells which require the right mix of the amino acids to do this.

The twenty amino acids required for the human diet can be divided into three categories:

  • Nine essential amino acids which cannot be made by the body and must be supplied by food
  • Five non-essential amino acids which can be synthesized by the body, if in short supply
  • Six conditional amino acids, usually not essential, except in times of illness, stress or serious medical conditions.

Not all proteins are the same. The match between the proportions of the amino acids in the food we eat and the proportions required by the human body is known as protein quality.

Cellper®Elite has almost perfect protein quality, providing an ideal balance of amino acids, both essential and non-essential. The protein in Cellper®Elite has already been broken down so that it is both easily and completely absorbed, and immediately useful to human cells.

(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).

CellsUnited Limited is the company behind Cellper®Elite. The management team is five individuals with very different backgrounds, each with a track record of developing products from conception to launch.

Andy, Renata, Tim, Martin and Dominic have worked in a range of diverse industries from corporate finance, manufacturing, technology and healthcare through to aquaculture, pharmaceuticals and sports. Our core strengths span multiple disciplines - business and financial management, operations management, planning, sales, marketing, PR, communications and R&D. Our combined experience gives us breadth and depth as a team.

We are a motivated and focussed team, proud to be bringing you an exciting development in sports nutrition.



(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).

A lot of scientific research has already been carried out to demonstrate the value of amino acids to your muscles and we have listed some relevant papers below.

  1. Dietary protein requirements in athletes - http://www.jnutbio.com/article/S0955-2863(97)00007-7/abstract?cc=y=
  2. Protein supplementation with low fat meat after resistance training: effects on body composition and strength - http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25093275
  3. A critical examination of dietary protein requirements, benefits, and excesses in athletes - http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18577776
(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).

We are offering very attractive pre-launch offers on Cellper®Elite.

Plus, you get it first – why wait?

If you choose one of our money-saving monthly offers you will be able to continue to purchase on preferential terms for an even longer period, as specified.

Cellper®Elite comes in two flavours – Tomato & Chilli and Passion Fruit & Mango. Here's what we are offering:

Cellper®Elite Duo Pak - £10.00 - SAVE £5

For just £10.00, including postage and packing, we will send you a Cellper®Elite Duo Pak – one of each flavour to try for yourself. This is a saving of £3.00 on our delivered price once we are on the market.

Use these after your next two heavy sessions – and you may wish you’d bought more. 

Cellper®Elite 6-Pak - £25.00 - SAVE £10

Try six bottles of Cellper®Elite, three of each flavour, for £25.00 (including postage and packing), a saving of £10.00 on list price and delivery. This gives you the opportunity to give Cellper®Elite a good workout before we launch.

For most people this will be two weeks’ supply, allowing for three heavy sessions a week, and you’ll get a very good idea about what Cellper®Elite can do for you.

Cellper®Elite Six Month Offer - £260 - SAVE 33%

Here’s a great way to save money on recovery for the next six months – a fortnightly delivery of a six pack of Cellper®Elite to use for three heavy sessions of training or competition weekly for just £260.00, including postage and packing – a saving of £130.00 (33%) on our regular delivery price. This gives you 13 deliveries – enough Cellper®Elite to support your recovery after 78 heavy sessions.

This is fully flexible. Our user-friendly website enables you to speed up or slow down deliveries according to your training and competition schedule and change your flavour preferences at any time. What’s more, you have the option to continue purchasing at this preferential rate for a further six months or 13 more deliveries.

Cellper®Elite Twelve Month Half Price Offer - £390 - SAVE 50%

If you’re already convinced that Cellper®Elite is what you’ve been looking for, take advantage of our 12 month offer to get the best value we will ever be able to offer – Cellper®Elite at half price.

For £390.00 (including postage and packing) you will receive 26 x six packs of Cellper®Elite, one pack every fortnight – an offer you will be able to extend for a further 12 months to become one of our elite customers.

Again, this is fully flexible and you will be able to adjust your delivery schedule to suit your exact requirements, taking more or less in the way that best fits the demands of your sport and your programme.


(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).


This is your opportunity to be an early adopter - one of the very first people to try Cellper®Elite.

Your support enables us to develop the business further and faster than otherwise possible, bringing Cellper®Elite to the whole sports, fitness and exercise community in the UK.

If you have ever woken in the morning aching from your session last night or your race or match yesterday, you will also benefit - because taking Cellper®Elite straight after you finish will give your muscles the nutrition they need, at the time they are most receptive. Be one of the first to start rebuilding and repairing faster.

Remember, it doesn't matter which sport you choose or which muscles you use because, at the end of the day, it comes down to how quickly you can get the right nutrients into your bloodstream and to your muscles.


Our Indiegogo offer is fast-acting. You won’t have to wait months to receive the offer you have chosen and we have already made the necessary production commitments.

We will be supplying you with your chosen offer in October.



As an Indiegogo contributor, we guarantee you will be in the first group to receive your chosen Cellper®Elite offer!

(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a PC; or click here if you're on a mobile device).


We already have the funds to fulfil our obligations to the first set of people ordering from us.  In fact manufacturing is underway and contracts are signed with external parties where necessary.

We have a huge task ahead of us and your support provides additional funds to give Cellper®Elite the visibility it deserves. It will also enable us to bring forward the development of our support and infrastructure for our customers.  


We will remain committed to our current plan, deliver to our Indiegogo supporters in October as promised and work hard with the resources available to us.


If we exceed our target, we will be able to accelerate our promotional activities and sponsor more events and clubs.  This is a sales activity that primarily involves product sampling. Remember that Cellper®Elite is a premium product so sampling is an expensive exercise although we know it will stimulate revenue growth.

If we exceed our target significantly we will bring forward a number of initiatives in our business plan and go further and faster.


(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).


1 – What is Cellper®Elite?

Cellper®Elite is a nutritional product containing 10 g of pure natural protein available as a complex of essential and non essential amino acids, and micronutrients in a single 100 ml shot intended for use in rapid muscle recovery following strenuous exercise .

2 - What’s the science behind Cellper®Elite?

It is well recognised that ingestion of protein following strenuous exercise enhances the repair  and recovery of muscles . However , the currently available forms of protein all require an initial digestion step in the stomach which can take up to 90 minutes prior to absorption by the blood stream and supply to the muscles .

The critical time frame for optimal muscle repair is within the first 30 minutes following cessation of exercise and Cellper® has been developed to meet this critical time requirement. Cellper® contains natural protein that has already been pre-digested to the constituent amino acids , thereby being immediately available for absorption upon ingestion such that the protein can reach the muscles within the critical first 30 minute interval .

3 – Who should take it?

Cellper®Elite is specifically for people who need to repair and build muscle mass following anaerobic training or performance.  This allows you to  gain maximum benefit from your workouts and to be ready to do it again sooner.  Cellper®Elite will have little benefit and is not recommended following light aerobic exercise designed exclusively for weight loss.

4 – Is it suitable for vegetarians and vegans? 

Short answer: No, it is derived from salmon so would not meet vegetarian /vegan standards.

Longer answer: It’s chemistry, all fish protein has been broken down into constituent amino acids and micronutrients.  There are no long proteins such as DNA remaining that would identify it as coming from an animal source.  A lysine molecule, for example, is just that, and it is impossible to tell if it was previously part of a plant or an animal.  So it depends on the motivation of your vegetarianism.

If you are allergic to fish: do not take Cellper®Elite

5 – Does it contain sugar, wheat, gluten or caffeine? 

No added sugar, no wheat, no gluten and no caffeine.  The carbs in the product are exclusively from the natural sugars in the fruit and vegetable juice. 

6 - I am following a clean lifestyle. Is Cellper®Elite suitable?

Absolutely...and we are really glad to be able to say that. We purposely set out to keep the label as clean as possible. All the flavours, sweeteners and even the stabiliser we need to give Cellper®Elite it's shelf life are are completely natural.

7 – Where and when can I buy it?

Now! Here! We are running our Indiegogo campaign to help us achieve our goals over the coming month or two but, in exchange for your contribution, we are offering incredible deals on Cellper®Elite that we are unlikely to ever offer again! Any product you buy here today, whether it's the duo pak or the 12 month's worth (26 x 6-paks) will be shipped in early October.

8 – I’m a PT, can I buy some for my clients?

Many PTs give nutritional advice to their clients, particularly with regard to obtaining the maximum benefit from training.  Our Cellper®Elite Ambassador programme is specifically design to help PTs do this however, we will not be starting what we call our 'Ambassador Programme' until the product goes on full sale in October. If you would like more information on this, please contact us for details: AmbassadorProgramme@CellperElite.com

9 – What’s the difference between this and whey protein?

Firstly, Cellper®Elite is comprised of short chain amino acids (peptides), that have been pre-digested and are therefore readily absorbed immediately by the intestine.  By contrast whey protein is indeed that, it is protein that first has to be digested by proteases in the intestine into peptides thereby delaying absorption.  Secondly, Cellper®Elite is derived from salmon protein, a very close match in amino acid composition to human protein, whereas whey is derived from milk thereby introducing the additional complication of lactose side effects in the significant proportion of the population that are lactose intolerant. (NB > 20% of the population are lactose intolerant, and in some ethnic groups the levels of intolerance rise much higher)

References:

i - Absorption and digestion of proteins and amino acids: Colorado State University

ii - Absorption of Amino Acids: Google 

iii - Lactose Intolerance. British Allergy Foundation

10 – Should I take this and whey protein?

Whey protein is usually recommended as a general protein supplement, i.e., a means of enhancing the amount of protein in the diet.  Commercial products often recommend consumption 3 times a day: Between breakfast and lunch, between lunch and dinner, and after exercise.

Cellper®Elite is more specific: It is designed to get nutrients to your muscles most effectively, when you most need them, immediately post exercise.

Taking Cellper®Elite post exercise, does not preclude you from taking another form of protein supplement at another time of day if your diet would otherwise not provide enough protein.  Healthy adults generally require 0.8g of protein per kg of body weight, athletes and body builders may need 1.2 to 2g per kg of body weight.

Reference: 

i - Protein Requirements. www.nutrition.org.uk

11 – Do I have to mix it up like I currently do?

No, Cellper®Elite comes as a  100ml liquid ready to be consumed straight from the bottle.  It is all about getting this nutrition to your muscles as quickly as possible.  If you drink Cellper®Elite immediately after exercise, your body is benefiting by the time you reach the shower.

12 - Will this cause bloating like I’m used to with Whey. 

No, the bloating is a side effect of the digestion of whole protein. Cellper®Elite is pre-digested into short chain amino acids (peptides) requires no further digestion.  Hence no gas or bloating.

13 – What causes the bloating I experience with my existing whey protein?

Bloating  is an uncomfortable and tight feeling of fullness in the stomach or abdomen, which may also be accompanied by abdominal pain and flatulence.  The abdomen becomes larger than normal (distension) and bloating may also cause a very noticeable increase in various noises from the gut, such as loud rumblings and gurglings.

The main causes of such symptoms are excess gas produced by the digestive process.  The mixture of gases such as oxygen, hydrogen, nitrogen, carbon dioxide, methane and others formed in the gut during the digestive process can become a very unpleasant problem. Ingestion of Whey protein and the subsequent digestion of it leads to the production of these gases as side effects , with in some instances the swelling of the abdomen by up to 125% . This problem is exacerbated in the >20% of the population who suffer from intolerance to the lactose present in Whey protein.

Reference:

i - Whey Protein Allergies and Intolerances. Precision Nutrition

14 - Why does Cellper®Elite contain only 10g of protein when other products contain 20, 30 or more?

The key metric is not how much you eat, but how much you absorb.  Cellper®Elite is in a form in which it is almost completely absorbed, requiring no further digestion.  This contrasts sharply with conventional protein of which healthy people typically absorb about 50% following an hour to an hour and a half's digestion.  In this context, 10g of amino acids plus all the micronutrients is a surge of nutrients just at the time when your muscles most need them.

The average daily requirements of protein are 0.8 g per kg body weight daily, which equates to about 56g daily, which would be ingested from a normal healthy diet . Elite athletes and body builders have been shown to need significantly more: 1.2 -2.0 g daily per kg body weight, which they would try to obtain from an enhanced healthy diet. By taking Cellper®Elite as a protein supplement comprising 10g of protein instantly absorbed, an additional  surge  of protein can be provided after strenuous exercise to quickly repair strained and damaged muscles.

Reference: 

i- Protein Requirements. www.nutrition.org.uk

15 - Why do I need non-essential amino acids when my body can make them?

Sure, when there is a deficit of one or more of the non-essential amino acids, the body had mechanisms for synthesising these from other aminos.  The more you understand cell biology the more wonderful it is!  However, compared to getting a balanced composition to start with, it is a slow and inefficient process.

16 - I already take BCAAs and Creatine, why do I need Cellper®Elite?

BCAAs and Creatine supplements are designed to limit muscle catabolism during exercise and to enable you to workout harder. Cellper®Elite is designed for consumption post exercise where the focus is on recovery and growth.

17 - Won't I achieve the same effect as Cellper®Elite simply by eating a protein rich meal before training?

Most trainers and nutritionists recommend eating a balanced meal, with plenty of protein, or taking a protein supplement two to two and a half hours before a training session.  Not later, as you may still be expending energy digesting food and could feel nauseous as you train.  Two hours before enables the meal to be fully digested, so all nutrients are available for the workout, you train hard and muscle catabolism is reduced.  At the end of the workout when these resources are depleted, Cellper®Elite provides the nutritional kick-start to recovery and muscle growth. Ideally, do both.


Even if you’re not able to support us by becoming an advance purchaser and early adopter of Cellper®Elite, you can still help us out by sharing our campaign with friends and family. The Indiegogo share tools are ready below.
story_txt:
Conventional protein sources such as whey, soy, chicken or fish all take between an hour and an hour and a half to digest and so miss the optimal recovery window. 
Serious training and exercise leaves an athlete or bodybuilder with a 30 minute window to get nutrients to the exercised muscles for optimal recovery and growth.


Cellper®Elite is
a breakthrough in sports nutrition by providing protein as a complete and
naturally balanced amino acid complex.  It is absorbed directly without the need or wait for digestion.
As a concentrated single shot of just
100ml, taken immediately after each
heavy session, Cellper®Elite provides the fastest and most effective nutrition for muscle
repair.



To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).




The origin of Cellper® lies in the
pioneering work of Professor Gennady Ermolin, a distinguished scientist who led
nutrition development for long-duration space travel.  This produced technology for the advanced
high protein diets essential to survival and high levels of functionality in a
demanding environment. The resultant amino acid and micronutrient complex closely
matches human requirements, is easily, quickly and almost completely absorbed.




Natural fish protein, taken from salmon, is
refined through a series of biotechnological processes into an ultra high-grade
amino acid complex which is then blended in our fruit based beverages to
produce a 100ml single shot ready to be taken immediately following a demanding
session.
(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).







Proteins
are a vital food source for the human body. However, they must be digested,
which means they must be broken up into free amino acids and short peptides
(the ‘building blocks’ of body tissue), before they can be absorbed by the
human body. Amino acids and short peptides help to reassemble new proteins,
which in turn, help cells to grow, replicate or provide energy for metabolism.



Proteins
are often long and complex polymer chains of specific amino acids linked
together by peptide bonds. Small proteins with only a few linked amino acids
are known as peptides.
The
reassembly of amino acids into the proteins required by the body is one of the
functions of cells which require the right mix of the amino acids to do this.
The
twenty amino acids required for the human diet can be divided into three
categories:



Nine essential amino acids which cannot be made by
the body and must be supplied by food


Five non-essential amino acids which can be
synthesized by the body, if in short supply


Six conditional amino acids, usually not essential,
except in times of illness, stress or serious medical conditions.


Not all
proteins are the same. The match between the proportions of the amino acids in
the food we eat and the proportions required by the human body is known as
protein quality. 
Cellper®Elite
has almost perfect protein quality, providing an ideal balance of amino acids,
both essential and non-essential. The protein in Cellper®Elite has already been
broken down so that it is both easily and completely absorbed, and immediately
useful to human cells.


(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).







CellsUnited
Limited is the company behind Cellper®Elite. The management team is five
individuals with very different backgrounds, each with a track record of
developing products from conception to launch.
Andy, Renata,
Tim, Martin and Dominic have worked in a range of diverse industries from
corporate finance, manufacturing, technology and healthcare through to
aquaculture, pharmaceuticals and sports. Our core strengths span multiple
disciplines - business and financial management, operations management,
planning, sales, marketing, PR, communications and R&D. Our combined
experience gives us breadth and depth as a team.
We are a
motivated and focussed team, proud to be bringing you an exciting development
in sports nutrition.





(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).








A lot of
scientific research has already been carried out to demonstrate the value of
amino acids to your muscles and we have listed some relevant papers below.



Dietary
protein requirements in athletes - http://www.jnutbio.com/article/S0955-2863(97)00007-7/abstract?cc=y=


Protein
supplementation with low fat meat after resistance training: effects on body
composition and strength - http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25093275


A
critical examination of dietary protein requirements, benefits, and excesses in
athletes - http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18577776



(To pre-order Cellper®Elite and take advantage of some never to be repeated deals select a perk (these are on the right of your screen if you’re on a desktop/laptop; or click here if you're on a mobile device).

offering very attractive pre-launch offers on Cellper®Elite. 
Plus,
you get it first – why wait? 
If you
choose one of our money-saving monthly offers you will be able to continue to
purchase on preferential terms for an even longer period, as specified.
Cellper®Elite
comes in two flavours – Tomato & Chilli and Passion Fruit & Mango. Here's
what we are offering:

For just £10.00, including postage and
packing, we will send you a Cellper®Elite Duo Pak – one of each flavour to try
for yourself. This is a saving of £3.00 on our delivered price once we are on
the market.

heavy sessions – and you may wish you’d bought more.

before we launch.

supply, allowing for three heavy sessions a week, and you’ll get a very good

recovery for the next six months – a fortnightly delivery of a six pack of Cellper®Elite

£260.00, including postage and packing – a saving of £130.00 (33%) on our regular
delivery price. This gives you 13 deliveries – enough Cellper®Elite to support

website enables you to speed up or slow down deliveries according to your

Cellper®Elite Twelve Month Half Price Offer - £390 - SAVE 50%

Again, this is fully flexible and you will
be able to adjust your delivery schedule to suit your exact requirements,

This is

story:
The Problem

Smart Phones changed our lives and connected us to each other like never before, with a disturbing exception….our young children and the elderly.   The people we care most about in our lives are the only segments of society that are not connected to us anytime, anywhere.......until now.   Parents don’t want their 3-10 year old children to have a smart phone because of the unrestricted Internet access, social skill implications,  and the expense.  The elderly don’t like the large size or complexity of smart phones.  

                                                         

The Solution

The Mini Orbi Clip-Phone/Tracker is the ideal communication device and Geo tracker to protect the most important people and things in our lives…the ultimate 24/7 talk, text, track solution  for our children and elderly parents.    

The Orbi is the ultimate personal communication and tracking device for anyone or anything.  Clip it to a key-chain, belt loop, backpack, bike, golf bag, scooter, walker.  Stick it to a lunch box, car, TV Remote, any flat surface.  Wear it on your wrist with the snap-on “ring band” or attach to a pendent or jacket.


The problem with trackers is that just knowing where your loved ones are in an emergency is not enough.  Immediately communicating with them is the key to their safety and your peace of Mind.

                 The Ecosystem

The My Orbi App (Android and iOS) and Orbi Website developed over the past year by MDI provide a simple and intuitive way to communicate and track one or multiple Orbi's, allowing the tracking of anyone or anything.  Current location and past-24 hour locations are automatically tracked on Google Maps.   The Geo Fencing feature is also controlled from the App or Website, immediately sending alerts when preset locations are left or when a preset destination is reached.   The My Orbi App is constantly communicating with the Orbi itself, sharing contacts, text history, call history, location data, and all settings. 


Who We Are

The Orbi was developed by MDI, a silicon valley start-up company founded by Dean Finnegan.  Dean and the team at MDI have a proven track record of bringing successful technology products to market.  The Product Development and Product Marketing team have decades of cumulative experience in creating technology products and their supporting ecosystems.  During the past 9 years, this team has been directly responsible for creating three new product categories and shipped over 12 million units to U.S. consumers.  The Orbi is their latest creation.  Their relationships with the largest retailers in the U.S. are also un-precedented and as a result, the Orbi will be available in thousands of retail store fronts in 2016.   

                               Recent Press

http://www.freshnews.com/news/1169201/mdi-launches-indiegogo-campaign-fund-orbi-mini-clip-phone-tracker-new-device-ensures-s

http://www.newsunited.com/mdI-launches-Indiegogo-campaign-to-fund-news/20505170/

http://www.companyspotlight.com/news/news/0/1400232

http://news.sys-con.com/node/3615482


                           Design

Over the past year and half, the MDI team has finalized the electrical and mechanical engineering for the Orbi 1. The tooling was completed in December and it is now ready for the pilot production run in late January.  The Orbi 2 design is also now complete and production will begin in April when tooling is finalized.  The My Orbi App and website is in the final stage of development and testing and will also be ready for deployment in January.   With your help in reaching our flexible fund raising goal of $50,000, we will start production and start delivering Peace Of Mind in March of 2016 .  

                              

When

The Orbi 1 will be launched on the T Mobile network in March of 2016.   The Orbi 2 Touch will be launched on the AT&T network in May of 2016.  There is no contract required and the Orbi can be added to existing family plans.  The monthly fee is only $9.99 per month for talk, text, and data.

Risks and Challenges

The traditional risks and challenges of launching new technology consumer products are significantly minimized because of the extensive product development and product marketing experience of the team at MDI.  Although MDI is a new company, the team has been creating and manufacturing technology products for the past 20 years.  We also have an incredibly capable manufacturing partner in Asia that already produces over 10 million units of micro-cellular products annually and is now ready to start production on the Orbi 1 and Orbi 2.  Our biggest challenges therefore are not in design or manufacturing, but are instead related more to the marketing of those products and the inevitable competitive forces that will emerge as we grow this new category of micro devices that allow 24/7 connection to people and things.   Although our pending patents provide some level of protection, the best defense against competitive forces is successful retail distribution and the resultant consumer awareness and loyalty.  MDI has a core competency in achieving mass retail distribution very quickly.  Our relationships with virtually all of the major retail channels in the U.S. give us a distinct advantage over other companies and will lead to very fast and very broad retail distribution on the Orbi.  The growth associated with large retail distribution also has financial and execution risks but we are confident in our ability to manage those challenges, as we have in the past.  With your help in getting the engine started, we will be able to grow Orbi to its full potential. 

    

Please share this Orbi campaign with family and friends by using the Indiegogo share buttons at the top left of the campaign, or visit the new Orbi Facebook page, OrbiOne.
story_txt:
The Problem

Smart Phones changed our lives and connected us to each other like never before, with a disturbing exception….our young children and the elderly.   The people we care most about in our lives are the only segments of society that are not connected to us anytime, anywhere.......until now.   Parents don’t want their 3-10 year old children to have a smart phone because of the unrestricted Internet access, social skill implications,  and the expense.  The elderly don’t like the large size or complexity of smart phones.                                                             
The SolutionThe Mini Orbi Clip-Phone/Tracker is the ideal communication device and Geo tracker to protect the most important people and things in our lives…the ultimate 24/7 talk, text, track solution  for our children and elderly parents.    
The Orbi is the ultimate personal communication and tracking
device for anyone or anything.  Clip it to a key-chain, belt loop,
backpack, bike, golf bag, scooter, walker. 
Stick it to a lunch box, car, TV Remote, any flat surface.  Wear it on your wrist with the snap-on “ring
band” or attach to a pendent or jacket. 








The problem with trackers is that just knowing where
your loved ones are in an emergency is not enough.  Immediately communicating with them
is the key to their safety and your peace of Mind.                 The Ecosystem

story:
There are several causes of snoring – whether it is habitual or occasional, due to soft tissue or sleep apnea – one thing remains the same: the annoying noise!

The patent-pending Purr uses your natural breathing to attack this obnoxious noise by emitting an acoustic wave to prevent those raucous snore sound waves from ever getting started.

Turning that snore into a purrrrr – so you can get the Zzz’s you need to start your day refreshed…Oh and prevent your loved one from going postal!


How is Purr different?

There are tons of anti-snoring products on the market today. And they are all either uncomfortable, expensive, or ineffective…you know because you have tried them all.

But Purr is different...


How does Purr work?





Your natural breath vibrates the stainless steel modulator vanes within the body of Purr, emitting an acoustic wave that prevents the snoring noise from ever starting.

Crazy fact for you - snoring is actually a lot like whistling. To whistle we must form our lips to the perfect shape and then blow the perfect velocity of air through our lips to create the sound.

To snore we must have the perfect size nasal cavity to resonate at the perfect frequency for the respiratory structures to vibrate and make the annoying snoring noise.

Purr disrupts these components of the snore with an acoustic wave that prevents respiratory structures from vibrating.

Giving you and your partner the purrrrrfect night's sleep.


Purr’s story

According to the U.S. Census Bureau’s 2015 report on America’s families and living arrangements, of the 255 million adults over the age of 15, a whopping 48% are married. Compare that with the National Sleep Foundation’s estimate of 90 million snoring Americans (35% of the over 15 crowd) and there is a good chance if you’re a married adult you sleep next to one.

And if you do, you know how painful it can be to toss, turn, and move between the couch or the guest room every night. Missing out on sleep sets us up to fail on the next day, no matter what your schedule is.

Naturally this can cause you to resent your partner, harming the quality and intimacy of your relationship.

I know because I was that annoying snorer that kept my husband up throughout the night – and not to be self-centered, but he woke me up a lot too with his poking and prodding to shut me up.

Needless to say, like millions of couples, we both suffered.

So as a professional product engineer – with experience developing more than 20 commercial products for various companies - I whipped up something that could solve the problem. The result is the Purr.

That was in November of 2014, and ever since our sleep has been better, our relationship stronger, and productivity through the roof – I mean I put together this campaign while working my “real” 9 to 5 job!

As the first user of Purr, my husband and I know it works and if you have experienced similar sleepless nights and crumbling couple chemistry we encourage you to join us in the PurrZone.

That is why I enlisted my friend Greg to help me put together this campaign and spread the word!


Goal


Product Specifications

Every Purr comes with an acoustic chamber body and 5 chemical free, rubber inserts of varying sizes.

story:
+Save ME


+Save ME is an app that permits you to warning until three of your contacts that you're in danger.




The configuration of the app is very simple:

  •  choose until three of your contacts
  • choose a message (a default message is available)

That's it. The app is configured.




Someone is following you in the street ? Just press the "I NEED HELP" button, and the message is directly sent to your contacts with your exact position (link on Google Maps) at the end of the message. Your contacts know that you're in danger and where you are.

A website will be available to present and to promote the app.



Why we need some funds ?


The aim of the funding is to be able to share the app on the App Store and Play Store. The website is also count in the cost. The funding will be also useful for some ads about the app. Some updates are already planned. We think that around 200€ are necessary to put the app on the stores and the website online. The other amount will be for the ads and to have a new logo.


What are the risks ?


The only risk is that the app will be not downloaded many times ! But if the funding will be completed, apps will be available.


When the project will be available ?


The iOS and Android apps and the website are already created. We are waiting for some funds, and after we will be able to launch the project.

story:
The original Rescufy already helps you get fast, accurate help in the event of anaphylaxis. With the tap of one button:

  1. Rescufy sends a text message to first responders (recommended to be 9-1-1).  This text includes your GPS location, the address associated with that GPS, and important medical information to help first responders react appropriately.
  2. Rescufy sends this same text message to your emergency contacts, so they know what the problem is and where it is happening so they also work to get help.
  3. Rescufy calls 9-1-1 so that you can speak to a 9-1-1 operator to get help as soon as possible.
  4. Rescufy provides a “View Patient Information” button that provides easy access to pertinent medical information for first responders and emergency room personnel.

 

Rescufy Connect will layer on the protection and support for food allergy families and everyone at risk of anaphylaxis. 

The most crucial step in an anaphylaxis action plan is to immediately administer epinephrine.  But what happens if you don't have your epinephrine with you?  I can't tell you how many times I have forgotten my son's Epi at home or in the car and had to go back and search for it in a panic. If you live with life threatening allergies, you know that every second that goes by without epinephrine during a severe allergy response puts a person more at risk of death.  The statistics are terrifying.

Rescufy Connect will ensure that you never forget your Epi again.  

With your help, Rescufy Connect will add some very important upgrades to the app functionality, including Bluetooth connectivity that will link the Rescufy app on your phone to your epinephrine injector.  This upgrade will ensure you never leave your home or car again without this most crucial lifesaving tool.  If you get outside of the acceptable range, the Rescufy app will alert you that your Epi is out of reach, and give you the reminder you need to go back and get it.  

Rescufy Connect will also allow you to go on a date night or trip away without worrying (as much...) 

Let's face it.  As a parent, worrying comes with the territory.  I know from personal experience, however, that the level of worrying compounds exponentially when your child has life threatening allergies.  No one is able to take care of your child the way you do, right? 

With your contribution, we will be able to add key functionality to the Rescufy app that will allow you to "hand it off" to a babysitter, grandparent or other caregiver for a set period of time, giving them the power to click one button and activate your complete anaphylaxis action plan.  All they need to focus on in the event of an anaphylaxis emergency is administering epinephrine and keeping your child comfortable while they wait for help to arrive.  Once the set time period is over, access to medical information is removed from the caregiver's phone keeping your medical information private and secure.

 

So, how did Rescufy get here?

5 years ago, these statistics would have sounded shocking to me, but I would not fully understand the magnitude and severity of what these numbers actually mean until my son was diagnosed with a severe tree nut allergy.  My wife and I learned that day that if he ingests any type of tree nut - even the tiniest particle - our son could have an allergic reaction that, if untreated, could result in death.

I knew there had to be an easier way to get help and peace of mind in the event of anaphylaxis.

We needed a reliable and fast way to reach 9-1-1 and emergency contacts in the event of anaphylaxis so that we could focus on the care and comfort of our son.  I came up with the Rescufy concept to simplify the process of notifying first responders, emergency contacts, and sharing medical information, submitted it to the University of Pennsylvania's  “AppItUP” mobile application idea challenge, and was honored to win first prize.

Fast forward to today and the Rescufy app is now live and available for download on Apple and Android devices.  

 

How Rescufy Works:

Essentially, Rescufy streamlines your anaphylaxis action plan.  Once the app is downloaded, it takes about 5 minutes to set up the required information inside the app.  The information gathered is tailored to what is needed by first responders in the event of anaphylaxis to get you accurate help as quickly as possible.  During set up, the user enters the phone numbers of emergency contacts and first responders (recommended to be 9-1-1).

After the required information is entered, the app is ready to use.  In the event of anaphylaxis, simply swipe up to remove the “emergency glass” from the button and tap the "Get Help Now" button.  With that one tap, the Rescufy process is activated:

 

  1. Rescufy sends a text message to first responders (recommended to be 9-1-1).  This text includes your GPS location, the address associated with that GPS, and important medical information to help first responders react appropriately.
  2. Rescufy sends this same text message to your emergency contacts, so they know what the problem is and where it is happening so they also work to get help.
  3. Rescufy calls 9-1-1 so that you can speak to a 9-1-1 operator to get help as soon as possible.
  4. Rescufy provides a “View Patient Information” button that provides easy access to pertinent medical information for first responders and emergency room personnel.

Why We Need Your Help

The Rescufy app is up and running, and thousands of people are already using it with great success!  It is tried and true, but we are driven to make it even better.

Research has shown that only 60% of those at risk know that epinephrine should be carried at all times, and only 40% actually carry it. In addition, only 50% of those who did carry in this study had expired epinephrine with them.

Your donation will allow Rescufy to implement the latest technology and best practices to provide the best resources to the severe allergy and asthma communities!  

Rescufy Connect will provide a tool to help everyone remember their epi, so that this life saving medication can be available when needed.  Furthermore, Rescufy Connect will ensure accurate information and best practices are available to caregivers so they can also get help accurately and quickly should anaphylaxis happen! 

All funds raised will go directly to....

  • Software development to add the Bluetooth connectivity feature to Rescufy Connect to help ensure that people keep their their epinephrine on hand.
  • Software development to add the ability for Rescufy Connect to temporarily hand off profile information so caregivers can get help accurately and quickly in the event of anaphylaxis.
  • Systems and support necessary to implement new features for Rescufy Connect.
  • Support for increasing awareness and distribution of Rescufy Connect to maximize impact on the allergy and asthma communities.

The Impact

Rescufy Connect will ensure that no one ever leaves home without their Epi again and that caregivers will have the information and tools they need to quickly and accurately get help in the event of anaphylaxis.  With your help, Rescufy Connect can improve the statistic that only 50% of people who should carry epinephrine keep it with them.  And, Rescufy Connect can help parents of children with severe allergies and asthma have peace of mind when they do have the chance to get away by ensuring caregivers have the information and tools necessary to get help quickly and accurately in the event of anaphylaxis.

Other Ways You Can Help

That you for your support!  We hope you will share our campaign with friends who may be interested or who may benefit from our app.   Visit www.rescufy.com to learn more about us, and to stay in touch!  

  • Give to the campaign for Rescufy Connect
  • Download the original Rescufy app and write a review on the app store page
  • Spread the word on social media
  • E-mail us at info@rescufy.com with questions or ideas

If you live with life threatening allergies, you know that every second that goes by without epinephrine during a severe allergy response puts a person more at risk of death.  The statistics are terrifying.
Rescufy Connect will ensure that you never forget your Epi again.  

With your help, Rescufy Connect will add some very important upgrades to the app functionality, including Bluetooth connectivity that will link the Rescufy app on your phone to your epinephrine injector.  This upgrade will ensure you never leave your home or car again without this most crucial lifesaving tool.  If you get outside of the acceptable range, the Rescufy app will alert you that your Epi is out of reach, and give you the reminder you need to go back and get it.  
Rescufy Connect will also allow you to go on a date night or trip away without worrying (as much...) 
Let's face it.  As a parent, worrying comes with the territory.  I know from personal experience, however, that the level of worrying compounds exponentially when your child has life threatening allergies.  No one is able to take care of your child the way you do, right? 

With your contribution, we will be able to add key functionality to the Rescufy app that will allow you to "hand it off" to a babysitter, grandparent or other caregiver for a set period of time, giving them the power to click one button and activate your complete anaphylaxis action plan.  All they need to focus on in the event of an anaphylaxis emergency is administering epinephrine and keeping your child comfortable while they wait for help to arrive.  Once the set time period is over, access to medical information is removed from the caregiver's phone keeping your medical information private and secure.
 
So, how did Rescufy get here?

5 years ago, these statistics would have sounded shocking to me, but I would not fully understand the magnitude and severity of what these numbers actually mean until my son was diagnosed with a severe tree nut allergy.  My wife and I learned that day that if he ingests any type of tree nut - even the tiniest particle - our son could have an allergic reaction that, if untreated, could result in death.
I knew there had to be an easier way to get help and peace of mind in the event of anaphylaxis. 
We needed a reliable and fast way to reach 9-1-1 and emergency contacts in the event of anaphylaxis so that we could focus on the care and comfort of our son.  I came up with the Rescufy concept to simplify the process of notifying first responders, emergency contacts, and sharing medical information, submitted it to the University of Pennsylvania's  “AppItUP” mobile application idea challenge, and was honored to win first prize.
Fast forward to today and the Rescufy app is now live and available for download on Apple and Android devices.  
 
How Rescufy Works:

Essentially, Rescufy streamlines your anaphylaxis action plan.  Once the app is downloaded, it takes about 5 minutes to set up the required information inside the app.  The information gathered is tailored to what is needed by first responders in the event of anaphylaxis to get you accurate help as quickly as possible.  During set up, the user enters the phone numbers of emergency contacts and first responders (recommended to be 9-1-1).
After the required information is entered, the app is ready to use.  In the event of anaphylaxis, simply swipe up to remove the “emergency glass” from the button and tap the "Get Help Now" button.  With that one tap, the Rescufy process is activated:

 

Rescufy sends a text message to first responders (recommended to be 9-1-1).  This text includes your GPS location, the address associated with that GPS, and important medical information to help first responders react appropriately.
Rescufy sends this same text message to your emergency contacts, so they know what the problem is and where it is happening so they also work to get help.
Rescufy calls 9-1-1 so that you can speak to a 9-1-1 operator to get help as soon as possible.
Rescufy provides a “View Patient Information” button that provides easy access to pertinent medical information for first responders and emergency room personnel.

Why We Need Your Help
The Rescufy app is up and running, and thousands of people are already using it with great success!  It is tried and true, but we are driven to make it even better.
Research has shown that only 60% of those at risk know that epinephrine should be carried at all times, and only 40% actually carry it. In addition, only 50% of those who did carry in this study had expired epinephrine with them.
Your donation will allow Rescufy to implement the latest technology and best practices to provide the best resources to the severe allergy and asthma communities!  
Rescufy Connect will provide a tool to help everyone remember their epi, so that this life saving medication can be available when needed.  Furthermore, Rescufy Connect will ensure accurate information and best practices are available to caregivers so they can also get help accurately and quickly should anaphylaxis happen! 
All funds raised will go directly to....

Software development to add the Bluetooth connectivity feature to Rescufy Connect to help ensure that people keep their their epinephrine on hand.
Software development to add the ability for Rescufy Connect to temporarily hand off profile information so caregivers can get help accurately and quickly in the event of anaphylaxis.
Systems and support necessary to implement new features for Rescufy Connect.

Support for increasing awareness and distribution of Rescufy Connect to maximize impact on the allergy and asthma communities.

The Impact
Rescufy Connect will ensure that no one ever leaves home without their Epi again and that caregivers will have the information and tools they need to quickly and accurately get help in the event of anaphylaxis.  With your help, Rescufy Connect can improve the statistic that only 50% of people who should carry epinephrine keep it with them.  And, Rescufy Connect can help parents of children with severe allergies and asthma have peace of mind when they do have the chance to get away by ensuring caregivers have the information and tools necessary to get help quickly and accurately in the event of anaphylaxis.
Other Ways You Can Help
That you for your support!  We hope you will share our campaign with friends who may be interested or who may benefit from our app.   Visit www.rescufy.com to learn more about us, and to stay in touch!  

Give to the campaign for Rescufy Connect

Download the original Rescufy app and write a review on the app store page
Spread the word on social media
E-mail us at info@rescufy.com with questions or ideas

story:
The greater the distance one chooses to conquer, the more inner strength and the ability to rely on intuition and one's feeling is required. The uniqueness of my approach is the combination of rich experience and tested technical tips along with development of the right attitude and strong inner motivation to move forward. I am a supporter of the holistic approach - in order to perform your best, everything is important: training regimen, optimal nutrition, correct vitamins and supplements, positive attitude, and the development of a number of strong inner qualities. 

All my solutions are tested in the most extreme conditions during long-term training, ultra-long multi day races, and even an Ironman triathlon. Findings that helped me not to give up and move forward during the hardest days are of particular interest. That is why, along with the outer techniques and tips that are constantly updated, I love to use ancient mantras, meditation and prayer. Constant support of the inner will and help for the outer body have proved to be a very efficient combination! 

We have to believe in a higher Power.
Only by believing in a higher Power
Can we go beyond and beyond
Our limited, human capacity.

[Sri Chinmoy, Sport and meditation]


I am not only a coach, but I am also an active athlete. I continue to take part in the world’s longest foot race of 3,100-Miles. There are 9 finishes in this race to my credit up to date with a personal best of 48 days + 3:57:19 (2014). In order to achieve that, I had to average 64.4 miles/103 km per day. 


Personal Bests

  • 2 miles - 10:46
  • Marathon 26.2 miles - 2:46:04
  • 47 miles - 6:18:25
  • Ironman Triathlon - 11:10:50
  • 6 day race - 325 miles
  • 3100-Mile Race - 48 days + 3:57:19 (64.4 miles/day)

Overall, I have over 30 years of experience in running.

You can get acquainted with me closer at my website www.Stutisheel.org


Books

I feel lucky to some extent - besides performing, I also like to share my love of running through books, motivational speeches, and inspiring communications. I get utmost happiness in seeing other people succeed, because I myself know the hard work it takes to transcend one's limits. So far I have four books to my credit:

Eat To Run: holistic nutrition for the ultra-marathon runner.

Run Journey Become: the 3100-Mile footrace of a life-time.

My first Ironman: from dream to finish.

Esoteric Project Management.
Holistic life-management based on spiritual practice and meditation. (Lots of exercises )

You can look inside my books at Amazon. Here I'm offering them discounted in .pdf format.


The first time I seriously thought about professional coaching was the last year, when I trained my daughter from zero running experience to her first marathon, all in 7 months. I believe in her, and she believes in me - this way we continue our trainings to this day.

With a personal trainer there is no need to repeat past mistakes that leaves one with injuries or despair. We will leave only those that will help to make the fastest progress :)

Using my experience, it will be much much easier for you to create a holistic picture from the vast sea of available ​​information on preparation for the ultra-long races. 

And one more thing: the longer the distance, the less experts there are to guide you properly. As for the longest race in the world - 3100-Mile Race - there are only 38 people who have crossed the finish line in 19 years of the competition...


Fields of training

The greater the distance you aim for, the more unique experience I have to help you. The more serious your attitude towards training is, the more effective our work will be. On average, an athlete needs a few years, or even five, to reach the best performance in any given distance.

I can help you train for your personal best performance in races from a marathon to 3100-Miles, and everything in between. Also, half-Ironman and Ironman triathlons are something I am personally very familiar with, along with any other races that require extraordinary training.


Prices and conditions

You can find basic service options to the right of the campaign page.  All prices offered during this campaign are promotional and are valid while the campaign is active only. That is, only now you have the opportunity to purchase services even up to the August 2017 with a discount!

After your application, I will ask you to fill in a short questionnaire to better understand where the starting point for us is. And after the online interview, we will finalise our agreement. If, for some reason, during the interview you or I will see that the cooperation is not working out, I will gladly refund the paid amount back to you. Otherwise, I do not offer refunds past that point.

For our work to be efficient, you will require a GPS-enabled watch (preferably Garmin) with a heart rate monitor, and account in a training tracking system (eg. www.connect.garmin.com). Our online communications will happen via any means available for you: Skype, Viber, Facetime, etc. From time to time you may need a smartphone with a video camera to record your workouts.

I will be able to start your coaching in the first week of August 2016, after my finish in the 20th edition of the 3100-Mile Self-transcenedence Race. You may follow the race progress on my blog.


What you'll get

  • Your up-to-date physical fitness evaluation
  • One-on-one communication and coaching with Stutisheel Oleg Lebedev - the only coach-runner, 9-time finisher of the world’s longest 3100-Mile Race
  • Customized training plan based on your goals, life schedule and your body’s adaptation to exercise
  • Suggestions for the nutrition, vitamins and supplements that meets your performance goals
  • Coaching tips for every workout and race
  • Answers to any of your questions along the way via email
  • Race day strategies
  • Holistic approach in learning how to train, recover and find your life flow
Together with you, I'll experience failures and celebrate your victories. In the battlefield of life against ignorance, doubts and limitations we will fight on one side. And will reach new heights for sure!

Do not delay your progress - apply now!

Coaching tips for every workout and race
Answers to any of your questions along the way via email
Race day strategies

Together with you, I'll experience failures and celebrate your victories. In the battlefield of life against ignorance, doubts and limitations we will fight on one side. And will reach new heights for sure!

story:
Summary

Soccratis LLC is an online marketplace for soccer coaches and players to meet and work together. Soccratis will be the middle man and will charge a commission per practice booked through us. 

  • Diego Uribe is the founder of  Soccratis. He is a former Barcelona F.C. youth system player and passionate about soccer. He holds a Ph.D.
  • This campaign is intended to raise $100,000 for web design and marketing.
  • This money will help bring awareness to a wider audience and put together an online venue with full capabilities. 
  • All practices will be insured: that is the catch. If you decide to go solo with the coach, you are at your own risk. 

What We Need & What You Get

This is the breakdown of the expenses and you reward:

  • Soccratis wants to raise $100,000: $25,000 will go to web design and user experience and $75,000 for marketing for the next 3 years.
  • In the case, I do not reach my goal, I will allocate my funds to web design and user experience.

The Impact

Your contribution will have an enormous impact on:

  • Soccer is spreading like wildfire in the United States. More than 25 million people in the play soccer on a regular basis. Every year there are more professional teams in the MLS. Audiences and ratings are soaring. Let’s connect practitioners and coaches together!
  • Diego Uribe is a former professional soccer player that knows the game from the inside, a researcher with numerous publications by trade and a passionate online marketer.
  • Soccratis will have 5 divisions: Soccer Tours, HATO (Help an Ayso Team Out), Online Shop, Soccer Consultancy, and a professional Spanish support to create an amateur soccer club. The key to accomplish all this is proportional to the number of coaches we can get to sign up.

Risks & Challenges

What are the obstacles in front of Soccratis.

  • Getting coaches to sign up. We need a massive amount of coaches all over US and Canada. I already got many coaches to sign up. I know how to do it on a grand scale but need financial support.
  • How will I overcome this obstacle? Intensifying the marketing campaign, attending soccer tournaments, reaching the mass media…

Other Ways You Can Help

You would like to help, but at the moment you can’t! No problem, you are welcome still.

  • Pass the word out to your friends and if you like soccer we always have a project for you.
  • You can always use Indiegogo share tools!

The Soccratis Mission

As an on-demand private soccer coaching service, the coaches and trainers at Soccratis have made it our mission to provide a higher level of coaching practices while adhering to our own high standards of professionalism and excellence. We are a client centric private coaching service dedicated to our athletes and helping them achieve their goals.

The Goal

If your goal is to play better soccer and you want the expert advice that only our professional team of coaches and trainers can provide, contact the Soccratis team and let us create a personalized training plan just for you.

Our Team

Our team of coaching professionals has the knowledge and experience today's soccer players needs to reach new heights in their playing career. Our founder, (your name here) believes that by offering his knowledge and innovative training practices, drills and coaching, he can make today's up and coming players, tomorrow's superstars.

 Harry A. Andreas

Mr. Andreas has over 35 years of engineering experience in the aerospace industry, where his designs span the gamut of airborne, space, and ground-based systems. His multi-disciplinary experience covers a wide range of system, mechanical, structural, and thermal designs for both domestic and international customers. In addition, Mr. Andreas has represented both Hughes Aircraft and Raytheon Systems Company on international standards boards for ANSI, IEEE, and VSO.

Mr. Andreas has been supporting he sport of soccer football for decades as player, administrator, and referee. He was Regional Commissioner for AYSO Region 18, the second largest region in the country, which has over 3600 players on 350+ teams, and 1500 adult volunteers. He is a National referee and referee instructor for AYSO and recently retired from National Federation of High Schools.

 Diego Uribe

Diego is a former Barcelona CF youth system product. He has played soccer professionally in diferent teams in Spain. He believes that the United States will be a soccer world power very soon with dedication, persevearance and good coaching practices. He has an outstanding knowledge of everything related to soccer. He has a P.h.D in Applied Linguistics and and a MA in administration.

  Todd Loewenstein

Todd is a technology executive who has worked in the Internet space for 20 years, helping to take two companies public on the NASDAQ stock exchange. He also managed an Internet infrastructure company for more than 13 years. Currently, he serves as the Senior Director of Sales of The Americas for castLabs, a company that specializes in media services including video content security and delivery.
