Currently, he serves as the Senior Director of Sales of The Americas for castLabs, a company that specializes in media services including video content security and delivery.

story:
Intro

We live in a time of viral outbreaks. Distance is something that has been shortened between people through technology, but somehow the majority is still very far from enjoying a good health, and for them accessing a healthcare system  is something that is not even a possibility.


Millions of lives can be saved by giving them and their healthcare professionals tools to connect and receive backup. An immediate effect doing this is treatments applied at the right time.

The outbreak of Ebola in 2008 showed us how fast and easy a disease can spread when professionals and patients don´t receive support.

BeeGeo is the system that allows a healthcare professional to gather information about a case and create a geographic alert. 


So how does BeeGeo works?

When an alert is created other professionals and healthcare organizations are immediately notified, and they can see the information on the case and get in contact with the professional in order to start the help.

A new form of preventive health is created. 

That fresh information is going to be gathered, and understandable reports are going to be issued for the general population. This gives everyone the chance of knowing what is going on.

You are going to be able to protect your beloved ones.

More complete reports are going to be issued for other professionals and organizations so they can be alert and understand what they can face in the future.

What does ¨This works for any type of case?¨ means?

Literally that all healthcare issues can be addressed.


And since health is a human right BeeGeo is free for all users!


Why Bee?

Bees are one of the most advanced social animals. The way they communicate their findings is impressive. They work together and care about each other, they protect their environment and in the process help the rest of living organisms.

Healthcare systems should work in a lot of ways like them.

The world of healthcare is composed by different types of entities and the way they interact between each other is complex, but there are basic things that need to flow smoothly for all of them in order to reach real solutions.

The nectar of health is information and access to that information is one of the biggest problems we have.



All users need access to certain parts of other users information without invading each others privacy.

Patients need to keep track and ownership of their health record because it is their information!

Healthcare professionals, institutions and organizations need access to patients information to advance in the right direction.

This and more is what BeeMedics is focused on.

The planet provides us with a number of challenges and opportunities. The first level of interaction between the planet and our species is people in general and their healthcare professionals.

They have to collect and study that information and communicate it to the rest of the entities to receive the best support. 

One of the principles that make bees so successful in what they do is the ability receiving backup.

All the entities involved in healthcare need backup and need to work together.

 
 

What we need 


The 50 k that we are going to get from all our supporters are essential, with that we are going to finish and launch BeeGeo.

If we exceed our 50 k goal let us tell you where is it going to go.

BeeGeo is one key element in a big system named BeeMedics that is about making your health yours.

BeeMedics is the comprehensive system that wants everyone to have access to the best healthcare system. With this patients will access great professionals and institutions that want to help them.

We believe that your health information is yours and you should be the one who manages it. 

We also believe healthcare professionals need a platform to work on. A place where they can keep record of and access a lot more information so they can own their practice and give you the best service.

Finally we know that healthcare organizations and commerce need part of all that information in order to be able to make important advancements.

So we designed a system where every user needs are met without invading the privacy of other users, and where they own and manage their information

The needs of every patient, professional and healthcare organization satisfied.

 So don´t worry if we overpass the goal because we will develop more parts of BeeMedics.

      

Impact and legacy

Our legacy is to give everyone the chance of being well treated by healthcare professionals that are backed up by a wise healthcare community.

We want everyone to be able to access a good healthcare system. 

It is all about making people´s lives better.
     

Risks and Challenges


One of the most important elements in a healthcare treatment is time.  Time translate into lives, the implicit risk is not to create BeeGeo.

Many will say that our biggest challenge is to keep up to be the most comprehensive system, but we don´t worry about that. We are guided by our user needs and we are faithful to them. This is the cornerstone of our system and we know that if we count with the support of our users.

The loyalty we want from you is won by your complete satisfaction with the system.

We will always respect and enforce your privacy in our system.

This is health as it should be!


Rewards


BeeGeo is about giving everyone a chance to be a part of the best healthcare system. 

The first reward is knowing that you are saving millions of lives, but getting gifts is really cool and we will love to see you using our products; therefore, we have designed some gifts for you:

BeeGeo T-shirts


BeeGeo Documentary Film


The creation of a documentary film from the first day has never been made with a global healthcare technology initiative, so some time ago we received an offer of making a movie that documents the whole process. 

We created a partnership with a great film studio that is going to make it possible.

Filming the process and the results of BeeGeo in people´s lives is going to be amazing.

From the $50  to the $1000 reward you are going to be involved in this.

Bee part of it!

By the way if you have any ideas or want to be part of this you know where to find us!

Our Team


Others ways you can Bee part of our Hive!


In our Beehive there are tasks for everyone.

If you can´t be a financial backer there are a lot of other things you can do.

The most important one is to share this project with everyone you know.

Share it in your Social Networks share our videos and our Indiegogo page.

The reason why we decided to launch BeeGeo on Indiegogo is because the system is for the people, so we want it to be by the people.


So please share and let´s start saving millions of lives by giving them the chance of being part of the best healthcare system.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram! 

Share with us your ideas, your experiences. Real knowledge comes from all different types of sources.
     
This is just the beginning...
story_txt:
Intro


We live in a time of viral outbreaks. Distance is something that has been shortened between people through technology, but somehow the majority is still very far from enjoying a good health, and for them accessing a healthcare system  is something that is not even a possibility.



Millions of lives can be saved by giving them and their healthcare professionals tools to connect and receive backup. An immediate effect doing this is treatments applied at the right time.
The outbreak of Ebola in 2008 showed us how fast and easy a disease can spread when professionals and patients don´t receive support.

BeeGeo is the system that allows a healthcare professional to gather information about a case and create a geographic alert. 


So how does BeeGeo works?

When an alert is created other professionals and healthcare organizations are immediately notified, and they can see the information on the case and get in contact with the professional in order to start the help.

A new form of preventive health is created. 


That
fresh information is going to be gathered, and understandable reports are going
to be issued for the general population. This gives everyone the chance of knowing what
is going on.
You are going to be able to protect your beloved ones.


More complete
reports are going to be issued for other
professionals and organizations so they can be alert and understand what they
can face in the future.
What does ¨This works for any type of case?¨ means?
Literally that all healthcare issues can be addressed.



And since health is a human right BeeGeo is free for all users!


Why Bee?

Bees are one of the most advanced social animals. The way they communicate their findings is impressive. They work together and care about each other, they protect their environment and in the process help the rest of living organisms.


Healthcare systems should work in a lot of ways like them.
The world of healthcare is composed by different types of entities and the way they interact between each other is complex, but there are basic things that need to flow smoothly for all of them in order to reach real solutions.

The nectar of health is information and access to that information is one of the biggest problems we have.


All users need access to certain parts of other users information without invading each others privacy.
Patients need to keep track and ownership of their health record because it is their information!Healthcare professionals, institutions and organizations need access to patients information to advance in the right direction.This and more is what BeeMedics is focused on.
The planet provides us with a number of challenges and opportunities. The first level of interaction between the planet and our species is people in general and their healthcare professionals.
They have to collect and study that information and
communicate it to the rest of the entities to receive the best support. 

One of the principles that make bees so successful in what they do is the ability receiving backup.All the entities involved in healthcare need backup and need to work together.  
What we need 


The 50 k that we are going to get from all our supporters are essential, with that we are going to finish and launch BeeGeo.
If we exceed our 50 k goal let us tell you where is it going to go.
BeeGeo is one key element in a big system named BeeMedics that is about making your health yours.
BeeMedics is the comprehensive system that wants everyone to have access to the best healthcare system. With this patients will access great professionals and institutions that want to help them.

We believe that your health information is yours and you should be the one who manages it. 
We also believe healthcare professionals need a platform to work on. A place where they can keep record of and access a lot more information so they can own their practice and give you the best service.
Finally we know that healthcare organizations and commerce need part of all that information in order to be able to make important advancements.
So we designed a system where every user needs are met without invading the privacy of other users, and where they own and manage their information
The needs of every patient, professional and healthcare organization satisfied.
 So don´t worry if we overpass the goal because we will develop more parts of BeeMedics.
  

Impact and legacyOur legacy is to give everyone the chance of being well treated by healthcare professionals that are backed up by a wise healthcare community.We want everyone to be able to access a good healthcare system. It is all about making people´s lives better. 
Risks and Challenges

One of the most important elements in a healthcare treatment is time.  Time translate into lives, the implicit risk is not to create BeeGeo.



Many will say that our biggest challenge is to keep up to be the most comprehensive system, but we don´t worry about that. We are guided by our user needs and we are faithful to them. This is the cornerstone of our system and we know that if we count with the support of our users.
The loyalty we want from you is won by your complete satisfaction with the system.
We will always respect and enforce your privacy in our system.
This is health as it should be!


Rewards
BeeGeo is about giving everyone a chance to be a part of the best healthcare system. 
The first reward is knowing that you are saving millions of lives, but getting gifts is really cool and we will love to see you using our products; therefore, we have designed some gifts for you:
BeeGeo T-shirts





BeeGeo Documentary Film
The creation of a documentary film from the first day has never been made with a global healthcare technology initiative, so some time ago we received an offer of making a movie that documents the whole process. We created a partnership with a great film studio that is going to make it possible.
Filming the process and the results of BeeGeo in people´s lives is going to be amazing.
From the $50  to the $1000 reward you are going to be involved in this.Bee part of it!By the way if you have any ideas or want to be part of this you know where to find us!
Our Team




Others ways you can Bee part of our Hive!


In our Beehive there are tasks for everyone.

If you can´t be a financial backer there are a lot of other things you can do.

The most important one is to share this project with everyone you know.

Share it in your Social Networks share our videos and our Indiegogo page.

The reason why we decided to launch BeeGeo on Indiegogo is because the system is for the people, so we want it to be by the people.



So please share and let´s start saving millions of lives by giving them the chance of being part of the best healthcare system.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram! 

Share with us your ideas, your experiences. Real knowledge comes from all different types of sources.
 
This is just the beginning...

story:
The first alarm clock was created by Plato around 400 BC. We've had plenty of time to design the perfect alarm clock yet, everyday millions of people wake up late or tired. It's because we wake up in the middle of a sleep cycle instead of the end, and the alarm clock has a lot to do with it. It's time to rethink sleep and the alarm clock.

Smartware Labs is revolutionizing the alarm clock by developing the world's smartest soundless wake up system. It predicts your ideal wake up time and wakes you gradually with lights and taps.

The Soundless Alarm helps users wake up at the end of a sleep cycle without loud or annoying sounds. Wakerapper adjusts your wake up time according to your routine and traffic, so you wake up on time and refreshed every day.

Together it's the smartest, soundless alarm clock.

(Live Demo of the Soundless Alarm)

Can I use Wakerapper without the sleep sensor?

Yes. Wakerapper will still help you find your ideal wake up time and function as a regular alarm on your phone.

 

How do I order a different colored clip?

When we reach our goal, users will receive a follow up email to choose from the available colors.

 

How do I charge the sleep sensor?

The sensor comes with a micro-usb charger. Use the app to pair the sensor and a battery life indicator shows the remaining charge on the battery.

 

When will pre orders ship?

We expect to ship our early bird orders before Christmas and the rest of our orders in January. 

 

When will the app be released?

Version 4 of Wakerapper is available for iOS in the app store now.  We listen to our users throughout the project to find ways to make it better. An Android version will be released in 2017.

story:
De Ademrevolutie

Als adem- en stemtherapeut stelt Carry al 41 jaar het belang vast van de buikadem tijdens het spreken. Het is de sleutel tot rust, ontspanning en balans. Oorspronkelijk bij de geboorte komen onze geluiden uit de buik en als peuter en kleuter brabbelen we onze eerste woordjes met een buikadem. Helaas verdwijnt die gezonde gewoonte al op jonge leeftijd door stress. En dat zorgt voor allerlei problemen op latere leeftijd. 

Het is onze missie om ervoor te zorgen dat werkelijk iedereen de correcte buikadem opnieuw toepast tijdens het spreken. Carry creëerde een eenvoudige methode die je snel en makkelijk laat begrijpen hoe je dat doet. En het goede nieuws is: iedereen kan het opnieuw leren! Simpelweg omdat we het ooit allemaal hebben gekund en we het gelukkig nooit 100 procent zijn verleerd. 

En liefst van al willen we voorkomen dat kinderen hun buikadem afleren. Eenvoudige instructies over ademen kunnen volstaan om hen te laten opgroeien met het besef hoe spreken natuurlijk werkt, bijvoorbeeld door te zeggen dat hun buikje moet bewegen als ze lezen en spreken en niet hun borst en hun schouders. En dat ze nooit naar adem moeten happen. We geloven dat als ze opgroeien met die inzichten, we veel ellende kunnen voorkomen. En dat goed ademen hen veel positiefs biedt. 

Daarom hebben we dit boek samen geschreven. Ook Pascale Naessens, Michael Van Peel, Tom De Cock, Katelijne Boon, Alex Agnew, Natalia Druyts, Matteo Simoni, Pieterjan Desmedt, An Vanderstighelen, Nele Somers en Greet Wouters werkten aan dit boek mee door hun ervaring te delen. Hun getuigenissen vind je terug in het boek.

Hopelijk wordt het boek een grote aanwinst voor jou en mag het overal met je meereizen. Eerst in je rugzak en dan verinnerlijkt, in de vorm van een hoger levenscomfort. 

Wat hebben we nodig?

We hebben het geluk gehad om een uitgever te vinden die het boek voor ons publiceert. Dus … waar hebben we jouw hulp dan nog voor nodig? 

Wel, het zijn moeilijke tijden om een boek uit te brengen. Een voorwaarde van de uitgever om ons boek te publiceren was dat we zèlf de eerste 300 exemplaren zouden aankopen. Dit is een smak geld! Daarom vragen we je hulp om deze 300 boeken te financieren door een exemplaar via deze crowdfunding te kopen. We maken hier zelf geen winst op. Het verzamelde bedrag gaat integraal naar de aankoop van de boeken

En wat als we te veel inzamelen? Heel simpel: dat geld gaan we gebruiken om in scholen workshops en/of lezingen te geven over correct adem- en stemgebruik. Zo zijn we nòg een stapje dichter bij ons doel!

En als we ons doel niet halen, stort Indiegogo het verzamelde bedrag naar ons door. Daarmee kunnen we dan al een deel van de 300 boeken financieren. 

Wat krijg je in ruil?

Door het boek via de crowdfunding te kopen doe je een mooi voordeel: je koopt het boek aan met een grote korting. In de winkel betaal je €22.99, via de crowdfunding €18. 

Kies hiernaast je opties: met of zonder verzending. Heb je wat meer te geef? Doe dan een steunbijdrage.

Ik heb geen budget, hoe kan ik toch helpen? 

Je kan ons heel erg helpen door deze crowdfunding campagne te delen met je vrienden. 

Ik heb het boek al, hoe kan ik toch helpen?

Als je het boek al hebt, kan je een steunbijdrage doen. 

Vertel me meer over de Ademrevolutie!

Met ons boek De Ademrevolutie willen we een belangrijke missing link in het ademverhaal naar buiten brengen. 

In deze stressvolle tijden ademt haast niemand nog met de buik. Het besef is wel gegroeid dat de buikadem de sleutel is tot rust, ontspanning en balans. Dus gaan we er massaal naar op zoek in yoga, mindfulness, kinesitherapie en meditatie. Maar één ding zien we over het hoofd: tijdens al deze trainingen spréken we niet. En ademen is ook spreken. De lage adem die we hebben in de yoga, dus als we niet praten, zet zich helaas niet automatisch over in een buikadem tijdens het spreken. Om die te behouden, moeten we hem laten samenwerken met onze stembanden en spreekspieren, en dat is ons lichaam verleerd. Het resultaat van yoga beklijft dus niet in het dagelijkse leven.

Baby’s, peuters en kleuters praten en ademen nog op een natuurlijke manier. Maar ze verleren dat door stress, bijvoorbeeld terwijl ze leren lezen en rekenen. De omgeving merkt daar niets van, omdat ze er niet mee bezig is en er niets van af weet. Niemand stuurt het kind bij, waardoor het fout ademen er ongemerkt inslijpt en een gewoonte wordt. Zo gaan op den duur de meeste mensen door het leven met een hoge stressadem terwijl ze praten. Op die manier blijven ze in hun lichaam stress ervaren. 

In De Ademrevolutie leggen we uit waarom de buikadem tijdens het spreken verdwijnt en leren we je aan de hand van heldere oefeningen, illustraties en inspirerende getuigenissen hoe je de lage adem altíjd kunt behouden. Zo verbetert je stem, verhoogt je zelfvertrouwen en vermindert je stress. Kortom, de buikadem verhoogt je levenscomfort.

story:
Try before you buy

Android app:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fitnesses

IOS app: send your email to support@fitnesses.app with the subject "App download" to receive the app to your email (this is the only way for a discounted period)

Website: www.fitnesses.app

Real-life examples: 

  1.  The trainer creates a workout and adjusts the intensity for you.
  2. Nutritionist shows how much you should eat of your favorite food.
  3. Improve your mindset by creating new habits.

Should Fitnesses assist you on your journey? 

     Our next goal is to :

 

  •  Decrease the living costs of members by partnering with supermarkets and bookstores. Users will trade in-app points for discounts to eventually return invested money. 

  • We will also add the “knowledge” feature to build up *emotional intelligence and connect with free online courses to make your personal development easier.​

*In a nutshell, Emotional Intelligence is the ability to understand the behaviors of others and controlling own emotions, which results in less stress and conflicts. 

 

 We want to help anyone interested to be truly happy, fit, and successful in what they do. WHY? 

We are inspired by the current society's flaws. Our vision is a healthier and psychologically improved society, powered by our example.​ Our goal is to improve it by equipping every single person with powerful mindsets and bodies for greater achievement. 

Who is behind this project?

    

 Hello, I'm Marko, a personal trainer with 12 years of experience, intending to make it simpler for you to improve your shape, lifestyle, and personal growth.

My "Fitnesses" team ( Sava, Nenad, Nikola, Ava, Ivan, and Bojana) supports me in making this a reality for all of us. 

 

Marko, the project owner, in a few words:

I consider myself a happy, fulfilled person in every aspect of life, with a habit of consistent self-improvement, which in turn made my life very enjoyable.

I don't have a university degree, but I became successful, first as a  personal trainer(also working with several celebrities), and after 5 harsh years gained IT and business knowledge(thankfully to my mentors) to assist anyone worldwide through "Fitnesses".

And the app is the tool for it, if I can do it, you can too!

 

 

Testimonials of satisfied clients 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now, imagine yourself fitter and healthier and celebrating the life goal you've just achieved. Well, three app elements will make it happen:

If you believe that everyone should work both on their mind and body, help us change the population by improving your character and encouraging others to grow.   

When referring, must use IndieGoGo share tools: 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

What We Need & What You Get

Dear backers, first you receive beta access to the app. 
Based on your experience, please share feedback and suggestions on which service we can provide or improve to make your personal development smooth. 
After the official release, users will have active membership according to contribution.

 
We need roughly €8.000 to cover initial business costs and invest in further improvement based on your feedback and requested capabilities of the "Fitnesses".
Regardless of reaching the goal, we will be able to run but at a slower pace and slower development due to the nature of organic growth.

"Fitnesses" will improve world society by changing every single user for the better by rewarding their knowledge, mindset, and health improvement, and give a healthier body by guiding them through exercise, nutrition, and habits.

story:
KNOW YOURSELF!

When you zone in on your breath, you get in touch with yourself in a way that you never would otherwise. This is the power of yoga; it is the magic of our own capacity to work through and handle the energy that flows through our bodies. Dr. T. Suresh Kumar a lifelong yoga enthusiast and researcher. is intimately familiar with this energy, and now, in order to share his knowledge, he is developing a 23-episode documentary film series. This film series will cover a wide variety of yoga lessons, benefiting people regardless of their skill levels.

 INTERPRETATIONS

FROM WORLD EXPERTS

Yoga is a time-tested, extensively-documented Indian spiritual discipline that involves elaborate body postures and powerful mind exercise processes, which energize the body and influence your physiology, immunology, digestive system, and biochemistry, significantly improving the health and defending against diseases. By guiding your mind toward stronger focus, yoga lowers stress levels, enhances mind-body coordination, and purifies consciousness so that tranquility becomes possible.

Featuring information presented by yoga experts and scholars from India, Europe, and North America, this series will illustrate yoga from a variety of perspectives and go into greater detail with regards to India’s original and authentic form of yoga. From step-by-step yoga asanas to meditation instructions, this is a series that no one want to miss.

Also, included in the production is medical interpretations of yoga and methods for enhancing mental and physical purity through coordination and balance.

LEND US A HAND

Right now, we are turning to you, Indiegogo backers, for help raising $100k. This start-up capital will cover the costs of pre-production and production of Dr. Suresh’s 23-episode documentary film series. The world could use a pause, and with yoga, that is exactly what you get: a pause, to look around, to enjoy the world, to meet oneself. A rewards-based campaign, we have put together some stellar perks for everyone who gets involved.

We appreciate all contributions  and we thank you for your time.

 

 

WHO WE ARE

Medifilms Corporation is an independent production company based in San Jose, California, USA.  Specializing in originality and fact-based work, we produce informative, engaging, educational films and digital media content for television and mobile devices.  In partnership with many outstanding institutions and talented people such as doctors, scientists, researchers, and scholars, Medifilms Corporation is responsible for putting out visually stunning, high-resolution, and rich content films in the health, health care, biotechnology, pharmaceuticals, and wellbeing areas.

The philosophy of Medifilms Corporation revolves around raising awareness of the new generation, dreadful diseases and ever-evolving health risks associated with environmental pollution by providing first-class documentary films on various subjects related to health, healthcare and wellbeing.

OUR LEADER

Dr. T. Suresh Kumar earned his PH. D in life sciences, and he is an accomplished researcher, He has published two books, and his work has appeared in several other publications.

Due to his impressive list of accomplishments and his deep passion for all aspects of life sciences, biotechnology, health informatics, and motion picture technology, Dr. Suresh is recognized as a uniquely qualified leader for Medifilms Corporation. He has embarked on film projects that help to prevent diseases and improving healthcare around the world.

WHAT YOU GET

We are in the process of producing an informative, a 23-episode documentary film series on Yoga.  There have been many educational documentaries covering the subject of yoga, but until this series, nothing as extensive as this has been done before. Amassing original information from manuscripts written over 5,000 years ago, this is a must see, one-of-a-kind production.

You will hear from yoga experts and scholars from India, Europe, and North America.  The documentary will reveal new facts and describe, in greater detail, all aspects of India's original, authentic yoga.  Discover step-by-step yoga asanas, and other techniques such as pranayama and meditation, plus best practices, guidance, and methodologies of yoga theory and practice.

Also included are interpretations from medical professionals and the opinions of the world's leading yoga scholars.  The methods described in this series will not only improve the physical and mental health of millions of people, but possibly enhance their purity of mind and body.  Through mind coordination and balance, millions of viewers could reach superior health and well-being.

This film series contains every aspect of yoga in high resolution, vibrant visual imagery, and rich content.  The documentary film series will be exhilarating for yoga enthusiasts, teachers, training centers, yoga therapy facilities, and health care facilities, and it will find its proper place on the media shelves of universities and public libraries.

YOGA

The Road to Wellbeing & Tranquility

23-Episode Documentary Film Series

EACH TITLE FOCUSES ON A SPECIFIC YOGA TOPIC AND CAN BE VIEWED INDEPENDENTLY

4K resolution, Color, English, (21 Minutes each) Fits 30-minute TV slots

 

  1. Yoga – Origins and Ancient History.
  2. Yoga - Types of Yoga, Explained.
  3. Yoga – Yogi’s Code of Conduct.
  4. Yoga – The Surya Namaskar Explained.
  5. Yoga – Level 1 Asanas.
  6. Yoga – Level 2 Asanas.
  7. Yoga – Level 3 Asanas.
  8. Yoga – Level 4 Asanas.
  9. Yoga – The Art & Science of Pranayama – Level 1.
  10. Yoga –The Art & Science of Pranayama – Level 2.
  11. Yoga –The Technique of Thrataka.
  12. Yoga – The technique of Dhouti Kriyas.
  13. Yoga – The Art & Science of Meditation, Level 1.
  14. Yoga – The Art & Science of Meditation, Level 2.
  15. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas for Better Pulmonary Physiology.
  16. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas For Better Cardiovascular Health.
  17. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas For Better Digestive Health.
  18. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas For Diabetic Relief.
  19. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas For a Balanced Immune System & Hormonal Levels.
  20. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas For Better Neurological Health.
  21. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas For Stress & Anxiety Relief.
  22. Yoga – Asanas & Kriyas For a Weight Loss and Positive Emotions.
  23. Yoga, Consciousness and Siddhi.

 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

This extensive, beautiful documentary film series will change the lives of millions of people around the world.  Support us!

 

BUDGET

As we work hard to stick to our high standard of quality throughout this 23-episode production, our budget is only going to keep increasing. We plan on visiting hundreds of shoot locations throughout the Indian subcontinent, Europe, and America in addition to conducting dozens of interviews with medical professionals, scientists, and yoga scholars from around the world. We need to cover the costs of travel, legal work, permits, accounting, insurance, and more.

For help raising $100,000 of our budget, we are crowdfunding through Indiegogo. Given the positive impact that this series will have on the health of millions of people worldwide, we believe backers support us generously.

For post-production, marketing, and distribution, we may need to hold a second round of funding, but for now $100,000 should get the job done. As we work to raise these funds, we must express our deepest gratitude to you, our dear supporters, for the generosity you show us. Without you, this project would not be possible. The harder we work together, the better we can make this series. Every contribution brings us a little bit closer to our end goal.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

In spite of huge leaps forward in the prevention, treatment, and curing of multiple life-threatening diseases over the last century, there are still many diseases for which there are no cures and only minimal treatment options. On top of that, dangerous chemicals are regularly injected into our environment and our food chain, leading to a possible genetic aberrations in our world communities. As a consequence, identifying and preventing disease have become tasks more daunting than ever before. We have made it our mission to raise awareness of this new generation of super-diseases and to educate people on the ever-changing health risks for which pollution is responsible.

Our film production, spread out across several continents and involving hundreds of experts, presents a large and unique challenge, a fact of which we are all aware. We are equipped with advanced motion picture support systems and partnerships with leading specialists and well-prepared to take on all changes associated with executing this project well. Our production schedule is designed to accommodate any and all uncertainties.

We are intent on producing a world-class film series about authentic yoga, and we will work hard to keep our promises and deliver all 23 episodes of this series according to the timeline we have laid out.

TIMELINE

 

                            

 

STELLAR REWARDS!

This is a rewards-based campaign, and we have put together some stellar reward perks for everyone who gets involved. It is people like you who make the world a better place! We thank you for your time and support.

 

PERSONAL USE

You will be supporting the most informative film series on yoga ever produced. Want to get into yoga? Doing so is simpler than ever. Everything that you need to start out is included here, so you can start to train your mind and body. Unleash the power of yoga! Yoga isn’t just for the yogis who are practicing it already: it is for everyone, for people who want to improve themselves, for people who are struggling to get by, for people who know that they can do better but aren’t exactly sure how.

KNOW YOURSELF!
When you zone in on your breath, you get in touch with yourself in a way that you never would otherwise. This is the power of yoga; it is the magic of our own capacity to work through and handle the energy that flows through our bodies. Dr. T. Suresh Kumar a lifelong yoga enthusiast and researcher. is intimately familiar with this energy, and now, in order to share his knowledge, he is developing a 23-episode documentary film series. This film series will cover a wide variety of yoga lessons, benefiting people regardless of their skill levels.
 INTERPRETATIONS 
FROM WORLD EXPERTS 
Yoga is a time-tested, extensively-documented Indian spiritual discipline that involves elaborate body postures and powerful mind exercise processes, which energize the body and influence your physiology, immunology, digestive system, and biochemistry, significantly improving the health and defending against diseases. By guiding your mind toward stronger focus, yoga lowers stress levels, enhances mind-body coordination, and purifies consciousness so that tranquility becomes possible.
Featuring information presented by yoga experts and scholars from India, Europe, and North America, this series will illustrate yoga from a variety of perspectives and go into greater detail with regards to India’s original and authentic form of yoga. From step-by-step yoga asanas to meditation instructions, this is a series that no one want to miss.
Also, included in the production is medical interpretations of yoga and methods for enhancing mental and physical purity through coordination and balance.

For $50,000   Included in this elite kit:
1. Complete 23-episode yoga series. DVD set. QTY - 2.
2. All the yoga posters. Digital Copies.
3. “Executive Producer” film credit on all 23 episodes of the series and be listed on IMDB as Executive Producer.
4. “Diamond Supporter Group” memento will be presented.
5. Lifetime digital access to all video films produced by MediFilms Corporation.
6. Lifetime access to all books published by MediFilms Corporation.
7. Personal photo will be added to our company website’s supporters page.
8. Guest of Honor at annual company events. 
ESTIMATED MARCH 2018
 
If you prefer to send a check, mail to:
MediFilms Corporation
1659 Branham Lane, Suite F210
San Jose, CA 95118
 
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING OUR CAMPAIGN!
VISIT US ONLINE:  WWW.MEDIFILMS.COM
 
WHEN YOU CONTRIBUTE TO MEDIFILMS, YOU INVEST IN THE FUTURE
JOIN THE HEALTH REVOLUTION
 
Video in German


 
Video in Spanish

story:
No One Should Have to Wonder...

For decades, there has been this not so dirty little secret known among respiratory specialists. Up to 90% of common press and breathe, metered-dose inhaler (MDI) users fail to get the intended benefits from their medications due to inhaler misuse. And up to 85% of healthcare providers can't properly demonstrate or omit critical steps when using MDIs.  

                     

MDI misuse is common among both asthma & COPD sufferers and healthcare providers.  The fact is, it hasn't improved over the past 40 years.

So, does it really matter? Consider this, if you put gasoline in the back seat of your car, does it work as well as if you put gasoline into the gas tank?  Of course not. So, it's a similar problem facing the +50 million people in the U.S. who suffer from asthma and COPD who rely upon inhalers to breathe. When it comes to getting medications from inhalers into their lungs, the majority of people with asthma and COPD just get by on fumes.

Aren't There Already Devices to Help Inhaler Users?

Yep, they're termed "Spacers". Spacers are add-on devices to MDIs. They trap large medication particles generated from MDIs that would otherwise deposit in the mouth. There are a variety of rigid, "tube type" Spacers on the market. To name a few brands: Aerochamber, Vortex, Optichamber, modified Coke bottles, etc..     

                                                   

Affectionately, the FDA  refers to rigid, tube type Spacer devices as "essentially hollow tubes". 

The InspirEase®HFA​ is NOT a rigid, hollow, tube type Spacer.

A common problem with tube type Spacers is that you can't really tell when you have fully and effectively inhaled each puff into your lungs. Some people suggest that you might as well just use an empty toilet paper tube.

                                                                 

It seems that many people just can't tell the difference between using an inhaler with a tube type Spacer or without. It's one of the reasons why up to 87% of patients fail to use tube type Spacers regularly.

 

InspirEase®HFA​ Solution ("iHFA®")

                 

This device is investigational and not currently available for commercial sale.

By design, the iHFA solves the most common problems and concerns that people have using MDIs and tube type Spacers.

Simple and Easy to Use

Simply attach a press and breathe MDI to the InspirEaseHFA, open the device, trigger the inhaler, and breathe in.        

No more wondering if you actually get the full puff from an inhaler into your lungs.

  1. See the bag collapse as you inhale the full puff.
  2. If you hear a whistle, you breathed in too fast for effective delivery of the medication into your lungs. 
        
         

See the bag collapse? Don't hear a sound? Rest assured, you have gotten the full puff of medication from your inhaler.

​

Compact Size

The InspirEase®HFA is more compact than most tube type Spacers.  It fits in the palm of your hand. The diameter of the collapsible bag is less than half the size of a standard toothbrush. The thickness is about the same size as a MDI that you would use in the iHFA®. The iHFA comes with a carry pouch.

What We Need & What You Get

So, unlike your favorite kitchen appliance, the InspirEase®HFA is a Class 2 regulated medical device and requires approval by the FDA prior to marketing and sales.  We need to raise funds, to move us along the path towards FDA approval.  

What do we need the funds for?

  • To finalize our assembly and manufacturing processes
  • Perform lab testing required for our 510K FDA approval
  • To file a formal  510k FDA submission with the FDA
  • And did we mention? Lawyers.

What do you get?

  • After FDA approval, for a single contribution of $100 or more, you will entitled to receive 3 FREE InspirEase®HFA devices (prescription required).
  • If you signed up during our pre-launch, you'll also get free Priority Rx service. 
  • And, everyone, just for reading about our campaign, enjoy  access to two free handouts that our Founder authored, one about Asthma and the other about COPD (click on the links):
    • Asthma-What You Need to Know
    • COPD-What You Need to Know

Are You an Angel Investor?

Abithas, Inc. is certified as a Qualified New Business Venture (QNBV) under the Illinois Angel Investment Tax Credit Program (#116J).  Investors in companies that are certified as QNBVs can receive a state tax credit equal to 25% of their investment (up to $2 million).  Contact us directly: info@abithas.com

The Impact

Each contribution brings us one step closer to being able to bring peace of mind to the +50 million people in the U.S. who depend daily upon inhalers to lead normal lives. The impact of inhaler misuse cannot be overstated.  It contributes to worsening asthma and COPD control, unnecessary hospitalization, increased medication side effects, and decreased quality of life.

Risks & Challenges

We've made it through numerous meetings and conversations with the FDA, and we have a clear, direct path to follow for regulatory approval.  Our advisory team is top notch. What is our greatest challenge? That we fail to raise enough enthusiasm and support to raise the necessary funds to bring the InspirEase®HFA to market.

About Our Founder

Edward E. Lisberg, MD FCCP CPI

So, for me, this is personal.  I have decades of experience as a specialist helping people with asthma and COPD, and I have served as a Principal Investigator for over 160 clinical trials in respiratory disease.   In over 20 years, no patient under my direct care required hospitalization for emergency asthma care. 

Apart from taking care of people with respiratory disease, I conducted clinical research trials for new and investigational medications and devices for asthma and COPD.  After years of participating in big pharma sponsored research, I realized that big pharma is focused primarily on medication endpoints and not patient-centered outcomes.  What does that mean?  It means that unless inhaler misuse directly adversely impacts medication approval and potential profits, big pharma has little interest in whether people effectively and consistently use inhaler devices. They've left it up to patients and their doctors to actually figure things out.

As a physician, I am bothered that the lives of too many people with asthma and COPD are needlessly impaired due to inhaler misuse. I am bothered that too few physicians seem to take notice or care that their patients need a better solution. 

I left my clinical and research practice, and up to this point, I have solely  funded all costs related to the formation of Abithas, Inc., and the development of the InspirEase®HFA.  Having over 30 years of clinical and research experience makes me believe in the need for the InspirEase®HFA. 

I care about being able to bring positive change to the lives of people with asthma and COPD. I believe that the InspirEase®HFA is that change.

And, that's all there is to it.

Everyone Can Help

I understand that not everyone may share my passion, but even if you cannot contribute to the fund, please forward the word about this campaign to your family and friends, or maybe, even the rest of the world.  Every person makes a difference.

story:
My goal was to raise funds to open a community fitness center for members of Fitness Now. After so many years being a loyal members of the gym at east Boca one day they were told the gym is closing the door in 2 days and forever. It did broke my hart to see those people cry . It made me sad to see they paid for one year membership upfront even few days before the gym closed . It made me sad they were being used by greedy gym owner who made illegally money on charged memberships and memberships sold to the other gym even knowing that the only way to sell memberships is if his business is going under. 

His business was not going under , he planed to close it down.  My goal was to open a new place and bring everyone back together. I was trying to raise funds and I was expecting help from those who I was trying to help . It seems funny but its actually very sad . 

I am moving forward with my life plan to complete my life purpose witch was and is to open holistic fitness center to help others not just to get in shape but also to heal and learn how to live healthy and happy hight quality life . I do appreciate any contribution witch will be used for donation .  Out there is so many people who need help who would love to know what to eat or how to work out but they have no money to afford it. 

Any money raised by this campaign I will use to give my time and knowledge to those who needs help . 

Thank you .

story:
Who Is pHembiotics?

  • My name is Nia Spicer and I am a Registered Nurse with a background in Labor & Delivery and public health.
  • Each year, millions of women in America suffer from Bacterial Vaginosis, Yeast Infections, and UTIs.  Many of these conditions reoccur even after treatment.  I created pHembiotics, an all natural women's health product line after my own battle with chronic common vaginal infections.  I hope to use my experience as a platform to positively impact and improve the lives of millions of women.
  • Your contributions to pHembiotics will go towards manufacturing costs of the product that could jumpstart the change in the lives of 21 million women in America who suffer from these conditions on a recurring basis.

What We Need & What You Get

  • pHembiotics is seeking to raise $6,000 to cover manufacturing and start-up costs. 
  • As supporters you get first access to pHembiotics and can choose from the following three options, each includes free shipping. You can buy 1 bottle at $25.00, 2 bottles for $50.00 or 3 bottles for $75.00.  If you are a male or don't experience issues with your vaginal health, give a bottle to a friend or loved one to improve their vaginal health and overall confidence!
  • If the $6,000 goal is not reached, contributions will still be used to bring pHembiotics to fruition however, it will delay the launch date as we explore other avenues of funding.

The Impact

  • Answer the call to become a part of the solution to women's vaginal health issues!  Your contribution could change the lives of 21 million women.  These women are our wives,  mothers, daughters, sisters, and friends.

  • pHembiotics will also donate 10% of our profits to the Pastoralist Child Foundation, a non-profit organization that works to end Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) in Kenya. This is a cultural practice that represents the right of passage into womanhood through the removal of the female clitoris, labia minora and/or labia majora without anesthetics or sterile surgical equipment.

  • pHembiotics also plans to provide product discounts for women of low socioeconomic status.

Risks & Challenges

  • As a healthcare professional, I have experience caring for women with these vaginal issues.  My educational training has also equipped me with skills to navigate medical literature and scientific research with emphasis on patient safety and quality assurance. However, I am not a physician or advanced licensed healthcare provider, therefore, I cannot prescribe or distribute medications.  pHembiotics is composed of natural ingredients involving no drugs. This product does not seek to replace antibiotic therapy but rather serves as an adjuvant with hopes to decrease chronic antibiotic use. 
  • Future goals for pHembiotics include conducting medical studies on the product and its effectiveness.  Although each ingredient in pHembiotics has been clinically studied, the proprietary formula itself has not.  These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA are not proven to diagnose, cure or treat a disease.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this video, like pHembiotics on Facebook and follow @pHembiotics on Instagram.  Share the exciting news with women you know that a solution to our problems is coming!  Also, raise awareness about Bacterial Vaginosis, Yeast Infections, UTIs, and FGM to decrease the shame and embarrassment surrounding these issues.
  • On behalf of pHembiotics, thank you for all your support!

Who Is pHembiotics?

My name is Nia Spicer and I am a Registered Nurse with a background in Labor & Delivery and public health.
Each year, millions of women in America suffer from Bacterial Vaginosis, Yeast Infections, and UTIs.  Many of these conditions reoccur even after treatment.  I created pHembiotics, an all natural women's health product line after my own battle with chronic common vaginal infections.  I hope to use my experience as a platform to positively impact and improve the lives of millions of women.
Your contributions to pHembiotics will go towards manufacturing costs of the product that could jumpstart the change in the lives of 21 million women in America who suffer from these conditions on a recurring basis.


What We Need & What You Get

pHembiotics is seeking to raise $6,000 to cover manufacturing and start-up costs. 
As supporters you get first access to pHembiotics and can choose from the following three options, each includes free shipping. You can buy 1 bottle at $25.00, 2 bottles for $50.00 or 3 bottles for $75.00.  If you are a male or don't experience issues with your vaginal health, give a bottle to a friend or loved one to improve their vaginal health and overall confidence!
If the $6,000 goal is not reached, contributions will still be used to bring pHembiotics to fruition however, it will delay the launch date as we explore other avenues of funding.


The Impact

Answer the call to become a part of the solution to women's vaginal health issues!  Your contribution could change the lives of 21 million women.  These women are our wives,  mothers, daughters, sisters, and friends.
pHembiotics will also donate 10% of our profits to the Pastoralist Child Foundation, a non-profit organization that works to end Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) in Kenya. This is a cultural practice that represents the right of passage into womanhood through the removal of the female clitoris, labia minora and/or labia majora without anesthetics or sterile surgical equipment.
pHembiotics also plans to provide product discounts for women of low socioeconomic status.


Risks & Challenges

As a healthcare professional, I have experience caring for women with these vaginal issues.  My educational training has also equipped me with skills to navigate medical literature and scientific research with emphasis on patient safety and quality assurance. However, I am not a physician or advanced licensed healthcare provider, therefore, I cannot prescribe or distribute medications.  pHembiotics is composed of natural ingredients involving no drugs. This product does not seek to replace antibiotic therapy but rather serves as an adjuvant with hopes to decrease chronic antibiotic use. 
Future goals for pHembiotics include conducting medical studies on the product and its effectiveness.  Although each ingredient in pHembiotics has been clinically studied, the proprietary formula itself has not.  These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA are not proven to diagnose, cure or treat a disease.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this video, like pHembiotics on Facebook and follow @pHembiotics on Instagram.  Share the exciting news with women you know that a solution to our problems is coming!  Also, raise awareness about Bacterial Vaginosis, Yeast Infections, UTIs, and FGM to decrease the shame and embarrassment surrounding these issues.
On behalf of pHembiotics, thank you for all your support!

story:
Short Summary

 


Dentoville Foundation is a Non-Profit Humanitarian organization founded in 2018 with a view to improve and cater for free oral health care for orphans, children and adults in rural areas. Almost all of the adults and children in rural populations in Nigeria have absolutely no dental care. There is no doubt that there is urgent need for dental care in many of these areas. Most of this people cannot afford neither have they been enlightened about their oral health care. This does not exclude the Orphans. Our Vision is to bring quality oral health care to these completely ignored underdeveloped areas, and to make significant difference in the lives of so many people, to see them smile with happiness in their hearts. Helping others is where we find hope.

Dentoville Foundation was formed with a philosophy in mind: offering quality oral healthcare to the less privileged. Continued improvement and innovative ideas is our policy as this will ensure progress for many years to come. We intend to focus on one simple strategy: Giving the best basic oral healthcare service possible.

The organization thus arranges a number of projects in rural areas and orphanage homes. We send out a substantial number of Volunteers, Dentists, Dental Hygienist, Dental assistants and health workers. It is of the utmost importance that our projects build on local partnerships with communities that know the local conditions and specific needs of the area. We arrange our activities in accordance with the values, rules and regulations of the communities we visit, this way we can ensure that our aid will reach the right target group. Dentoville Foundation’s projects are financed by members, sponsors and private donations

Our goal is to provide free dental care to the orphans, less privileged and those in rural areas. To give free basic oral health treatment to those who have no access to it. We are here to:


•    Provide dental care to as many needy orphans who lack good basic oral hygiene and dental care.

•    Create educational or prevention programs in rural areas.

•    Distribution of dental supplies such as toothbrushes and tooth paste at the villages and rural communities.

•    Reduce low self-esteem in rural areas associated with bad oral health.

Our Teams will travel to orphanage homes and remote villages with the aim of providing free dental care to the communities. 

Majority of these orphans do not have access to a dentist and even  if dentists were easy to access in these areas, money is also an issue. A majority of them don’t have enough money to pay for food let alone to get dental care. And it may even cost more than what they would consider worth paying when they would rather spend what little money they have on more important things like food. In the more rural areas, like the ones we serve, there is approximately 1 dental professional for every 100,000 to 300,000 people. So even if they had the money, access, or the resources to reach any dental care, they may not receive quality care because the dental worker is over worked or always too busy.

What We Need & What You Get

Volunteers 

New toothbrushes and tooth paste 

Customized tooth stationery 

Your contribution supports projects and touches many lives. Our sponsors can help us by donating to fund:


•    Acquiring used dental equipment’s – for example Dental equipments and mobile dental units.

•    Getting special care kits (containing tooth brush, tooth paste and dental floss) for the orphans.

•    Urgent expensive treatments.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Volunteer your skills

And that's all there is to it.

story:
WHO ARE WE?

The original Lost Boys Crew from the 2011-2012 season.

The Lost Boys Quidditch Club is a community team from the heart of Los Angeles, founded by two college players who loved the sport and wanted to keep playing after graduation, Michael Mohlman (UCLA) and Dan Hanson (Emerson College). "The Lost Boys’ branding was born out of deliberate choices to express the feeling of a team of graduates wanting to push forward with a sport that had been isolated to college campuses." –Austin Sharp. We welcome players from all over Los Angeles to join our weekly practices and to join our team because "lost" does not mean "alone." We play because we love the sport, and we grow because we work hard.

The 2018-2019 Lost Boys after the first tournament of the season, the Skrewts Memorial Cup. Photo credit: Shirley Lu Photography.

Since then, we've grown into a competitive and athletic team, full of players who are passionate about the sport and playing at the top level. We've proven time and time again that we're a team to be reckoned with, securing the Gold at the 2018 USQ Western Regional Championship and making it to the Final Four of the 2018 USQ National Championship. This season, we've had one of the biggest roster turnover the Lost Boys have ever seen and still managed to come take home the invisible bronze during the 2019 USQ Western Regional Championship. 

But now, we need your help to take our passion and our enthusiasm back to Round Rock, Texas to fight for the title at Quidditch Cup 12!

The 2018-2019 Lost Boys after taking third place at the 2019 USQ Western Regional Championship. This train goes straight to TEXAS!

 

Lost Boys Roster

#2 Ryan Smythe

#5 Doruk Yurdayar

#6 Justin Fernandez

#7 Chris Seto

#8 Kelsey Allen

#9 Jonathan Ramirez

#12 Kendrick Ushera-Surrell

#16 Amanda "Turtles" Nagy

#14 Luz Gutierrez

#18 Kym Couch

#19 Jamie Luby

#21 Princeton Nguyen

#22 John Luna

#23 Maya Zach

#24 Max Portillo

#26 Zach Little

#27 Cornelia Tzana

#28 Lindsey Simpson

#57 George Williams

#76 Connie Henderson

#88 Marc Capitulo

#98 Martha Connolly

 

Why we need your $upport:

Nationals is expensive, and we need all the financial help we can get. Your donations and purchases will go towards covering:

Registration: Team registration to compete at Nationals costs $450.

Hotels: Roofs and beds are important, and it will cost about $1,500 to house the whole team for the weekend.

Flights: A round-trip ticket to Texas costs $250+ per person and about $5,000 for the full roster to get there.

Here are some of our perks! 

*NEW ITEMS*

Does your head look hella weird in a snapback? So do ours! But have no fear, we got you covered! The Lost Boys Dad Hat (you know exactly the kind of hat we mean) is the perfect alternative to our ~classic~ snapback and our ~fresh~ baseball hat.  There are two options, we'll be reaching out on which you prefer before we place the order! 

3D Printed Custom Lost Boys Crest

Our resident architect-to-be, Doruk Yurdayar, is bringing his skills to the table with these snazzy BRAND NEW Lost Boys crests. The $5 option is the PLAIN Lost Boys Crest with no words added, the $10 option is a custom crest! You add your name, the name of your fave Lost Boy, or any other short enough phrase for some *extra* snazz! Hang it on your keys so you can always find them at the second star to the right! Available colors:

 

JERSEYS

We're selling both of our iconic jerseys this year! For $75 you can rep either yourself or your favorite player (here's #KeeperLindsey modeling both designs for you). 

Photo credit: Shirley Lu Photography.

 

SMOOCHES AND SLAPS

Available Players for Kissing (and *Slapping)

Forever Lost Boy Dr. Professor Justin "BOGEY" Bogart! This is you last chance to get your #Bogey2018 smooch!

Lindsey "Keeper Lindsey" Simpson*

Ryan Smythe*

Jonathan Ramirez*

Jamie Emma Luby

Cornelia Tzana

Kym Couch

Amanda "Turtles" Nagy*

Martha Connolly*

Kendrick Marquis Ushera-Surrell*

Princeton Nguyen*

Justin Fernandez*

John Daniel Luna*

Luz Gutierez*

Zach Little*

Marc Jason Capitulo*

Doruk Yurdayar*

George Williams

 

(Disclaimer: If an issue comes up that causes one of our players to need to revoke consent, you will receive a refund or choose another player)

 

PINNIES

Our pinnies were a huge hit last year, so by popular demand, we're bringing them back! With a reversible design on both front and back, they're perfect for any practice, hike, gym session, or even just to wear around the house. We all love ours, and now's the perfect time to get yours!

*Adult sizes only*

 

MORE HATS

The ~embroidered~ Lost Boys baseball cap is BACK! And so is our SnapBACK! (I will not apologize for this pun)


*Based on the company doing our embroidery, we will only be receiving 15 of each of hat for the first order, this will be first come, first served basis. Once it appears that we've sold all of those, we will post an update in the campaign, not all orders are coming through the Indiegogo so please place your order ASAP if you're interested in either style. If there's more interest we may be able to do another order before the summer or the beginning of next season. 


Last but not least...

 

NEVER GROW UP SHIRT

 If you're not a pinnie kind of person, have no fear! We've got a shirt design which happens to match our pinnies but just kind of.

We're not just selling awesome swag.

We've got a team full of working professionals and crafty individuals, we have a lot of additional skills you can take advantage of to help you in your own career hunt, art project, schoolwork, and more!

Or you can just pay to slap us in the face.

The 2018-2019 Lost Boys after snagging that podium spot at Western Regionals (minus all the people that had to catch their flights). Photo credit: Shirley Lu Photography.

**We want to make sure that everyone who wants our gear can get their hands on it, but due to the cost we will be charging extra for international shipping. If you order from an international address, we will be in touch to make sure everything is ironed out and you can get your items without us having to break the bank, unless we happen to find a generous sponsor or sugar daddy soon.**

story:
In Brief

  • Genomes.io is building a DNA data bank that puts users in full control of their genomic data. By addressing privacy, security and ownership concerns of DNA testing and data sharing, we aim to secure the future of personalised medicine.

 

  • How do we do it? We provide you with a DNA test kit to securely sequence your whole genome, and the resulting data is uploaded into to your personal DNA vault. This is a secure encrypted virtual data storage environment, which you can control access to using our mobile app. Using your web account, you can run genetic reports on your data and view results. In summary, each whole genome sequencing kit ordered will need to be activated by one user web account and connected to one mobile app. 

 

  • Who are we? We are a small team based in London, UK. Over the past two years we have built a fully functioning prototype and we are now ready to welcome the first users to the platform. Our DNA test kits are ready to ship.

 

  • Why we need your support? With your support, we aim to recruit the Founding Users onto the platform and quickly grow our DNA bank to critical mass to begin working with research organisations.

 

  • In addition, we will use campaign funds to further build out the platform to include more genetic reports (in addition to Carrier Status which is already built) including Ancestry, Health Risks, Drug Response and Personal Traits by 2021. Rewards that include Lifetime Reports will give you a free lifetime subscription to these reports, and all future reports, as they become available on the platform.

 

  • Our DNA sequencing labs? We work with CAP and CLIA-compliant partner laboratories to provide our customers with 30x whole genome sequencing, which all comply with our end-to-end privacy-preserving workflows.

 

  • What you see is what you get. All screenshots of the website and mobile application used in our video and throughout our Indiegogo page are actual footage of the functional platform, so we are ready to open the doors to our Founding Users. 

 

Our Story

We are on the brink of potentially the biggest change in health and wellbeing that the world has ever seen.

 

 

In recent years there has been an extraordinary leap in understanding of the human genome, and it’s complex yet powerful role in health and disease. 

In 2003, the first human genome was sequenced. The project took 13 years of vast collaboration between international research institutions and cost over $1 billion. But due to the technological advance of next-generation DNA sequencing technologies, this is now available for under $1,000. 

Today, we sit at the genesis of the genomics age.

 

 

By just 2025, 15% of the world’s population will have had their genome sequenced. Population-scale DNA sequencing projects are being established around the globe as healthcare systems are increasingly understanding the benefits of having access to this data. And in our lifetime, it is highly likely that everyone will have the opportunity to get their genome sequenced, as we look towards a future where healthcare is tailored specifically to you.

 

 

What is my genome?

Your genome is a unique 3 billion letter code present in every cell in your body, which serves as the biological blueprint that makes you - you. It is the most comprehensive piece of health data you will ever have, and it is powerful.

 

 

But we are just at the tip of the iceberg.

Billions of dollars are spent each year on understanding what the missing regions of DNA mean, and everyday new phenotype-genotype correlations are established and findings are published.

Because of the gold-mine of information genomic data holds, researchers are desperate to harness the power of this data to drive lifesaving medical research and accelerate bringing new treatments to those that need them most. 

Researchers desperately need access to your DNA data to enable:

  • Patient population stratification: Identifying and stratifying patient populations based on risk of disease progression.
  • Clinical trial optimisation: Analysis of genomic data enabling enhanced feasibility studies to inform key decision parameters for clinical trial development.
  • Biomarker development: Discovery of novel drug candidates through analysis of genetic biomarkers associated with disease phenotypes.
  • Companion diagnostic development: Development of companion diagnostics to determine which patient should receive what medication at what dose.
  • Drug repurposing and repositioning: Generating evidence to support applications of combination therapies with new or existing drugs. 

 

 

Making this data available to researchers is therefore paramount to usher in a new era of personalised medicine.

 

But sharing genomic data needs to be done responsibly - and that is what we do best.

 

Your genome is the most valuable piece of personal information you will ever have.

You only have one. And unlike your credit card details, passport numbers or home address, it cannot be changed. But currently, as soon as you have your DNA tested you lose all control of your data. 

And as genetic testing becomes more and more routine, and the more information we can decipher from a human genome, the known risks and currently unknown risks of sharing this data in the current model exponentially increase. 

 

Below are a few examples of how your DNA data has been treated over the last decade. And things are set to get a lot worse.

 

 

DNA databases are amassed, owned and controlled by organisations in order to share with third parties in multimillion dollar deals, and are increasingly liable to data hacks and breaches.

 

The Problem

 

 

In the current model, personal genomics companies profit not only by selling you a DNA kit and genetic reports, but by selling access to your data to third parties such as big pharma and biotech. You don’t own your DNA or have any say in who gets access to it.

 

Our Solution

 

 

With Genomes.io, you can reap the benefits of getting your whole genome sequenced, while never losing ownership or control of your most personal piece of information. Own your genome and take part in it’s value.

 

Our Technology Collaborators

To enable this, we have built out our tech stack to harness cutting edge data privacy and security technologies with market-leaders in their respective fields: Advanced Micro Devices (SEV technology) and Consensys (blockchain technology). 

Our data storage infrastructure is built in such a way that no one (including Genomes.io) is able to access your data. Only you hold the ‘private keys’ to your DNA Vault and control access to your data from your mobile device.

 

How It Works

 

Sample

Order your clinical grade (30x) whole genome sequencing kit and deposit a cheek swab sample. Your sample is shipped to our trusted DNA sequencing lab providers where your whole genome is sequenced. 

This is the gold standard of DNA sequencing that reads all 3 billion base pairs of your DNA (>99%), generating 10,000 times more data than other DNA tests (<0.02%). It is referred to as ‘30x clinical quality’ as your genome is re-sequenced 30 times before being uploaded into your personal DNA Vault, significantly reducing the potential for errors. This produces more accurate and reliable data that researchers, healthcare providers, and most importantly, you can trust.

It is also the most valuable data to researchers. Invest in getting your whole genome sequenced once and access a lifetime of learning and earning potential, while never compromising privacy, security or ownership of your data.  

 

 

Activate

Create a Genomes.io account, activate your DNA sequencing kit, and connect to your DNA Vault. Once your data is generated at the lab, it is uploaded into your DNA Vault. Upon successful upload, the lab deletes their copy of your data meaning your DNA data only exists in one place, under your control in your DNA Vault.

 

 

DNA Vault

This is a fully encrypted and virtualised cloud data storage environment that safeguards your genomic data. These vaults harness next-generation security technologies, which means even we, as a technology provider, can’t access your DNA data. This provides you with full data ownership and control over your most valuable piece of personal information.

 

 

 

Web Account 

Explore your whole genome by running genetic reports on your data. We begin with a Carrier Status report, giving you details on whether you are a carrier for certain hereditary conditions. This queries your genome for specific genetic variants that may not affect your health, but could affect your children's health.  

 

 

 

With your support, further reports will be made  available in 2021 including ancestry, health risks, drug response, personal traits, and many more!

 

Take our surveys, invite friends and contribute data to researchers to earn.

 

Mobile App

After setting up your mobile app and connecting to your DNA Vault, your mobile app serves as the ‘private keys’ to your genome. 

 

 

In the Actions tab, view data access requests and grant permission, as well as a history of how your data has been accessed. View a ledger of your earnings in the Wallet tab. And configure how you want to share data in the Settings tab.

 

 

(Some of) The Team

 

Featured in:

https://www.beauhurst.com/blog/future-of-blockc...

https://consensys.net/blog/press-release/consen...

https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/genome...

https://www.forbes.com/sites/gemmamilne/2018/09...

 

Support us today!

We are launching a product that will enable you to unlock the power of your DNA now to help shape a better future for everyone, all without losing control of your most valuable piece of personal information. And we invite you to take control of your genome and become a Founding User of our DNA bank today.
