story:
Posturenomic Board: What Is It?

The Posturenomic Board is a portable stretching device that you can fold up and bring anywhere. The Posturenomic Board uses a flat, adjustable stretching platform that can be stationed at different angles. This creates a perfect stretch with a smooth transition into the next movement. The Posturenomic Board is used to improve posture by allowing its users to stretch multiple muscles and enhance mobility. Routine stretching using the Posturenomic Board creates a stronger back, core, pain relief, and improved posture.

The Slant Board is a flat surface made of furniture grade plywood that can withstand over 350lbs. There is also a layer of durable anti-slip surface made from high quality rubber.  The design is simple, with a strong flat board hinged to another.  

This particular aspect is the functional nature of this device and the incline can be adjusted based on your personal/exercise requirements.

The Slant Board has 3 adjustable levels in increasing angles for a progressive stretch therapy. The angles are as follows:

  • 26°
  • 38°
  • 42°

The best part of the Posturenomic Board is its functionality. It is the size of a laptop, so it can easily fit into your bag, briefcase, or just held by your side using its carrying handles. With a weight of only 5.5lbs you can carry it in your bag easily. Its dimensions are 14.6" x 14" x 3" in and can be easily stored and placed in an average sized bag. These aspects make it light, portable and easy to use with little maintenance required.The Posturenomic Board can fold into a flat shape, making it easy to store in any location. This sleek and compact design makes it easy to keep in the office, at home, or in the gym.

Just place the Posturenomic Board on any flat surface and adjust it to target the muscles and body part of your choice! You have no excuse not to stretch!

 

How to Use It?

By using an adjustable flat surface, The Posturenomic Board allows you to stretch and relieve pain to multiple parts of your body all by adjusting the angle. Just place The Posturenomic Board on a flat surface and adjust the platform by locking into one of its options. The change in angle allows you to target different muscles with an effortless transition. Just pick a muscle and angle Posturenomic accordingly. Hold the stretch as needed.

For tips and various stretches, please refer to our The Posturenomic Board Stretch Guide!

 

Who It’s Designed For?

The most common and debilitating body ailment is back pain. On average, we sit for 9 ½ - 10 hr/day which causes a great level of stress and strain to the hip stabilizer muscles.

Unfortunately, Lower back pain is not getting the right attention it deserves and it is only on the rise. We want to prevent or reverse the effects that source lower back pain.

Crowdfunding Campaign Mission

Every contribution helps! We’ve set a goal of $10,000 which will go towards increasing our minimum order lowering our production costs. This means we can keep the posturenomic board at an affordable price, for you! If we do not reach our goal, the money we raise will go towards research and development as we begin to expand our posturenomic line and give you convenient access to innovative medical tools.

In return for supporting our campaign, we are offering two different perks. We are willing to give our first wave of backers 60% discount and up to $50 of savings.

 Our first bundle includes our Posturenomic Board and Posturenomic Stretch Kit. Our Posturenomic stretch kit is a four-piece kit, which revolutionizes traditional resistance bands. This kit will help in joint mobility and functionality reducing pain throughout the body.

 

 

Our second bundle includes the Postur enomic Stretch Kit and Posturenomic Foam Roller. The Posturenomic Foam Roller is great for myofascial stretching getting the muscles ready for a workout and reducing the chances of an injury.   

 

For those of you who contribute, your backing will not only get you a board but increase our ability to get it to millions all over the world. The money we raise will also help fund our new posturenomic items. We are dedicating our time and effort in developing innovative tools while still being practical in order to help prevent chronic pain.  

By backing this project, you are directly putting an end to poor posture, back pain, and stiffness all over the world.

Sitting

What’s happening to YOUR body?

At first, you’ll have tightness and stiffness of the muscles with some pain. It’s your body’s natural feedback mechanism that’s an alert for imbalances and muscle weakness. You won’t be going to your weekly pickup game or playing in the park with your children. Some will be bedridden because of the extensive pain. A couple days later the pain dulls and your back to your daily routines. At this point, you can act or forget about it which many of us do.

 

The body adapts to maintain upright movement, this means the imbalanced muscles will realign the hip to maintain mobility but degrade posture. If you restrict the range of movements you will only be able to professionally sit. Running, jogging and even walking becomes harder because of ineffective hip muscles.

If you have lower back pain you’re not alone. Most people in their lifetime experience one or more episodes of lower back pain. In most cases, the pain goes away within days or weeks however it can last for three months or more. It’s estimated that 1/3rd population has these extended episodes which are defined as Chronic lower back pain.

How Can the

     Posturenomic Board Help?      

                      

The Posturenomic Board is a functional, convenient board that’s developed specifically for regaining a proper posture in a functional manner. Usually, we tell ourselves sit straight or stop slouching but once we become engaged in an activity we usually forget it and our posture digresses into a “learned” position. Everyone has a unique learned posture as a result of tight/loose muscles which will cause further distress.

Its ingenious design makes it easy to use it; just place it on a flat surface, choose the desired angle and use countless stretches/exercises that will target the tight muscles.

The body can be viewed as a kinetic chain and problems in one spot has a cascade effect. 

Using different exercises, you will stretch the tightened muscles that are causing your specific problem. Regaining mobility in the hip and realigning it through the use of the Posturenomic Board will alleviate the compression caused by the chronic sitting reducing lower back pain.

The three different angles help in a progressive stretch routine that way you’ll increase your range of motion and get back to your daily routine pain-free.

What Does It Treat?

Common Pain Reduction:

  • Lower back pain
  • Plantar/Achilles Tendonitis
  • Sciatica
  • Pseudo-sciatica
  • Patellar tendonitis

Much More

Other Health Benefits:

  • Increases blood circulation
  • decreases varicose veins (blood pooling)
  • Prolonged  leg stretches reduce cholesterol and prevent the hardening of arteries

The list goes on!

These lists leave no doubt that the Posturenomic Board is an extremely useful tool. Remember the exercises and solutions above are just a few of the many that the Posturenomic Board offers. With its convenient design, it can be used and stored just about anywhere for everyone. Let’s work together to promote health and wellness by increasing mobility, enhancing function, decreasing pain and most importantly preventing future problems. Remember a proper posture is maintained and the Posturenomic Board is just the tool to do that.

For just 10-15 minutes a day

Common exercises:

  • The Hamstring Stretch
  • The Hip and Calf Stretch
  • The Plantar Fascia Stretch
  • The Achilles/ Soleus Stretch
  • Eccentric Squats

And More...

 

Check out what some had to say about the Posturenomic board:

 
Here are some exercises that can be done with the Posturenomic Board:

 

Exercises and Stretches that can be done with the Ultimate Stretch Kit:

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 What makes the perfect stretcher different from other stretching devices?

            Posturenomic’s small and sleek design, make it easy for its users to bring along with them anywhere. It is small and thin enough to carry in your bag or along your side.

 How does it work?

 Posturenomic’s flat, adjustable boards, allow you to easily stretch multiple parts of your body with one simple adjustment.

What areas does it target?

 Great for stretching the entire back, especially the lower back. Hamstrings, quads, Achilles, and calves. Great for opening up those stiff hips and groin.

Who is it for?

Posturenomic is great for the athlete, gym enthusiast, and anyone looking to supplement their workouts with a  good stretch. But the Posturenomic Board is also designed to fit the needs of anyone dealing with back pain and stiffness. This means people sitting behind a desk for long hours, people dealing with lower back pain, elderly, even pre and post pregnancy.

 Can I use it every day?

 Absolutely! We recommend that you use posturenomic every day as part of your workout or daily routine. The easy to use and portable design makes using the posturenomic effortless from anywhere. So its users have no excuse not to stretch!

When would I use it?

 First thing in the morning! Before bed. In the gym or in the office. Posturenomic can be used at any time of the day. There is no real regime or routine for stretching. Stretch as much or as little as you’d like, and get the relief anytime.

What is the purpose?

 Our goal is to relieve back and lower body pain by creating a more flexible body. Stretching keeps the body mobile and improves posture. This in return builds a stronger back, core, and healthier joints and ligaments. 

Risks and Challenges

So here is what sets the Posturenomic Board apart from other crowdfunding campaigns. Our product is fully completed and tested.

This product was designed to relieve ourselves from pain and improve our posture and can be used anywhere. So we know first-hand that it truly does work. After improving its look and functionality several times, we have finalized the board to what is it today.

The risk is minimal because we have a proven product and system. Logistics and production are running smoothly, and now we are ready to get this product to you.

Our trusted team has over 20 years combined experience in product development, design, logistics, and medical practice. We are confident that we will easily overcome any challenges that may arise during this campaign.

Our Team:

We are Bodykore, a leading innovator of fitness, wellness, and therapy products. Our company has been providing all aspects of fitness equipment to thousands of customers all over the globe. We have been at the forefront of the industry since 2005. With over 50 years of combined experience in fitness related industry, we have the knowledge and expertise to offer our clients anything they are looking.

It’s our mission to provide our clients with the greatest satisfaction when it comes to service, creativity, and professionalism. We pride ourselves in staying ahead of the fitness trends, with the customized design and state of the art equipment. Our creative designs, combined with vast industry knowledge have helped us create our newest product, the Posturenomic Board.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you believe in our mission and you can’t make a financial backing, you can help by joining our online community. Connect with us through Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube, and share our products! This will help spread the word of our posturenomic line, helping out all of those who have been looking for a product like this.

By joining our online community, you can receive FREE fitness tips and keep track of our latest product development.

 

 

Thank you for your time and joining the Movement #StandTall. We want to hear from you! Contact us for questions or comments. We're here to serve.

Posturenomic Board: What Is It?The Posturenomic Board is a portable stretching device that you can fold up and bring anywhere. The Posturenomic Board uses a flat, adjustable stretching platform that can be stationed at different angles. This creates a perfect stretch with a smooth transition into the next movement. The Posturenomic Board is used to improve posture by allowing its users to stretch multiple muscles and enhance mobility. Routine stretching using the Posturenomic Board creates a stronger back, core, pain relief, and improved posture.The Slant Board is a flat surface made of furniture grade plywood that can withstand over 350lbs. There is also a layer of durable anti-slip surface made from high quality rubber.  The design is simple, with a strong flat board hinged to another.  This particular aspect is the functional nature of this device and the incline can be adjusted based on your personal/exercise requirements.The Slant Board has 3 adjustable levels in increasing angles for a progressive stretch therapy. The angles are as follows:
26°
38°
42°
The best part of the Posturenomic Board is its functionality. It is the size of a laptop, so it can easily fit into your bag, briefcase, or just held by your side using its carrying handles. With a weight of only 5.5lbs you can carry it in your bag easily. Its dimensions are 14.6" x 14" x 3" in and can be easily stored and placed in an average sized bag. These aspects make it light, portable and easy to use with little maintenance required.The Posturenomic Board can fold into a flat shape, making it easy to store in any location. story:
BruxRelief In The News

Harmful Effects Of Stress

How does stress affect you? 1 in 3 people suffer from bruxism disorder which causes them to clench their teeth during the stress of their day and grind their teeth at night. 

The problem is only 10% of bruxism sufferers are ever diagnosed by their dentist and it's after damage has occurred and they've ruined their beautiful smile. Why? 

Because you don't know you are doing it, it happens unconsciously. Untreated, bruxism causes all kinds of expensive dental bills and pain. 

Unfortunately, the dentist only has a couple options... prescribe a dental splint / mouth guard that costs anywhere from $400 to $800 OR the dentist must perform cost surgeries such as replacing damaged teeth, overlays and crowns... costing $1000's...  

Even then the bruxism behavior continues and jaw pain, neck pain, frequent headaches, migraines and TMJ (temporomandibular joint) disorder can occur, not too mention you will most likely be back in the dentist's office again for more treatments / surgeries because your bruxism never stopped.

Until now, bruxism sufferers had no easy way to detect bruxism early, detect it before damage occurs... Until now, bruxism sufferers had no affordable way to treat and eliminate their stress and bruxism disorder. With BruxRelief, NOW YOU do!

What is Bruxism? How does Stress play a part?

 

BruxRelief Detection & Biofeedback Therapy

What if you found a solution? One wearable smart device that could detect if you have bruxism early and you can use the same device to treat and eliminate stress and bruxism disorder using biofeedback therapy. 

Easy to Use 

Incredibly Small

 One Connected Wearable Device

What is Biofeedback Therapy?

Biofeedback Therapy has been clinically tested for more than 25 years to end damaging and debilitating behaviors like Bruxism. Studies have repeatedly demonstrated that biofeedback therapy can successful aid an adult to retrain their brain and stop an unwanted behavior. 

In the last few years especially, specific studies have been conducted with patients suffering from Bruxism and biofeedback therapy and once again proved to be the solution these patients were looking for to end their bruxism. 

Now we've made this therapy available for all. BruxRelief is affordable, incredibly convenient, and provides comprehensive therapy by helping you to reduce your stress levels during the day and stop unwanted / harmful behaviours of clenching and grinding during your sleep.

Dr. Oxana Balan - Co-Founder BruxRelief

Up until now, dentist and bruxism sufferers have had no reliable way to detect bruxism disorder and treat it before damage occurs. Using biofeedback therapy dentist and bruxism sufferers can retrain their brain to destress and stop teeth clenching and teeth grinding behavior.

BruxRelief allows users to destress their life during the day and stop their teeth grinding and clenching while they sleep all in one device at an affordable price.

The Science

Biofeedback is like a superpower, it's like Spider-Man's 'Spidersense'. It allows your subconscious to be more aware so you can sense an unwanted behavior and change it. 

Biofeedback therapy is a technique that provides individuals with information about their bodily functions with the intention of promoting changes in behavior that result in improved health. Electronically detected physiological measurements are coupled with a feed-back signal that is initiated when pre-specified conditions are met. The BruxRelief device aims to generate a learned response that persists even after the therapy is discontinued as proven with other Biofeedback clinical and therapy results.

Insight Into The Grind

Developed with user friendly visuals and settings, the BruxRelief app helps you record your stress, clenching and teeth grinding occurrences, track progress, and customize settings such as vibration and audio signals. The app combines with BruxRelief to bring to the user a fully customizable therapy solution to address your stress, clenching and teeth grinding.  

Put your BruxRelief on, set the app and sweet dreams

 

How It Works

 The BruxRelief will attach behind your ear using a medical grade reusable adhesive gel. The device uses our patent pending sensor technology to measure muscle activity when you are clenching or grinding your teeth. Once the device senses clenching or grinding during stressful events or sleep, the device will emit a signal to your subconscious to stop the behavior without disturbing your workday or your sleep.

BruxRelief placement

The device will also communicate via bluetooth with your smartphone and the free BruxRelief app. You can use the app to customize your therapy and track your progress. There is also and online web portal you can use to share your therapy and progress with your dentist.

Timeline

Indiegogo launch

Indiegogo funded – 35days

Finalize design and source all materials for manufacturing – 90 days

Build / manufacture - 60 days

Packaging/ship/delivery – 30 days

Rewards

The Team

BruxRelief Team

 

Rockstart Launchtrack Demo Day Pitch

BruxRelief Advisors

 

Prototyping & Testing

We've spent the last year testing out various prototypes and sensor configurations that have allowed us to come up with some huge breakthroughs in sensor technology. Several of our innovations are now patent pending as a result of our extensive testing. It was hard work but this trial and error process allowed us to come of with a stress & bruxism detection and biofeedback device that is more accurate, smaller and will cost a small fraction of our competition. 

Numerous sensors and prototypes we testing during the patent-pending process

Testing

 

BruxRelief Final Design

My Story Behind BruxRelief

When I was going up, my favorite comic book was Spider-Man, but my real superhero was my dad. Just like Spider-Man, my dad wasn't perfect, but he was strong and he was brave.

After turning 35, my life went through a huge transition and something came to me, within me, that called upon me to change things up in my life. To go after my dreams and not let fear hold me back.

It's funny how life works sometimes, but everything happens for a reason. Over a year ago I moved to Bali, Indonesia to challenge myself, live aboard for at least one year and be brave...

Within one month after moving to Bali, life forced me to fulfill that decision to be brave. Within a month after moving to Bali, I got in a motorcycle accident, broke bones in my face, stitches and had a severe concussion. A month after that I caught dengue fever, which if you've ever had it, it feels like every bit of death. Then a month after that, I re-injured my lower back and spent two months in bed on pain-killers and eventually had to get back surgery in Thailand where I spent two months recovering.

That point was my lowest, I wanted to go back home so bad, I wanted to be with family. I was scared for the first time in my life as it felt like I had this dark cloud over me.

When I moved back to Bali after recovering, my anxiety and feelings got worse. I was afraid to go to sleep, I was afraid to wake up, I was afraid each day was going to be my last, worried about the next accident that might happen. It was at this point, when my anxiety was really bad that I started clenching my teeth constantly during the day, it felt like I was constantly preparing for a fight. I started waking up with a sore jaw from grinding my teeth at night.

I needed someone, I wanted my dad, my family, I wanted something to stop me, tell me to take a breath, calm down, be brave.

In college I studied psychology, engineering and programming. One morning waking up in fear and pain I remember a lesson about biofeedback therapy. Biofeedback is like a superpower, it's like Spider-Man's 'spidersense' it makes your subconscious more aware so that you can sense an unwanted behavior and change it.

I looked for an engineer in Bali to help me build it but ultimately I got frustrated and decided to build it myself. So I did some research, found the parts I needed and I flew to Singapore where I went to a robotics shop and started building my biofeedback device on my bathroom floor. Back then the device wasn't much and required a lot of calibration but I started testing it right away and within about 3 weeks my bruxism went away. The pain and stress from clenching went away as I had the device remind me stop, breath and relax my jaw muscles. At night the device helped me to stop grinding my teeth as well, sending messages to my subconscious that would stop me from grinding and allow me to get a deep restful sleep.

It was after relieving my own stress and bruxism that I realized I had something and I decided launch my startup BruxRelief to help the millions and millions of people that suffer from stress and bruxism disorder.

Since then I've traveled to Moldova to participate in the Rockstart Launchtrack program to step through validating this as a business opportunity and working with engineers, a dentist, programmers, my CTO back in Bali, and a 3D printing labs. We've tested numerous prototypes and made some awesome discoveries that are now patent pending.

It's been a wild ride getting BruxRelief to this point, an incredible adventure. But like I said in the beginning, everything in life happens for a reason and now with you and the Kickstarter community we'll finally be able to bring this wonderful solution to those suffering from stress and bruxism disorder.

Risks and challenges

We’ve worked extensively with suppliers, programmers, and engineering to bring to you BruxRelief, iterating through numerous prototypes and manufacturing techniques.

But even with lots of early feedback and great manufacturing processes and design, the hardware piece is not easy. We want to be clear about the major remaining risks to shipping on time: our end item design and creating production tooling.

Most electronic products are encased in hard plastic shells to protect their components. The BruxRelief using hard plastics and soft adhesive gel and is packed with sophisticated electronics, but has the added design challenge of being robust enough however comfortable to wear both on your jaw and temple. We’ve come up with some innovative techniques to ensure manufacturability of a product as unique as the BruxRelief, but it’s possible that we will still need to tweak our processes on the factory floor.

We are mitigating this risk to the schedule proactively by engineering reliability testing at multiple points to catch errors quickly.

All our prototypes were initially made with open source hardware and electronic components including controller board, patent pending muscle sensors, and associated wiring. The end item mold will still need to be procured. To make devices at larger quantities, we are designing a production steel mold or “tool” with the help our manufacturing partner. It’s possible that this process may require one or multiple re-designs of our tool. Delays with the factory can add days to the timeline. Days can become weeks.

To mitigate this risk, our technical team will be on-site at the factory during critical periods. Additionally, we have built an extra buffer into our production schedule to account for most reasonable setbacks.

We feel confident you'll receive your BruxRelief on time and we'll continue to be transparent and timely in our communication and manufacturing.

It is also important to mention that BruxRelief is not a medical device, and it's currently not designed to diagnose or treat any medical conditions.

Studies have repeatedly demonstrated that biofeedback therapy can successful aid an adult to retrain their brain and stop an unwanted behavior. In the last few years especially, specific studies have been conducted with patients suffering from Bruxism and biofeedback therapy and once again proved to be the solution these patients were looking for to end their bruxism. Now we've made this therapy available for all. BruxRelief is affordable, incredibly convenient, and provides comprehensive therapy by helping you to reduce your stress levels during the day and stop unwanted / harmful behaviours of clenching and grinding during your sleep.Dr. Oxana Balan - Co-Founder BruxReliefUp until now, dentist and bruxism sufferers have had no reliable way to detect bruxism disorder and treat it before damage occurs. Using biofeedback therapy dentist and bruxism sufferers can retrain their brain to destress and stop teeth clenching and teeth grinding behavior.BruxRelief allows users to destress their life during the day and stop their teeth grinding and clenching while they sleep all in one device at an affordable price.The ScienceBiofeedback is like a superpower, it's like Spider-Man's 'Spidersense'. It allows your subconscious to be more aware so you can sense an unwanted behavior and change it. Biofeedback therapy is a technique that provides individuals with information about their bodily functions with the intention of promoting changes in behavior that result in improved health. Electronically detected physiological measurements are coupled with a feed-back signal that is initiated when pre-specified conditions are met. The BruxRelief device aims to generate a learned response that persists even after the therapy is discontinued as proven with other Biofeedback clinical and therapy results.Insight Into The GrindDeveloped with user friendly visuals and settings, the BruxRelief app helps you record your stress, clenching and teeth grinding occurrences, track progress, and customize settings such as vibration and audio signals. The app combines with BruxRelief to bring to the user a fully customizable therapy solution to address your stress, clenching and teeth grinding.  Put your BruxRelief on, set the app and sweet dreams How It Works The BruxRelief will attach behind your ear using a medical grade reusable adhesive gel. The device uses our patent pending sensor technology to measure muscle activity when you are clenching or grinding your teeth. Once the device senses clenching or grinding during stressful events or sleep, the device will emit a signal to your subconscious to stop the behavior without disturbing your workday or your sleep.BruxRelief placementThe device will also communicate via bluetooth with your smartphone and the free BruxRelief app. You can use the app to customize your therapy and track your progress. There is also and online web portal you can use to share your therapy and progress with your dentist.TimelineIndiegogo launchIndiegogo funded – 35daysFinalize design and source all materials for manufacturing – 90 daysBuild / manufacture - 60 daysPackaging/ship/delivery – 30 daysRewardsThe TeamBruxRelief Team Rockstart Launchtrack Demo Day PitchBruxRelief Advisors Prototyping & TestingWe've spent the last year testing out various prototypes and sensor configurations that have allowed us to come up with some huge breakthroughs in sensor technology. Several of our innovations are now patent pending as a result of our extensive testing. It was hard work but this trial and error process allowed us to come of with a stress & bruxism detection and biofeedback device that is more accurate, smaller and will cost a small fraction of our competition. Numerous sensors and prototypes we testing during the patent-pending processTesting BruxRelief Final DesignMy Story Behind BruxReliefWhen I was going up, my favorite comic book was Spider-Man, but my real superhero was my dad. Just like Spider-Man, my dad wasn't perfect, but he was strong and he was brave.After turning 35, my life went through a huge transition and something came to me, within me, that called upon me to change things up in my life. To go after my dreams and not let fear hold me back.It's funny how life works sometimes, but everything happens for a reason. Over a year ago I moved to Bali, Indonesia to challenge myself, live aboard for at least one year and be brave...Within one month after moving to Bali, life forced me to fulfill that decision to be brave. Within a month after moving to Bali, I got in a motorcycle accident, broke bones in my face, stitches and had a severe concussion. A month after that I caught dengue fever, which if you've ever had it, it feels like every bit of death. Then a month after that, I re-injured my lower back and spent two months in bed on pain-killers and eventually had to get back surgery in Thailand where I spent two months recovering.That point was my lowest, I wanted to go back home so bad, I wanted to be with family. I was scared for the first time in my life as it felt like I had this dark cloud over me.When I moved back to Bali after recovering, my anxiety and feelings got worse. I was afraid to go to sleep, I was afraid to wake up, I was afraid each day was going to be my last, worried about the next accident that might happen. It was at this point, when my anxiety was really bad that I started clenching my teeth constantly during the day, it felt like I was constantly preparing for a fight. I started waking up with a sore jaw from grinding my teeth at night.I needed someone, I wanted my dad, my family, I wanted something to stop me, tell me to take a breath, calm down, be brave.In college I studied psychology, engineering and programming. One morning waking up in fear and pain I remember a lesson about biofeedback therapy. Biofeedback is like a superpower, it's like Spider-Man's 'spidersense' it makes your subconscious more aware so that you can sense an unwanted behavior and change it.I looked for an engineer in Bali to help me build it but ultimately I got frustrated and decided to build it myself. So I did some research, found the parts I needed and I flew to Singapore where I went to a robotics shop and started building my biofeedback device on my bathroom floor. Back then the device wasn't much and required a lot of calibration but I started testing it right away and within about 3 weeks my bruxism went away. The pain and stress from clenching went away as I had the device remind me stop, breath and relax my jaw muscles. At night the device helped me to stop grinding my teeth as well, sending messages to my subconscious that would stop me from grinding and allow me to get a deep restful sleep.It was after relieving my own stress and bruxism that I realized I had something and I decided launch my startup BruxRelief to help the millions and millions of people that suffer from stress and bruxism disorder.Since then I've traveled to Moldova to participate in the Rockstart Launchtrack program to step through validating this as a business opportunity and working with engineers, a dentist, programmers, my CTO back in Bali, and a 3D printing labs. We've tested numerous prototypes and made some awesome discoveries that are now patent pending.It's been a wild ride getting BruxRelief to this point, an incredible adventure. But like I said in the beginning, everything in life happens for a reason and now with you and the Kickstarter community we'll finally be able to bring this wonderful solution to those suffering from stress and bruxism disorder.Risks and challengesWe’ve worked extensively with suppliers, programmers, and engineering to bring to you BruxRelief, iterating through numerous prototypes and manufacturing techniques.But even with lots of early feedback and great manufacturing processes and design, the hardware piece is not easy. We want to be clear about the major remaining risks to shipping on time: our end item design and creating production tooling.Most electronic products are encased in hard plastic shells to protect their components. The BruxRelief using hard plastics and soft adhesive gel and is packed with sophisticated electronics, but has the added design challenge of being robust enough however comfortable to wear both on your jaw and temple. We’ve come up with some innovative techniques to ensure manufacturability of a product as unique as the BruxRelief, but it’s possible that we will still need to tweak our processes on the factory floor.We are mitigating this risk to the schedule proactively by engineering reliability testing at multiple points to catch errors quickly.All our prototypes were initially made with open source hardware and electronic components including controller board, patent pending muscle sensors, and associated wiring. The end item mold will still need to be procured. To make devices at larger quantities, we are designing a production steel mold or “tool” with the help our manufacturing partner. It’s possible that this process may require one or multiple re-designs of our tool. Delays with the factory can add days to the timeline. Days can become weeks.To mitigate this risk, our technical team will be on-site at the factory during critical periods. Additionally, we have built an extra buffer into our production schedule to account for most reasonable setbacks.We feel confident you'll receive your BruxRelief on time and we'll continue to be transparent and timely in our communication and manufacturing.It is also important to mention that BruxRelief is not a medical device, and it's currently not designed to diagnose or treat any medical conditions.

story:
Wear Theraflops 20 minutes a day to Treat Your Feet!!

Cold therapy recovery flip flops that help reduce inflammation, sooth sore feet, and feel great after a long day or workout.  Our patent pending sandals, Theraflops, deliver cold therapy to the feet.  So whether your pain stems from carrying a few extra pounds on your feet, plantar fasciitis, aging, intense exercise, or simply from being on your feet most of the day, Theraflops can help!

Created to be the highest quality solution for everyone with aching, tired feet, Theraflops apply cold to our feet with no effort.  Most of us don’t have the time to sit down and ice our feet in a bucket of painful ice water or with awkward  ice packs.   With Theraflops, all you need to do is pull them out of your freezer / cooler and put them on.

We wanted to make Theraflops out of the best materials possible.  The main soles of our flip-flops are made with our unique formulation of 100% polyurethane.  It’s the same material found in performance running and sports shoes and it ensures long-lasting cushion, rebound, bounce and durability.  It’s the secret ingredient that makes our flip-flops ultra-comfortable!  To hold the cold, Theraflops have freezing gel packs embedded in the heel.  They provide refreshing cold to the entire foot initially, while the heel portion delivers cold therapy for up to 30 minutes,  Our gel is nontoxic and environmentally friendly.  Theraflops are designed to withstand over a thousand pounds of pressure.  The result is a flip-flop that is best in its class: long lasting, super comfy, and made right here in America. 

Theraflops come with a sealing bag to keep them separate from food in your freezer or cooler.

Made in the USA

Manufactured in South Carolina and Missouri

The quality control and integrity of our design stem from the fact that Theraflops are made in the United States by our manufacturing partners with decades of experience since 1952.  Being close geographically to our partners is integral to our concept.  We can ensure high-quality delivery because we build, bag and box every pair ourselves in Austin, Texas.

Who exactly are Theraflops made for?

77% of Americans experience foot pain according to a study by the American Podiatric Medical Association.  Roughly 40% of those say they would exercise more and participate in more activities if it weren’t for foot pain.  By treating our feet first, we embark on healthier lifestyles and increase activity by building from the ground up.

277 million Americans say their feet hurt and foot pain can have a profound impact on quality of life.  Half of all adults say that foot pain has restricted their activities—like walking, exercising, working, or playing with grandchildren.  Treat your feet with Theraflops and get back to it!  

I created Theraflops as way to treat my own foot pain.  My feet get sore and hot from a running regimen I began to lose some pounds.  I also had a mile case of plantar and sympathize with those who experience more intense pain from the condition.  Currently, there is nothing in the market place that combines cold therapy for the feet in the form of a casual sandal.  Theraflops will provide cold therapy for the feet in flip flops that appear to be sleek flip flops.  However, embedded inside the heel are freezing gel packs.  In today’s busy world, we are all far too busy to kick our feet up and ice the bottoms of our feet; therefore, Theraflops solve the issue of how to treat your feet with no inconvenience.

In America alone, sore feet are a condition related to many circumstances.  Our target audience is diverse in cause but together in solution.  By simply wearing Theraflops, people can treat the symptoms of many different ailments including but not limited to:

•Plantar Fasciitis - 33 million Americans suffer from this condition where icing the heel is one treatment to alleviate pain and swelling in the foot.  Plantar fasciitis is the pain caused by degenerative irritation at the insertion of the plantar fascia on the medial process of the calcaneal tuberosity.  The pain may be substantial, resulting in the alteration of daily activities.  Also called jogger’s heel, tennis heel, and policeman’s heel.  The annual cost of treatments for plantar fasciitis is estimated to be between $192 - $376 million.

•Diabetic Nerve Pain in Feet - 29 Million Americans have diabetes

•Severs Disease​ is a condition in active children age 6 to 13, where the heel bone stretches from the tendon and causes pain and discomfort. Cold therapy to the area is crucial to relieve the pain.  Severs disease is not actually a disease but a heel injury.  During a growth spurt, a child’s heel bone grows faster than the muscles, tendons, and ligaments.  When the muscles and tendons can’t grow fast enough to keep up, they are stretched too tight resulting in pain.  If a child is very active, it can put extra strain on already overstretched tendons.  This leads to swelling and pain at the point where the tendons attach to the growing part of the heel.  Most doctors estimate 1 in 3 active children suffer from Severs Disease.

•Sore & Tired feet from activity attributed to:

•Endurance athletes including first-time marathoners, cyclists, and cross-fit enthusiasts

•Runners 

•Footballers (American and Soccer), Baseball 

•Hoops, volleyball, tennis

•Golf

•Dance and Cheer

•Jobs that keep us on our feet all day including hospital staff, military and police

•Retail

•Restaurant Staff

•Construction

•Lifestyle - Cool relief from hot pavement and beaches

                                  Our TEAM

David Hinkle : Founder and inventor of Theraflops

Doctor Bob Meyer : Chief therapy officer and treatment education specialist, consultant to University of Texas Athletics

Commander Mark McGinnis : US Navy SEAL and Chief Operator

The Velvet Cartel: content

Joe Brophy: Counsel

Design

 
Theraflops original design displays gel pack placement
Gel pack that is embedded in the heel

 

How Will We Use The Funds?

We will be using these funds to manufacture our first production of Theraflops, including additional molds and components that the design needs across many sizes! The more money we raise, the more we can make for all of you! 

We will also be helping to create more jobs in America with all of the production and processing being done in Missouri and Texas, so thank you so much for helping this dream come true for us, and for everyone who will benefit from it! 

Press

Interested in writing about Theraflops? Then click on our press kit link below, feel free to email us directly at david@theraflops.com or leave us a message if you have any other questions.

Please remember, Theraflops provide cold to your feet and are not a full-time substitute for regular footwear.

Patent-pending technology, patent-pending design.

Thank you for your support!!

Press Kit Link

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B42ktEYabQQiZnBLbFh6SktybDA?usp=sharing

story:
CYCLYK ® is manufactured from high quality silicone, making it the strongest, lightest and best value option available.

 

How to install CYCLYK ®

             

  

Video of installation

 

CYCLYK ® is a registered trademark and a revolutionary product aimed at changing the lives of urban and road cyclists by providing them with a new level of convenience for a safer cycling experience. 

Current CYCLYK ® ( First generation )

Current CYCLYK ® 2016

  

Help us!! to bring The NEXT generation of CYCLYK ®

            CYCLYK ® Trademark Registered N° 15 4 230 775

                                   

4 main improvements for the NEW CYCLYK ®

 

1- STRENGTHENED

We have improved the longevity of the mount by strengthening the most exposed areas.

The highest safety and quality standards are maintained in production

 

2- SIMPLICITY 

Finely crafted with double sided embossed images, for an instinctive motion installation.

Embossed phone ICON

 

3- ADDED FUNCTIONALITY 

Handle bar grip locking spheres allow for compact storage when not in use.

 

  4- DIVERSITY

You can choose between 4 new colors. Blue, white, red and transparent.

4 new colors, Blue, White, Red, Transparent

We are confident that we have come up with a great NEW product that addresses all of our functionality criteria. We've made high quality production prototypes and are now ready with YOUR SUPPORT for final manufacturing .  

Why INDIEGOGO ?  We need your support

To continue the project and make CYCLYK ® better than ever, making it, the strongest, lightest and best value smartphone mount. We had some technical barriers we had to overcome, and like every entrepreneurial project the financial difficulties are always next door, but with your help we will achieve the BEST smartphone mount of its kind.

After hard work and lots of development, we are ready to take the next step: create and new mold and begin manufacturing the next generation of CYCLYK ®.  

Your financial support will be utilised to complete the final setup and manufacture the CYCLYK ® of your choice. Creating a premium product.

Indiegogo is also a great way to gather feedback (don’t hesitate to drop us a line!).

 

CYCLYK ® with you, everywhere.

                        
Compatible with 

                                                                                                 

 

 

Cobbled streets

                                                     
Your phone is always securely attached

               

 Mountain trails

Strong and Reliable

                                                                                              

Road cycling

 

Track your rides or navigate

 

Independent reviews 

Vidéo en français

YouTube channel: NormandieCycling

 

Video in English 

YouTube channel: AndroidAndyUK

 

Our Partners 

Since launching 2015, CYCLYK ® has had coverage in mainstream, technology and cycling media.

 

TIMELINE MANUFACTURING & SHIPPING 

Last year we shipped thousands of first generation CYCLYK® worldwide.

With our latest design enhancements, the second generation of CYCLYK® should prove a great success and will lead to further fantastic products from TEMPO (our company).  

 

Timeline

 

 GALLERY 

  

  

  

 

Care and warranty

100% money-back guarantee – Again, no risk.

We use premium quality silicone and thus are able to offer a warranty. In the rare case of a faulty product we will replace this at no extra expense.

                                                                          Solid as a rock!!! 
                                                        

                                                                               

The highest safety and quality standards are maintained in production

More Videos

Proven for the road and long distances, transform your smartphone into a cycle computer with CYCLYK ®.

 

 

 

CYCLYK ® - The Team 

Made by cyclists for cyclists

Nous remercions chaleureusement la communauté francophone pour son soutien.

Nous sommes une société française, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter en français si vous avez des questions sur notre produit.

 

Risques et défis

GENERAL

We have faced some technical difficulties that made us find better solutions, but we are happy to say that we are over them !!!

Most of these issues concerned in how to make the next CYCLYK ® the trustable and strong smartphone mount that it is today, without compromising its easy remarkable functionality.

Now we are ready for manufacturing and our most challenging barrier concerns project funding.

We now required YOUR financial SUPPORT for the final tooling costs and first batch of CYCLYK ®

We are confident that we overcame the most significant challenges and our determination for the project's success is stronger than ever.

We will be fully transparent and will keep our backers up to date with any development.

The highest safety and quality standards are maintained in productionMore VideosProven for the road and long distances, transform your smartphone into a cycle computer with CYCLYK ®.

 

 

 
CYCLYK ® - The Team 
Made by cyclists for cyclistsNous remercions chaleureusement la communauté francophone pour son soutien.Nous sommes une société française, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter en français si vous avez des questions sur notre produit. Risques et défisGENERALWe have faced some technical difficulties that made us find better solutions, but we are happy to say that we are over them !!!Most of these issues concerned in how to make the next CYCLYK ® the trustable and strong smartphone mount that it is today, without compromising its easy remarkable functionality.Now we are ready for manufacturing and our most challenging barrier concerns project funding.We now required YOUR financial SUPPORT for the final tooling costs and first batch of CYCLYK ®We are confident that we overcame the most significant challenges and our determination for the project's success is stronger than ever.We will be fully transparent and will keep our backers up to date with any development.

story:
Lyme disease sucks. Excuse my French, but it really does. I know this because I've been dealing with it—and its not-so-fun relations called "co-infections" who also jumped on the tick bandwagon—for over 5 years now. Wait, my sister-in-law had Lyme and she just took a few weeks of antibiotics and is fine. Well, she's lucky. For many, it takes an average of 2 years to get diagnosed and by that time the infection has progressed to what is known as chronic Lyme disease, which is difficult and complicated to treat. Actually, there is no definitive cure! And, as my doctor is so cheerfully wont to say, "Lyme disease doesn't kill you but it makes you wish you were dead." In fact, the number one cause of death associated with Lyme disease is suicide. Major bummer.

So let's save lives! I'm raising these funds for the creation of a website called "Lyme Gets Better: Stories of Remission." The aim of my web project is partly to prevent any more Lyme suicides, and partly to help people get well by providing evidence, information, and encouragement through an ongoing series of interviews with those who overcame Lyme. Because there ARE people who are in remission from chronic Lyme and who have their lives back. In fact, I've interviewed four such individuals! Each written interview I conduct will run on the website accompanied by a short video made by my interviewees that directly addresses the viewer to motivate them to keep going. (The videos will be especially salient to those who are unable to read due to Lyme's effects on basic cognitive abilities.) As I like to say, hope is medicine!

Why this project is necessary. One story can save a life. I know this to be true from personal experience. When I was at my sickest, I scoured the Internet for stories of people who overcame this monstrous experience I was going through. But I found none. Only horror stories. At the time, I had just moved out of NYC, too sick to live my awesome life there, and moved back in with my parents. This was my low, I mean, I was really low. Then, a family friend put me in touch with a woman who had Lyme for 10 years and is now totally fine. We spoke on the phone and that one conversation kept me from giving up on myself and was the thread that pulled me through the coming arduous years of treatment. (In fact, I've interviewed her for this project!) I wrote about our conversation for BuzzFeed, if you want more deets on my personal story.

This could help, like, millions of people. No joke. Some Lyme disease advocates place the number of infected in the United States at 1 to 2 million. And that's just in the US. This vector-borne nastiness can be found on every continent, sans Antartica. Yet, it has been largely a silent epidemic (don't get me started on how the government has turned a blind eye). Information is so badly needed, especially around what treatments work for people. And yes, treatments get people better but hope is what keeps people alive to keep trying them. "Lyme Gets Better" will provide both hope and information to the desperate millions who are wading through this quagmire of a disease. 

How You're Helping. Even though I live in the tech capital of the world (San Fran!), everyone who knows me knows that I'm not the most tech savvy person. I mean, I'm a writer! (This has been my sorry excuse. Oh, for more of my writing about Lyme, check it out in Elle and Catapult.) Nevertheless, I feel very compelled by the Universe or what-have-you to build this website, which I'm going to do on SquareSpace. Since this is my passion project, I am happy to donate my time, energy, and focus to creating content for the site, and have already spent many hours soliciting, arranging, and conducting interviews. Your contributions would enable me to hire people with much more expertise than I have to help me execute the actual construction of the website:

1. A professional photographer ($300) – to take pretty pictures for my website. I want the site to exude positive, welcoming visual vibes. 

2. A SquareSpace specialist ($900) – to do layout & graphic design and to help me with all technical difficulties 

3. A logo designer ($500) – Did I mention I plan to extend this project across social media platforms? Instagram, Twitter, YouTube. Need a solid logo to look profesh.

Other essential funds needed: 

1. One year SquareSpace plan – $300

2. Indiegogo's cut – $200 (8% if I raise all the funds)

3. Keychain production – $300 (see perks!) So excited about these "talisman" tassel keychains embossed with the inspirational reminder to Keep Going. These will be gifts to my generous contributors. I'll also be offering them on my website once it's built to finance its continuation. 

There is no other space on the Internet like the one I'm proposing to create. As aforementioned, I spent a LOT of time googling for remission stories when I was really sick. To this day, I have yet to find a space on the websphere that is solely one of positivity and dedicated to stories of those who beat chronic Lyme. Also, Rolling Stone magazine recently estimated roughly 329,000 new infections of Lyme occur annually, and scientists are projecting a historic spike in infections around the country this summer. So sadly, the demand for my web project will only grow and someone you know may be touched by Lyme, if they haven't already. 

On a cheerier note, I'm happy to report that my own journey with Lyme disease is coming to a close. The conversations I've had with the very people whose interviews I want to run have aided my healing enormously. Please help us spread the word that "Lyme Gets Better."  

Do share this page on your Facebook and other social media if you can't contribute funds. Sharing is caring.

story:
Hello everyone, we’re Call4life. We are an Israeli tech start-up focused on providing intelligent medical consultations. We are a young and dynamic international company with a team of highly qualified doctors, IT specialists, and medical research scientists working passionately together to disrupt the medical industry and provide affordable high-quality medical services in the developing world. We have developed a telemedicine platform and patent-pending bot consultation for detecting oncological diseases at early stages.

For our next project, we plan to build 7 new intelligent bots in the areas of significant demand, namely cardiology, obstetrics and gynecology (woman’s health), psychiatry, men’s health, pediatrics (children health), infectious and tropical diseases, and nutrition and obesity (dietology) that will conduct primary consultations, detect disease at an early stage, and provide timely interventions to promote health and prevent diseases.

It's important to us that YOU be a part of this large-scale project. Our backers will receive special passes in the mail for our Oncobot and video consultations with our doctors.

You may also choose to give away medical consultations to our donation pool. They will be distributed through our partners – Red Cross and WDU (World Disability Union). 

Why do we need a bot revolution?

Here are some of the most important problems with our healthcare system:

  • Inconsistency in knowledge of diagnosis and treatment by physicians
  • Shortage of skilled health professionals to reach 12.9 million in coming decades
  • 767 million people in the world live under $1.90 a day and have no way to pay for their health care
  • Lack of access to health care centers leads to poor illness management

Reason #1: The knowledge gap

People are dying due to lack of knowledge. Health care workers in developing countries continue to lack access to basic information that enables them to deliver safe and effective care. This leads to patients being denied proper treatment, or sometimes even given unnecessary or harmful treatments, contributing to tens of thousands of unnecessary deaths

According to a report published in the Journal Human Resources for Health, a gross lack of knowledge about the basics on how to diagnose and manage common diseases is often associated with ineffective and dangerous health care practices. This indicates that modern medicine, even at a basic level, has largely failed much of the world's population.

Nowadays there are hundreds of clinical trials conducted each year, each reporting a potentially more effective treatment for the patient, it is simply unrealistic for a doctor to digest this much information and recall them accurately on demand when treating a patient.

Our solution

We designed an oncological bot after analyzing thousands of diagnostic options, and with the help of programmers who developed it under the guidance of top oncologists from Israel and US.

The bot has a very simple and easy to use interface that can be used by people of all age groups and most importantly has no biases.

We plan to create a medical information ecosystem using the bots that will assist doctors in developing countries to better treat their patients.

Reason #2: Where are the doctors?

Prevention is better than cure might be the most relevant proverb for the people living in the 21st century. But to prevent diseases, we need doctors who can identify the diseases before the first symptoms and provide timely interventions.

According to the World Health Organization, the world is facing a shortage of 4.3 million health workers of which doctors make up a crucial part.

Training this many doctors in a short period of time is short of impossible!

Our solution

This is where our bots excel. They can conduct hundreds of thousands of consultations in a day and the patients also have the choice of using the bot at their convenience.

Reason #3: Lack of access

Ease of access to health care is of great importance in any country but particularly in developing countries, where restricted access can put people at risk of illnesses. People often have to walk, sometimes for days, to get to a decent clinic or hospital.

Our solution

We have designed an online virtual clinic on our platform so that anyone with an Internet-connected device living in any corner of Earth can easily access our platform and receive qualified medical help.

Reason #4: The cost of survival

According to a WHO and World Bank Group report, there are 400 million people who do not have access to essential health services and 6% of people in low- and middle-income countries are tipped further into extreme poverty because of health spending.

At least 80% of humanity lives on less than $10 a day. While a recent statistic shows an average consultation in developing countries varies anywhere from 1$-15$.

People living in developing countries are unable to pay for consultations. This puts away most of them even visiting a doctor to seek professional help, and in the majority of the cases, people often come to see doctors when they are in the final stage of the disease.

Our solution

We are ready to build bots aimed at different specialties and tailored to developing countries and offer the primary consultation for FREE to over 1 million people.

Why do we need YOU?

We firmly believe in the global reach of our project and we find crowdfunding to be the perfect platform to deliver our message and gain support.

For this, we need to raise $120,000 to cover the costs of our doctors, programmers and data scientists in developing the bots. In exchange, we're offering you an Oncobot consultation for a discounted price, and a unique opportunity to be a part of the next Big Thing and help solve medical problems around the world.

Risk of oncological diseases

Research and development
$50,000

It is for hiring a team of international medical specialists who will formulate the medical data necessary for the planned bots.

IT infrastructure
$30,000

It is for building the next-generation converged networks that further enhance the platform for the bots and makes them easily accessible from various desktop and mobile environments, and to develop software

Product development
$40,000

It is for covering the costs of IT specialists, mathematicians, statisticians, and data scientists to implement the medical data, algorithms, and code into one seamless and beautiful bot.

Our team of 25 people has 11 doctors, 10 IT specialists and 4 mathematicians, statisticians, and data scientists.

Our Team

Andrew Kukuy Chief Doctor, Cardiologist

Doctor Andrew Kukuy is a specialist in diagnosing and treating of complex cases of internal diseases and rare diseases, also specializes in clinical pharmacology and tropical diseases.

Lesya Kukuy Nephrologist

Doctor Lesya Kukuy is a leading nephrologist, specializing in the field of renal autoimmune diseases and clinical therapeutics, and hypertension.

Yakov Berkun Pediatrician

Professor Yakov Berkun is the head of the paediatric department at the Hadassah Kharha-Zophim University Clinical Hospital (Israel), and specializes in general paediatrics and also in rheumatology, immunology and allergology

Natalia Sheynberg Pediatrician

Doctor Natalia is currently a senior physician at the Department of Emergency Pediatrics at Edmond Children's Hospital and Lily Safra (Shiba Medical Center, Israel)

Meira Zyuz General Physician

Doctor Meira Zyuz is a physician-psychotherapist and a leading specialist at the hospital of the Shiba Medical Center (Tel Hashomer).

Marina Boxer Neurologist

Doctor Marina Boxer is a senior child neurologist at the neurological center in Sheba hospital, Tel HaShomer. She is the head of the department of Video-EEG.

Rezo Chen General Physician

Doctor Rezo Chen is a is a leading geriatrician with the Maccabi Health Services.

Leon Michael Endocrinologist

Doctor Leon Michael is a leading endocrinologist at the hospital clinics "Klalit" and "Maccabi".

Michael Kuchuk Thoracic Oncologist

Doctor Michael Kuchuk is a leading specialist in the Department of Pulmonary Diseases and Intensive Care at the Meir Medical Center (Kfar Saaba, Israel).

Irene Kuchuk Oncologist

Doctor Irene Kuchuk is the Head of the Department of Breast Oncology at the medical centre Meir (Kfar Saba).

Arun Sabapathy Oncologist

Doctor Arun Sabapathy is an internist and specializes in oncology. Currently, he is working at the Call4life.

Risks and challenges

We have put our best efforts in training the bot on the latest medical protocols, but there is always a possibility of the bot interpreting the protocols in a different manner than a doctor and despite our thorough verification and re-verification process, some errors are bound to happen, and we promise that we will rectify them before it reaches you.

You should also be aware that the robot cannot treat ANY medical emergencies, and thus you should immediately contact your nearest doctor or emergency services. The robot was designed for identifying disease at the earliest stage possible and not treat them.

Developing AI is no easy task, but with the recent advancements in the fields of deep learning and big data analytics, we firmly believe we can take upon this task and deliver the promised results without any delays, but there are always ups and down in any venture and while delays can happen, we will update you with the progress. With your support, we will be able to work with the right people because our aim in the end is to deliver the highest quality and functionality possible.

FAQ

How can a bot replace a doctor?

In many cases, especially in for severe diseases, thousands of in many, especially severe diseases, hundreds of thousands of research studies, diagnostic tests and laboratory analysis have been carried out, and combined with the tens of thousands of electronic final diagnostic reports of patients with everything from the first to the last letter are transferred to our bot platform which is then used to train our artificial intelligence. (AI)

This information is then processed, where patterns were then detected and based on which a highly accurate diagnosis can be made by knowing the minimum required information from the patient.

How does the bot save my time?

To get a consultation with a doctor, first, you need to get to the hospital and spend at least an hour in line.

Thanks to the internet you can get the information about your health in just.

15 minutes. All you need to do is register on the site, answer the bot. These will bet the same questions any other physician will ask during the consultation and you would have wasted hours for this.

What does the bot know?

Our bots are able to assess the primary health status and identify the likelihood of diseases in addition to the personalized list of diagnostic tests and laboratory analysis to formulate the diagnosis.

The medical bots are trained to identify the patterns of diseases from a large database of patient histories. It is also able to give primary recommendations and a list of tests for a more accurate diagnosis.

How does the bot notify me of the results?

All results will be sent to the e-mail specified during the registration.

What to do with the results after receiving the data from the robot?

After receiving recommendations from the bot, the patient must do all the recommended diagnostic tests and laboratory analysis and after receiving the results of the test should enter this data into the Results Form (on the basis of which the robot will give recommendations to a future doctor), or contact a Call4life clinic doctor or any physician at the place of residence.

Why is the development so expensive?

The development of medical robots is the painstaking collaboration between a team of doctors, data scientists, and IT specialists. From the initial development to the finished model, the bot passes numerous checkpoints, and it takes at least 2-3 months for this process.

The main cost is the wages of various specialists.

What is the accuracy of the results of the bots?

At the moment, one of our bots is ready for use. Our Oncobot has an accuracy of detecting oncological diseases in almost 83% of the cases.

There are two more bots at various stages of development and already have an accuracy of almost 75%.

What is done to improve the accuracy of diagnosis?

By processing a large amount of medical data is the most important step for increasing the accuracy of the diagnosis.

We use the results of tens of thousands of electronic final diagnostic reports of patients from different countries for training our bots. With each new study, the results are further refined.

How does the bot derive the questions that it asks?

Each bot in addition to its specialty, is also a general physician.

All the questions were compiled by Israeli and American doctors and oncologists in strict accordance with the recommendations of medical associations of the USA and Europe.

Depending on the answer, the bot asks more detailed questions and immediately analyzes the answers.

Why was Oncobot chosen for the start?

4 out of 10 cases of cancers occur in low or middle-income countries, where two-thirds of cancer deaths occur. Less than 30% of low-income countries have generally accessible diagnosis and treatment services. Diagnosing cancer in late stages, and the inability to provide treatment, many people with unnecessary suffering and early death.

It is estimated that 23.6 million new cases of cancer will be diagnosed each year by 2030! Cancer that's diagnosed at an early stage, before it's given an opportunity to spread throughout the body is more likely to be treated successfully. If the cancer has spread, the treatment becomes much more difficult, and thus the chances of survival are much lower.

Will the bot be available in other languages?

We will translate all our bots into Chinese, Spanish, and French.

Within a month the Chinese version of the Oncobot should be available for public use.

How can I help?

A good way to help our team is to support our project on Indiegogo. It will also be great if you tell us about your friends on Facebook and Twitter.

In addition, we also require beta-testers who can help to identify the roughness in the operation of the entire system. We started as a small team, but now we need your help.

The robot was designed for identifying disease at the earliest stage possible and not treat them.Developing AI is no easy task, but with the recent advancements in the fields of deep learning and big data analytics, we firmly believe we can take upon this task and deliver the promised results without any delays, but there are always ups and down in any venture and while delays can happen, we will update you with the progress. With your support, we will be able to work with the right people because our aim in the end is to deliver the highest quality and functionality possible.FAQHow can a bot replace a doctor?In many cases, especially in for severe diseases, thousands of in many, especially severe diseases, hundreds of thousands of research studies, diagnostic tests and laboratory analysis have been carried out, and combined with the tens of thousands of electronic final diagnostic reports of patients with everything from the first to the last letter are transferred to our bot platform which is then used to train our artificial intelligence. (AI)This information is then processed, where patterns were then detected and based on which a highly accurate diagnosis can be made by knowing the minimum required information from the patient.How does the bot save my time?To get a consultation with a doctor, first, you need to get to the hospital and spend at least an hour in line.Thanks to the internet you can get the information about your health in just.15 minutes. All you need to do is register on the site, answer the bot. These will bet the same questions any other physician will ask during the consultation and you would have wasted hours for this.What does the bot know?Our bots are able to assess the primary health status and identify the likelihood of diseases in addition to the personalized list of diagnostic tests and laboratory analysis to formulate the diagnosis.The medical bots are trained to identify the patterns of diseases from a large database of patient histories. It is also able to give primary recommendations and a list of tests for a more accurate diagnosis.How does the bot notify me of the results?All results will be sent to the e-mail specified during the registration.What to do with the results after receiving the data from the robot?After receiving recommendations from the bot, the patient must do all the recommended diagnostic tests and laboratory analysis and after receiving the results of the test should enter this data into the Results Form (on the basis of which the robot will give recommendations to a future doctor), or contact a Call4life clinic doctor or any physician at the place of residence.Why is the development so expensive?The development of medical robots is the painstaking collaboration between a team of doctors, data scientists, and IT specialists. From the initial development to the finished model, the bot passes numerous checkpoints, and it takes at least 2-3 months for this process.The main cost is the wages of various specialists.What is the accuracy of the results of the bots?At the moment, one of our bots is ready for use. Our Oncobot has an accuracy of detecting oncological diseases in almost 83% of the cases.There are two more bots at various stages of development and already have an accuracy of almost 75%.What is done to improve the accuracy of diagnosis?By processing a large amount of medical data is the most important step for increasing the accuracy of the diagnosis.We use the results of tens of thousands of electronic final diagnostic reports of patients from different countries for training our bots. With each new study, the results are further refined.How does the bot derive the questions that it asks?Each bot in addition to its specialty, is also a general physician.All the questions were compiled by Israeli and American doctors and oncologists in strict accordance with the recommendations of medical associations of the USA and Europe.Depending on the answer, the bot asks more detailed questions and immediately analyzes the answers.Why was Oncobot chosen for the start?4 out of 10 cases of cancers occur in low or middle-income countries, where two-thirds of cancer deaths occur. Less than 30% of low-income countries have generally accessible diagnosis and treatment services. Diagnosing cancer in late stages, and the inability to provide treatment, many people with unnecessary suffering and early death.It is estimated that 23.6 million new cases of cancer will be diagnosed each year by 2030! Cancer that's diagnosed at an early stage, before it's given an opportunity to spread throughout the body is more likely to be treated successfully. If the cancer has spread, the treatment becomes much more difficult, and thus the chances of survival are much lower.Will the bot be available in other languages?We will translate all our bots into Chinese, Spanish, and French.Within a month the Chinese version of the Oncobot should be available for public use.How can I help?A good way to help our team is to support our project on Indiegogo. It will also be great if you tell us about your friends on Facebook and Twitter.In addition, we also require beta-testers who can help to identify the roughness in the operation of the entire system. We started as a small team, but now we need your help.
